String.Source: I...I don't feel like fighting anymore.
String.Dest: 我……我不想再打下去了。

String.Source: What did you do? You look like you're up to some mischief. And why was I not included?
String.Dest: What did you do? You look like you're up to some mischief. And why was I not included?

String.Source: Such powerful magic! My wounds are closing, and my scars...well, nobody's perfect.
String.Dest: Such powerful magic! My wounds are closing, and my scars...well, nobody's perfect.

String.Source: A healing spell! Where have you been all my life!
String.Dest: A healing spell! Where have you been all my life!

String.Source: I thank you, my Thane.
String.Dest: 多谢你啦，我的男爵。

String.Source: I feel myself getting braver! Perhaps...even brave enough to wear a dress again.
String.Dest: 我觉得自己变得勇敢些了！也许……快要勇敢到足以换上女装了。

String.Source: When I said I didn't like people staring, this isn't what I meant. But close enough.
String.Dest: When I said I didn't like people staring, this isn't what I meant. But close enough.

String.Source: Hags and Forsworn live here. We should be careful climbing up these steps, my liege. One false move and it will be raining sticks and stones.
String.Dest: Hags and Forsworn live here. We should be careful climbing up these steps, my liege. One false move and it will be raining sticks and stones.

String.Source: It looks like the ruins of an old fort. We must be getting warmer. Literally.
String.Dest: It looks like the ruins of an old fort. We must be getting warmer. Literally.

String.Source: Ansilvund. They say Fjori and Holgeir were buried here. It's one of the great Nord love stories.
String.Dest: Ansilvund. They say Fjori and Holgeir were buried here. It's one of the great Nord love stories.

String.Source: But you can't tell a Nord story without a few Draugr. Be wary.
String.Dest: But you can't tell a Nord story without a few Draugr. Be wary.

String.Source: Bears, my liege. Maybe we should draw them outside. Although that never seems to work for me.
String.Dest: Bears, my liege. Maybe we should draw them outside. Although that never seems to work for me.

String.Source: Get ready, my liege. Every vessel has been fiercely guarded. This last one will be no exception.
String.Dest: Get ready, my liege. Every vessel has been fiercely guarded. This last one will be no exception.

String.Source: Watch out for the trip wire, my champion. Step on that, and the rocks step on you.
String.Dest: Watch out for the trip wire, my champion. Step on that, and the rocks step on you.

String.Source: Bandit camp ahead. I wonder if they use those boulders to trap people inside, or if they just toss them on your head.
String.Dest: 前面有贼窝……我突然想他们准备的大石头到底是用来把人困在里面呢还是仅仅为了砸扁人家的脑袋。

String.Source: More bandits in the large room ahead. It looks like this is where they skin the mammoths. The floor might be a little slippery.
String.Dest: 前面的大屋里还有些强盗在。看起来这是他们给猛犸象剥皮的场所，地面可能有点滑呢。

String.Source: All right, if you two are ready so am I. Open the door.
String.Dest: 行吧，你俩都准备好了那我也一样。开门吧。

String.Source: More bandits. It sounds like they're arguing over something. Let's take them out quickly.
String.Dest: 又有强盗。听起来好像他们在争吵些什么。咱就速度来个一锅端吧。

String.Source: This looks like the top floor. Hopefully we can find Christer's wife. Mara will be very happy we brought them back together.
String.Dest: 这里应该是顶层了，希望能找到那男人的爱妻。要是咱能让他们团聚，玛拉会很高兴的！

String.Source: Whatever killed that adventurer is waiting in this cave. Be ready, my champion.
String.Dest: 杀死那个冒险者的东东就盘踞在这个洞里。做好准备，我的勇士！

String.Source: Bone chimes. Step carefully, my hero. We don't want to lose the element of surprise.
String.Dest: 小心骨铃，慢点走啊英雄。咱们可别破坏了惊喜哟！

String.Source: Hagravens, my champion. Their magic is strong, so we must be stronger.
String.Dest: 有乌鸦鬼婆啊，我的勇士！她们的法力相当的强，所以咱们必须更强！

String.Source: Look, my hero, Jazbay grapes! I've heard they're quite useful for potions, but even better for wine.
String.Dest: 看呐我的英雄——架子湾葡萄！我听说用它做药是很好的，不过用来酿酒的话更棒！

String.Source: They must have used these wooden beams to replace the bridge. The fall isn't very steep, but it would be very annoying to have to climb back up.
String.Dest: 这些破木头条是他们当桥用的吧？这瀑布倒不算很夸张，可是非要爬着上来的话水声真是吵死人。

String.Source: Light and darkness fight in these ruins. Let's go brighten it up some more.
String.Dest: 光明与黑暗在这遗迹中争斗。咱们去给它加点亮吧。

String.Source: Alright, I take it back. Enchanted spiders are kind of scary. Much scarier than enchanted mudcrabs.
String.Dest: 好吧，我收回我的话。魔化的大蜘蛛还真有点吓人。比魔化的河蟹吓人多了。

String.Source: I am all for helping this talking dog find its master, but he probably should've told us about the vampires. (Laughs) Listen to what I'm saying.
String.Dest: 我真的很愿意帮这只会说话的狗狗找到主人的，可他应该先告诉咱们有吸血鬼什么的吧。（笑）我在胡说些什么啊。

String.Source: My Jarl did well to shout past the gates, and it looks like there are more trials to come. I will stand behind you with my fingers in my ears.
String.Dest: 我的领主潇洒地用龙吼穿过了三重门，而且看来还要迎来更多考验。我会忠实地站在你身后，用手指好好堵住自己耳朵的。

String.Source: Spiders. You can hear them scuttling about. One time I thought I heard them talking, but then I realized it was the poison getting to my head.
String.Dest: 是蜘蛛。听到他们窸窸窣窣的声音了吧。有一次我还以为听见了它们说话，然后才意识到那是中毒上脑后产生的幻觉。

String.Source: Look, up ahead. So that is a Glenmoril witch. She looks like a Hagraven. Are you sure we have the right cave?
String.Dest: 看，就在前面。原来这就是格仑摩里女巫。她看起来跟乌鸦鬼婆一个样嘛。你确定咱们走对山洞了吗？

String.Source: So this is Broken Helm Hollow. Was the mountain shaped like a broken helm? I will have to check when we go back outside.
String.Dest: 这里就是裂盔山洞吧。这座山的形状真的像个破烂头盔吗？等会出去我得亲眼去确认一下。

String.Source: Swinging axes and angry Draugr. A good time to add to our collection of scars, don't you think?
String.Dest: 挥舞的斧头和愤怒的尸鬼。是再添几道伤疤的好时机了，你觉得呢？

String.Source: Is that deer...alive? For a second I thought I heard it grumble. Or was that my stomach? That would be very unladylike.
String.Dest: 那头鹿……还活着吗？我好像听它发出咕噜噜的声音。不会是我的肚子在叫吧？那可太不淑女了。

String.Source: Vampire. I don't think he can see us, but there's a lot of space between us and him. Sometimes I wish I was an archer.
String.Dest: 吸血鬼。我看他不可能发现咱们，不过咱这距离跟他也太远了。有时我真想当个弓箭手。

String.Source: This undercroft reminds me of the story of the haunted barrow. Only this one has more necromancers. We should change that.
String.Dest: 这个墓穴让我想起了那些古坟闹鬼的故事。不过这里多了些亡灵术士。咱们就帮忙解决一下吧。

String.Source: Now why did that silly Elf run off? Did he already forget that we saved his life?
String.Dest: 那个蠢货精灵怎么跑了？转眼就忘了咱救了他的命吗？

String.Source: Trouble ahead. Surely my dashing savior will not let any harm come to me this time.
String.Dest: 前面危险。不过这次我潇洒的救世主不会让我再受到任何伤害了是吧。

String.Source: A garden, a treasure chest, and a ghost to guard it. But his master seems to be a bit shy. I wonder where he's hiding?
String.Dest: A garden, a treasure chest, and a ghost to guard it. But his master seems to be a bit shy. I wonder where he's hiding?

String.Source: My Jarl, look! It seems this city is much more beautiful than I thought. I guess with some things, you just have to look past the surface.
String.Dest: My Jarl, look! It seems this city is much more beautiful than I thought. I guess with some things, you just have to look past the surface.

String.Source: The bandits have their own forge! I hope they're not trying to steal Alvor's business!
String.Dest: The bandits have their own forge! I hope they're not trying to steal Alvor's business!

String.Source: This is quite the cavern! Very green, and very dark. It certainly fits the name.
String.Dest: 果然是这么个洞穴，够绿色，也够暗黑，名符其实啊！

String.Source: By Kynareth, what a beautiful tree! And look at the waterfalls! You can never have enough of those.
String.Dest: 凯娜瑞斯在上，这树简直太美啦！还有那么多瀑布！真是一辈子看不够呢！

String.Source: We are really high up! Look how far down Bleak Falls Barrow is. I don't think I've ever seen it from this angle!
String.Dest: We are really high up! Look how far down Bleak Falls Barrow is. I don't think I've ever seen it from this angle!

String.Source: A secret passageway and now a secret cave. It's a good thing bandits are so bad at keeping secrets.
String.Dest: 从一个秘密入口到一个秘密洞穴，幸好强盗没文化，秘密什么的根本守不住呢。

String.Source: Amazing. We can see into four separate holds. And the fresh air is a welcome change after that ruin of darkness.
String.Dest: 神奇啊。从这居然能看到四个不同的地域。而且从黑暗的遗迹出来闻到新鲜的空气真是可喜可贺。

String.Source: By the White River...what a sight! Columns rising from the water, a sacred altar lit by a bonfire, and the Horn of...wait...I don't see the horn.
String.Dest: 我的白河大神哪……太壮观啦！水里探出图腾巨柱，篝火照亮神圣祭坛，上面是那了不起的号角……等一下…没看见有号角。

String.Source: By the Divines...it's like the front gate of some Dwemer castle! All it needs is a moat filled with metal alligators.
String.Dest: 我的老天……这简直像是座锻莫城堡的正门！要是再有条遍布矮人守卫的壕沟就完美了。

String.Source: I didn't know the Nightingales had their own banners! Whoever designed them was very talented.
String.Dest: 我都不知道夜莺都已经有他们自己的旗帜了！设计出这面旗的人可真是有才。

String.Source: So many guards...I could distract them with my charm, my Thane, but sneaking is fine too.
String.Dest: 好多的守卫……我可以用自己的魅力迷惑他们，我的男爵。但偷偷溜过去也不错。

String.Source: This Dwarven orb is massive. I think if we rolled it down the White River, it would get stuck before it ever reached Whiterun.
String.Dest: 这个矮人球体好大只哦。我想要是顺着白河把它推下去，恐怕还没滚到白漫城就卡在半路了。

String.Source: I'm coming Joselyn. Just hold on.
String.Dest: 我来了约瑟琳！撑住啊！

String.Source: By Riverwood, look at all this scaffolding...are these vampires building an underground city? That is scary thought.
String.Dest: 我的个溪木镇啊，瞧这些绞具刑台……这帮吸血鬼是在建造地下城市吗？真是个可怕的想法。

String.Source: By the White River...this is a beautiful burial chamber. Look at the way the light warms the coffin. Built for a king, but now...home to a killer.
String.Dest: 我的白河大神哪……这墓室可真美啊。瞧那沐浴在暖光下的棺木。本来为王室而建，而现在……成了一个杀手的家。

String.Source: Such beauty! But we should not admire the view for too long, lest the Spriggans catch us unaware.
String.Dest: 确实好美啊！不过还是别光顾着赞叹景观吧，免得一不留神冒出些树精出来给咱办了。

String.Source: Brittleshin Pass is an underrated wonder. It's very easy to get captured when your eyes are lost in its beauty.
String.Dest: 布莱特辛山隘是一处不为人所重视的奇观。在你欣赏那儿的美景时你很容易沉醉得被人抓住。

String.Source: Oh my, look at that wall! Those inscriptions look ancient! We must get a closer look!
String.Dest: 哦天呐，瞧那堵墙！那些铭文好像是古迹！咱们得去近处好好看看！

String.Source: So this is the Dwemer Museum. It lacks...color. Maybe they should fill a few Dwarven urns with mountain flowers. Or a bouquet of tundra cotton.
String.Dest: 这就是传说中的锻莫博物馆啊。有点缺乏……色彩啦。也许他们应该在一些矮人瓮里种上点儿山花啊，苔原棉什么的。

String.Source: By the Gods. They say all beauty has flaws, but this is a sight that is undoubtedly without one.
String.Dest: 天呐！人们都说所有的美景都会有瑕疵，但这儿看起来绝对是个例外。

String.Source: A cave. Let's go in, shall we?
String.Dest: 有个山洞。进去看看，走吧？

String.Source: A cave. After you, my liege.
String.Dest: 一个山洞。您先请啦，我的君主！

String.Source: A Dwarven city. Remarkable.
String.Dest: 一座矮人城市。真是不同寻常。

String.Source: Dwarven ruins. Old cities, old ghosts.
String.Dest: 矮人遗迹。古老的城市，古老的幽灵。

String.Source: By the Divines, look. A Dwarven city.
String.Dest: 圣灵在上。看，一座矮人城市。

String.Source: Legend says Dwarven ruins are haunted. I guess there's only one way to find out.
String.Dest: 据传锻莫遗迹都是闹鬼的。我猜要想搞清真相只有一种办法吧。

String.Source: Look. A cave. Plenty of gold inside, I hope.
String.Dest: 看，一个山洞。希望里面有很多财宝。

String.Source: Old ruins. Nordic, by the looks of it.
String.Dest: 从外观上能看出来，这是座古代的诺德遗迹。

String.Source: Nord ruins. How long do you think they've stood here?
String.Dest: 诺德遗迹。你认为它矗立于此多久了？

String.Source: A Nord ruin. Thousands of years old.
String.Dest: 一座诺德遗迹。它有数千年之久了吧。

String.Source: Old stonework. Gold, traps, and bones.
String.Dest: 古老石雕制品，金币、陷阱和骨头。

String.Source: A cave. What will we find? Trouble, or treasure? Or both?
String.Dest: 有个洞穴。里面会有什么呢？麻烦？宝藏？还是兼而有之？

String.Source: There's a cave up here. Maybe we should check it out.
String.Dest: 那边有一个洞穴。也许咱应该过去看看。

String.Source: Cave up ahead. Tread carefully.
String.Dest: 你先进洞。小心脚下。

String.Source: Hey, there's a cave here. Animals, bandits, or maybe both.
String.Dest: 嘿，这儿有个洞穴。野兽，强盗，说不定都有。

String.Source: A cave. A perfect place to get trapped, and an even better place to be rescued.
String.Dest: 一个山洞。真是个被囚禁的完美场所，更是个被英雄救美的好地方啊。

String.Source: A Nord ruin. So ancient, and so mysterious. But the real mystery is why anyone would want to go inside.
String.Dest: 一座诺德遗迹。如此古老，如此神秘。但真正神秘的是为啥会有人想要进去。

String.Source: The Dwemer built this city? Impressive. Although it seems they share the Nords' distaste for color.
String.Dest: 这座城市是锻莫人修建的？真了不起。虽然看来他们跟诺德人一样不喜欢色彩。

String.Source: Has the store made any money?
String.Dest: 商店有赚钱吗？

String.Source: Did you doubt me, my love? We've made a nice little profit. Here's your share.
String.Dest: Did you doubt me, my love? We've made a nice little profit. Here's your share.

String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
String.Dest: 勇士堑山庄。

String.Source: A good choice, my husband.
String.Dest: 明智的选择，老公。

String.Source: Windstad Manor.
String.Dest: 文斯塔德庄园。

String.Source: A good choice, my husband.
String.Dest: 明智的选择，老公。

String.Source: Lakeview Manor.
String.Dest: 湖景林居。

String.Source: A good choice, my husband.
String.Dest: 明智的选择，老公。

String.Source: Let's live in my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 让我们住在我在独孤城的房子里吧。

String.Source: A good choice, my husband. A house overlooking the Sea of Ghosts. Maybe I will take up singing as well. But they might confuse me with a torturer.
String.Dest: 很棒的选择，老公。住在一座能够俯视幽灵之海的豪宅。没准我也会在那唱歌，不过别人会以为我是虐待狂呢。

String.Source: How about my house in Windhelm?
String.Dest: 我在风盔城的房子怎么样？

String.Source: Windhelm is a beautiful city. My Prince, I cannot wait to nestle by the fire during the cold winters.
String.Dest: 风舵城是很美的城市啊。我的王子，人家都等不及要去那冰天雪地里烤烤火啦。

String.Source: My house in Markarth would be perfect.
String.Dest: 我在马卡斯城的房子将会很完美。

String.Source: My love, I do like Dwarven ruins. And it's right next to a prison! We can take criminals home with us. No need for separate trips.
String.Dest: 哇亲爱的，我真的很喜欢锻莫式建筑呢。而且它紧邻着一个监狱！咱们抓到罪犯就顺路带回家，不用专门去送啦。

String.Source: I have a house in Riften.
String.Dest: 我在裂谷城有栋房子。

String.Source: A good choice, my love. I have always liked cities that had an element of danger. Some days we can play the thief, and other days we can catch them.
String.Dest: 选得好，亲爱的。我一直就喜欢那种带点儿危险色彩的城市。咱可以经常扮演盗贼玩，有时候还可以抓贼哦。

String.Source: We could live in my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 我们可以住在我在雪漫城的房子里。

String.Source: Whiterun is perfect, my Prince. Very close to Riverwood, and close to Zora's field. I won't even have to go through Brittleshin Pass to get there.
String.Dest: Whiterun is perfect, my Prince. Very close to Riverwood, and close to Zora's field. I won't even have to go through Brittleshin Pass to get there.

String.Source: Whiterun is perfect, my Prince. Very close to Riverwood, and close to Zora's field. I won't even have to go through Brittleshin Pass to get there.
String.Dest: Whiterun is perfect, my Prince. Very close to Riverwood, and close to Zora's field. I won't even have to go through Brittleshin Pass to get there.

String.Source: Then it's settled, my husband. We shall live in the Sleeping Giant Inn. It costs 10 gold a night, but we can always camp out under the stars.
String.Dest: 那就这么定啦，我的老公。咱就住在沉睡巨人了。虽然每晚要花十个金币，但可以随时在星空下露营。

String.Source: Living with you would be perfect.
String.Dest: 和你一起生活将会很完美。

String.Source: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic
String.Dest: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic

String.Source: So, my husband, what shall we do now? Raid some caves? Find a place to live? A warm fire and a warm bed would be nice.
String.Dest: So, my husband, what shall we do now? Raid some caves? Find a place to live? A warm fire and a warm bed would be nice.

String.Source: So, what shall we do now? Raid some caves? Find a place to live? A warm fire and a warm bed would be nice.
String.Dest: So, what shall we do now? Raid some caves? Find a place to live? A warm fire and a warm bed would be nice.

String.Source: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic
String.Dest: RelationshipMarriagePostWeddingLoveInterestBlockingTopic

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: I would love to, my dashing Prince. Here you are, a homecooked meal, and a kiss for good luck from your princess.
String.Dest: I would love to, my dashing Prince. Here you are, a homecooked meal, and a kiss for good luck from your princess.

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: Here you are, a homecooked meal, and a kiss for good luck from your princess.
String.Dest: Here you are, a homecooked meal, and a kiss for good luck from your princess.

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: I made you something special. Well, it's actually the same stuff I always cook. But this time it's filled with twice the love.
String.Dest: I made you something special. Well, it's actually the same stuff I always cook. But this time it's filled with twice the love.

String.Source: Would you mind cooking something for me?
String.Dest: 你介意帮我煮点吃的吗？

String.Source: My husband has quite the appetite. But very poor eyes. Does he not see his wife's arms are tired?
String.Dest: 我的丈夫吃嘛嘛香，就是没眼力见儿。他没看见爱妻的胳膊都累疼了吗？

String.Source: Heljarchen Hall.
String.Dest: 勇士堑山庄。

String.Source: A good choice, my love.
String.Dest: 选得好，亲爱的。

String.Source: Windstad Manor.
String.Dest: 文斯塔德庄园。

String.Source: A good choice, my love.
String.Dest: 选得好，亲爱的。

String.Source: Lakeview Manor.
String.Dest: 湖景林居。

String.Source: A good choice, my love.
String.Dest: 选得好，亲爱的。

String.Source: I'd like us to move somewhere else.
String.Dest: 我想我们得去别的什么地方。

String.Source: As you wish, my love. Where should we move to?
String.Dest: As you wish, my love. Where should we move to?

String.Source: Proudspire Manor, my house in Solitude.
String.Dest: 傲矛别墅，我在独孤城的家。

String.Source: A good choice, my husband. A house overlooking the Sea of Ghosts. Maybe I will take up singing as well. But they might confuse me with a torturer.
String.Dest: 很棒的选择，老公。住在一座能够俯视幽灵之海的豪宅。没准我也会在那唱歌，不过别人会以为我是虐待狂呢。

String.Source: Hjerim, my house in Windhelm.
String.Dest: 霜宅，我在风盔城的房子。

String.Source: Windhelm is a beautiful city. My Prince, I cannot wait to nestle by the fire during the cold winters.
String.Dest: 风舵城是很美的城市啊。我的王子，人家都等不及要去那冰天雪地里烤烤火啦。

String.Source: Vlindrel Hall, my house in Markarth.
String.Dest: 林德尔会堂，我在马卡斯城的房子。

String.Source: My love, I do like Dwarven ruins. And it's right next to a prison! We can take criminals home with us. No need for separate trips.
String.Dest: 哇亲爱的，我真的很喜欢锻莫式建筑呢。而且它紧邻着一个监狱！咱们抓到罪犯就顺路带回家，不用专门去送啦。

String.Source: Honeyside, my house in Riften.
String.Dest: 甜蜜湾，我在裂谷城的房子。

String.Source: A good choice, my love. I have always liked cities that had an element of danger. Some days we can play the thief, and other days we can catch them.
String.Dest: 选得好，亲爱的。我一直就喜欢那种带点儿危险色彩的城市。咱可以经常扮演盗贼玩，有时候还可以抓贼哦。

String.Source: Breezehome, my house in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 风宅，我在雪漫城的房子。

String.Source: Whiterun is perfect, my Prince. Very close to Riverwood, and close to Zora's field. I won't even have to go through Brittleshin Pass to get there.
String.Dest: Whiterun is perfect, my Prince. Very close to Riverwood, and close to Zora's field. I won't even have to go through Brittleshin Pass to get there.

String.Source: Whiterun is perfect, my Prince. Very close to Riverwood, and close to Zora's field. I won't even have to go through Brittleshin Pass to get there.
String.Dest: Whiterun is perfect, my Prince. Very close to Riverwood, and close to Zora's field. I won't even have to go through Brittleshin Pass to get there.

String.Source: Then it's settled, my husband. We shall live in the Sleeping Giant Inn. It costs 10 gold a night, but we can always camp out under the stars.
String.Dest: 那就这么定啦，我的老公。咱就住在沉睡巨人了。虽然每晚要花十个金币，但可以随时在星空下露营。

String.Source: Your old place would suit us just fine.
String.Dest: 你的老地方会很适合我们的。

String.Source: Farewell, my Prince.
String.Dest: 再见，我的王子。

String.Source: Goodbye, my love.
String.Dest: 再见，我的宝贝。

String.Source: It's a wonderful home, my love. With the world at peace, I might even start a store. But only when we aren't adventuring.
String.Dest: It's a wonderful home, my love. With the world at peace, I might even start a store. But only when we aren't adventuring.

String.Source: You're back. Will you be taking your wife with you this time?
String.Dest: You're back. Will you be taking your wife with you this time?

String.Source: Greetings, my husband. Back from some adventure?
String.Dest: Greetings, my husband. Back from some adventure?

String.Source: Oh...it's...it's the scars, isn't it. I...I should've known fairy tales don't come true.
String.Dest: 哦…这……是因为伤疤，对吧。我……我该知道那些童话是不会成真的。

String.Source: It's best we stay friends.
String.Dest: 我们最好保持朋友关系吧。

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: I love you. I want to spend the rest of my life with you.
String.Dest: 我爱你。我想和你共度余生.

String.Source: Truly? My Prince wishes to marry?
String.Dest: Truly? My Prince wishes to marry?

String.Source: Do you think you might wear one of these amulets again?
String.Dest: 你觉得这些项链以后还会戴吗？

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: I will not suffer the embarrassment, my lord, but perhaps another will do so on my behalf.
String.Dest: 这种尴尬不会伤到我的，主人，不过也许替我难过的另有其人哦。

String.Source: Do you think you might wear one of these amulets again?
String.Dest: 你觉得这些项链以后还会戴吗？

String.Source: Interested in me, are you?
String.Dest: 你对我有兴趣，没错吧？

String.Source: I have not given up hope, you see, that someday, a dashing Prince will look past this medley of scars to see the real me.
String.Dest: 我没有放弃希望，要知道，总会有一天，一位英俊的王子会穿过这些表面的丑陋伤疤，看见内在真实的我。

String.Source: Then we must hurry to Riften, my lord. After all we have been through, I cannot wait a second longer to pledge my love to you.
String.Dest: 那咱就快快赶去裂谷城吧，我的大人。在一起这么久了，终于可以和你共誓真爱，我一秒钟都不想再等啦！

String.Source: Yes. Let's get married.
String.Dest: 是。我们结婚吧。

String.Source: An Amulet of Mara, hm? Careful. A girl might get the wrong idea.
String.Dest: An Amulet of Mara, hm? Careful. A girl might get the wrong idea.

String.Source: You must speak to a priest of Mara, my love, if we are to be married.
String.Dest: 要是我们结婚，亲爱的，你一定去找玛拉的祭司来做安排。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 哈啰。

String.Source: Hello.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: My Jarl, here is a gift for you. Just to show my appreciation.
String.Dest: 我的领主，有件礼物送你。略表我的感激之情。

String.Source: Guard yourself, my Jarl! Keep your hands up!
String.Dest: 防守好自己，我的领主！保持戒备！

String.Source: Drive that snowback to the ground!
String.Dest: 揍翻那个北方佬！

String.Source: Twelve septims on my hero!
String.Dest: 12枚金币赌我的英雄赢！

String.Source: Fight! Fight!
String.Dest: 打啊！打！

String.Source: Stick and move! Stick and move!
String.Dest: 坚持住！狠狠打！坚持住！狠狠打！

String.Source: Punch like they stole your boots!
String.Dest: 像对偷你靴子的贼一样狠狠地揍！

String.Source: Well, normally I would not be so cruel. But he did put me in a sack, and what's good for the horse is good for the horker.
String.Dest: 啊，我一般不会这么粗暴的。可他确实是把我装进过麻袋的，所以咱就男女平等一回吧。

String.Source: Now, that wasn't so hard, was it?
String.Dest: 现在感觉就没那么难了，是吧？

String.Source: Food, food, food! (Laughs) It is always about food with you, isn't it? You were friends once, right? Say something nice.
String.Dest: 食物，食物，食物！（笑）你说啥都是三句不离食物的吗？你们是老朋友对吧？聊点有品位的吧。

String.Source: I know that cave! It's just north of Zora's field! I should have figured it would be close by.
String.Dest: 我知道那个山洞！它就在佐拉田园北边！我早该知道它就在附近的。

String.Source: (Laughs) But you like blood, and you hate wine.
String.Dest: （笑）但你喜欢喝血，而讨厌酒。

String.Source: Well, I remember waking up in a sack, and hearing your Khajiit friend arguing with someone over price.
String.Dest: 呃，我只记得自己在一条麻袋里醒来，听见的是你那虎人朋友在跟某人讨价还价。

String.Source: The other person asked how fresh the corpse was, and he said "Very fresh." Too fresh, apparently, seeing as I was still alive.
String.Dest: 另一个问这尸体有多新鲜，他说“相当新鲜。”那当然啦，太新鲜了，我根本就是活着的嘛。

String.Source: And you say I'm hard to understand...
String.Dest: 你又说我很难捉摸……

String.Source: And by the way, it is so typical of you to forget this Khajiit cannot be trusted. It must be because of the fur. You confused him with a kitten.
String.Dest: 另外提一句，你老是忘了这虎人是决不可信的。肯定是看他长得毛茸茸的，你就真把他当成温顺的小猫咪了吧。

String.Source: You wouldn't be the first.
String.Dest: 你不会成为第一个的。

String.Source: Oh no, I was in great peril, but then two legendary heroes swooped in and saved me. I am truly a lucky girl.
String.Dest: 哦不，当时我处于生死关头。可接着就有两位传奇般的英雄冲进来救了我。我真是个幸运天女啊。

String.Source: It would have been so much more disappointing to be the girl who saves herself.
String.Dest: 要是做女孩的还得靠自己自救才更失望到家呢。

String.Source: My hero! Gorr! I knew the two of you would come!
String.Dest: 我的英雄！戈尔！我就知道你俩一定会来的！

String.Source: Will I be begging you, or this small army you've brought with you? A girl shouldn't have to share.
String.Dest: 我是该求你，还是你带来的这群人呢？不应该跟别人分享一个姑娘。

String.Source: I will try and be as loud as ten men. I suspect Gorr will have little trouble doing the same.
String.Dest: 我会试着喊出顶上十个人的大嗓门。我怀疑让戈尔来喊会省劲得多。

String.Source: Then it's settled. The three of us will come to cheer you on.
String.Dest: 就这么定了。我们三个会给你欢呼加油哒。

String.Source: I for one would love to come! An underground Arena match! This sounds exciting, my heroes!
String.Dest: 比如我就很乐意去！这是地下竞技场比赛耶！听起来激情澎湃呀，我的英雄们！

String.Source: Well, that depends on what they are bribing me with. A beautiful dress might be worth losing an arm for.
String.Dest: 嗯，那取决于他们用什么贿赂我。一件漂亮的衣服也许值得换我一把武器。

String.Source: I wouldn't even mind if they stared, because it would be for the right reasons.
String.Dest: 我甚至不再介意他们有没有看我，因为他们自有他们的原因。

String.Source: I am. When my hero allows it.
String.Dest: 我。要是我家英雄允许的话。

String.Source: Well, the person I talked to was headed toward Whiterun.
String.Dest: 那个，刚刚跟我说话那人朝雪漫城去了。

String.Source: I thought about following him, as he was very suspicious, but then Hjoromir came yelling up behind him asking if he wanted his robes washed.
String.Dest: 我是想去盯着他的，因为他确实形迹可疑，可当时肖罗密尔跑他身后大声问他需不需要帮忙洗衣服。

String.Source: Why do you think it was a setup? Wouldn't they want a famous Gladiator to be part of their Arena?
String.Dest: 为什么你觉得这是个圈套？难道他们不想要一个着名的角斗士成为他们竞技场的一部分吗？

String.Source: That's it! He kept calling you a pit dog. Which doesn't make much sense. If anything, you're a horker.
String.Dest: 就是这样！他一直管你叫斗犬。这却没啥意义。比起斗犬，你更相当于是只三牙海象。

String.Source: Of course. Although this one Khajiit wouldn't call you by name. He kept calling you...oh, I forget. It was something furry.
String.Dest: 当然。尽管这位虎人从不叫你大名。而是一直称你为……呃，我忘了。反正是个毛茸茸的东西啦。

String.Source: See? Riverwood is far more lively with you around. Everyone still asks about you. Even people from out of town.
String.Dest: 看见了吗？溪木镇有你在就比平时活跃多啦。每个人都会谈起你。包括从别处来的游客。

String.Source: It's good to see you too Gorr. The Sleeping Giant is not the same without you there to wake it up.
String.Dest: 见到你我也很高兴，戈尔。这沉睡巨人缺了你就完全醒不来的啊。

String.Source: I've always wondered what it would be like to fight in an Arena. I can just imagine the roar of the crowd, and the adoring fans...
String.Dest: 我一直很向往在竞技场里战斗会是怎样的感觉。我能想象的只有喧闹的人群，还有欢呼的粉丝们……

String.Source: So...what was it like to be back in the Arena?
String.Dest: 那……当年在竞技场时是什么样的感觉呢？

String.Source: What do you think we should do with our Khajiit friend? Lock him up? Sell him to vampires?
String.Dest: 你觉得咱应该怎么处理这位虎人朋友？把他关起来呢？还是卖给吸血鬼？

String.Source: It's a long way down, but I don't mind jumping. Knowing me, it won't be the fall that kills me. I'll probably hit my head a few times on the way.
String.Dest: 下面可真够深的, 但我不介意跳。要知道，我下去肯定不是摔死的，大概是半路磕了几下脑袋的事。

String.Source: Be careful. These Draugr like to play dead. Maybe we should poke it just in case.
String.Dest: Be careful. These Draugr like to play dead. Maybe we should poke it just in case.

String.Source: A master vampire! Now I remember why this place is called Shriekwind Bastion.
String.Dest: 大师级吸血鬼！我刚想起来这里为什么叫“尖叫的风之堡”啦

String.Source: They say the first vampire was born here, and her shrieks of pain still echo through these halls.
String.Dest: 据说这儿是史上第一只吸血鬼诞生的地方，她那凌厉的尖叫仿佛还在这大厅中回荡呢。

String.Source: That's a long way down, but I don't mind jumping. Knowing me, it won't be the fall that kills me. I'll probably hit my head a few times on the way.
String.Dest: 下面可真够深的, 但我不介意跳。要知道，我下去肯定不是摔死的，大概是半路磕了几下脑袋的事。

String.Source: I think, and this is just a guess, that for every four Draugr I attack, one of them is actually alive.
String.Dest: 我觉得吧，只是猜测啊，就是说我打的那些尸鬼，每四只就有一只其实是活人。

String.Source: Look at these towers! They must mark the border between Falkreath and the Rift. Of course, you can also tell by the snow.
String.Dest: 瞧瞧这些塔楼！它们肯定是用来标识佛克瑞斯和裂谷城领地的边界的。当然，你从雪地上也能看得出来。

String.Source: If we lay on our stomachs, maybe we can crawl under those blades. And if not, at least we'll be lying down.
String.Dest: 如果咱们趴在地上，也许能从那些刀片底下爬过去。要是不成功，至少咱都还是趴着的。

String.Source: Careful. I don't like the looks of this place.
String.Dest: 当心点。我觉得这个地方不妙。

String.Source: I can't believe that adventurer just left. That spider was no bigger than a mudcrab. So what if it knew magic?
String.Dest: 我不敢相信那个冒险者就这么跑了。那蜘蛛也没比泥沼蟹大到哪去。那要是它会魔法呢？

String.Source: Oh good, a shrine! It's like taking a bath, and after crawling through this dungeon, I think we both need one.
String.Dest: 噢太好了，一个祭坛！就像澡盆一样，尤其是刚在地牢摸爬出来，我觉得咱俩都有这需要。

String.Source: A pie and a sweetroll before bedtime! This wizard really did have a sweet tooth. Well, back when he was alive, anyway.
String.Dest: 每天睡前一个馅饼和甜甜圈！这术士还真爱吃甜食呀。呃，好吧，在他活着的时候，肯定是。

String.Source: By the Divines, that Breton on the table, they took out his heart! But I guess they were going to give him a new one anyway.
String.Dest: 我的天呐，看台子上那个布莱顿人，他们居然把心脏挖出去了！不过我猜是打算给他换个新的吧。

String.Source: Meridia wasn't lying. Look at those corpses. We should be careful, my hero, so we don't end up the same.
String.Dest: 美瑞蒂亚没有撒谎。看看那些尸体。咱们也得小心点儿，我的英雄，免得落得同样的下场。

String.Source: That must be the beacon. That beam looks hot enough to burn.
String.Dest: 一定是那座灯塔。这光芒看起来热得都要烧着了。

String.Source: This is it my champion. Malkoran and his shade are on the other side of this door. Let's make sure we're ready.
String.Dest: 就是这儿了我的勇士。【莫克然和他的阴影就在门的对面。最后确认一下咱们准备好啦。

String.Source: Lorkhan's heart! What is that magic? It almost looks like there's a person inside. This is troubling, my champion.
String.Dest: 洛克汗之心！那是什么魔法？看起来仿佛有个人在里面。这可真是麻烦呐，我的勇士。

String.Source: Whatever you do my hero, do not look down.
String.Dest: 不管你在干什么，我的英雄，别往下看。

String.Source: So much orichalcum in this mine. I wonder, do Orcs like it because it's green? It just seems like too much of a coincidence.
String.Dest: 这里好多的“兽人矿石”啊。我琢磨着……兽人是不是因为它是绿色才喜欢它？它看上去真不只是巧合而已。

String.Source: The White River really is beautiful, isn't it. Sometimes you don't appreciate it until you're this high up.
String.Dest: 白河真的很美，是吧？有时候你没法感受，除非爬到这样的高处来看。

String.Source: Mara's Eye...this wall is humongous! We have to be careful when climbing it. It looks like there are skeleton archers on every floor.
String.Dest: 玛拉之眼……好大的城墙。咱们爬上去的话最好小心点。貌似每层都有骷髅弓箭手呢。

String.Source: It's said that the city guard must light these lanterns every night to guide travelers back to Solitude.
String.Dest: 听说每晚都有守城卫兵奉命点亮路灯引导旅者们回到独孤城。

String.Source: But there is a story of a night when the lanterns were not lit, and a peddler lost his way and drowned in the ocean.
String.Dest: 可是有故事说某天晚上灯没有亮，有个商人就迷了路然后掉进海里淹死了。

String.Source: And since that day the lanterns have always been lit, but not by the city guard. They say it is the ghost of the peddler who fills the oil.
String.Dest: 从那时起所有的路灯就一直是亮的了，但据说不是由守卫点亮，而是那个商人的鬼魂一直在给灯续油。

String.Source: More barrels! This bandit looks like he was building a fort. My sister and I used to the same, but we were eight.
String.Dest: 又是这么多桶！这些强盗打算盖个城堡吗？我和我姐姐也盖过，可那是我们8岁的时候。

String.Source: Targets, arrows, blood, and skooma. I don't suppose a bandit tried to shoot the target, and shot off his friend's hand by mistake?
String.Dest: 靶子，箭，血，斯库玛……我不想说可能是一个强盗本来在练箭，结果不小心射穿了他哥们儿的手掌？

String.Source: Sometimes it's very hard to piece these stories together.
String.Dest: 有时候你真的很难把这些零碎的事件串起来啊。

String.Source: The Dwarves were no stranger to torture. But to make a show of it...I can almost hear the crowd jeering at the people who walked these steps.
String.Dest: The Dwarves were no stranger to torture. But to make a show of it...I can almost hear the crowd jeering at the people who walked these steps.

String.Source: Whoever sat on this throne must have been of poor health. And also very picky. Who drinks potions out of a goblet?
String.Dest: Whoever sat on this throne must have been of poor health. And also very picky. Who drinks potions out of a goblet?

String.Source: I can't believe they turned the dining area into an enchanting table. These hags could learn a thing or two about decorating.
String.Dest: I can't believe they turned the dining area into an enchanting table. These hags could learn a thing or two about decorating.

String.Source: Strange things can happen in these old ruins. Most times they happen in your head. I wonder if this Khajiit is suffering the same.
String.Dest: Strange things can happen in these old ruins. Most times they happen in your head. I wonder if this Khajiit is suffering the same.

String.Source: Yes, truly. Although it will still pale in comparison to Zora's field.
String.Dest: 是啊，的确。虽然它与佐拉的田园比起来还是相形见绌。

String.Source: I'll chop you into scraps, machine!
String.Dest: I'll chop you into scraps, machine!

String.Source: Over here, you metal beast!
String.Dest: Over here, you metal beast!

String.Source: Ugh! These crawlies are everywhere!
String.Dest: Ugh! These crawlies are everywhere!

String.Source: Stupid spiders!
String.Dest: Stupid spiders!

String.Source: I'll skin you alive, wolf!
String.Dest: I'll skin you alive, wolf!

String.Source: You fight as bad as you smell, troll!
String.Dest: You fight as bad as you smell, troll!

String.Source: Damn you, troll!
String.Dest: Damn you, troll!

String.Source: Watch out for their bite!
String.Dest: Watch out for their bite!

String.Source: This is the end, Falmer!
String.Dest: This is the end, Falmer!

String.Source: Have a bite of my steel, chaurus!
String.Dest: Have a bite of my steel, chaurus!

String.Source: I'm gonna crush you, bug!
String.Dest: I'm gonna crush you, bug!

String.Source: Come on, little goblin, let's go!
String.Dest: Come on, little goblin, let's go!

String.Source: Just try and hit me you overgrown ape!
String.Dest: Just try and hit me you overgrown ape!

String.Source: You won't put me in a cage, warlock!
String.Dest: You won't put me in a cage, warlock!

String.Source: Warlock! Ignore the summoner! Focus on the mage!
String.Dest: Warlock! Ignore the summoner! Focus on the mage!

String.Source: Damn rebels!
String.Dest: 该死的叛军。

String.Source: Just a scratch!
String.Dest: 你那是挠痒痒！

String.Source: Come on, is that all you've got?
String.Dest: 来呀来呀，就这点本事吗？

String.Source: Do your worst!
String.Dest: 你这样还不够看！

String.Source: Do your worst!
String.Dest: 你这样还不够看！

String.Source: Is that all you've got?
String.Dest: 你就只有这点本事？

String.Source: You haven't won yet!
String.Dest: 你不会赢的！

String.Source: Lucky hit!
String.Dest: 侥幸而已！

String.Source: That the best you can do?
String.Dest: 这就是你的极限了吗？

String.Source: Agh!
String.Dest: 啊！

String.Source: Agh! Enough! This ends now!
String.Dest: 噢！够了！一切都完了

String.Source: Ugh, you fiend!
String.Dest: 呃啊，你这恶魔！

String.Source: Like the pinch of a mudcrab!
String.Dest: 就像一只跳蚤咬的!

String.Source: Eeeeyyargh!
String.Dest: 耶呀！

String.Source: Eyaargh!
String.Dest: 哎呀！

String.Source: Stand still, damnit!
String.Dest: 站住，该死的！

String.Source: Die, damn you!
String.Dest: 去死吧，混蛋！

String.Source: You're nothing!
String.Dest: 你这无名的蝼蚁之辈！

String.Source: You're nothing!
String.Dest: You're nothing!

String.Source: Give up while you still can!
String.Dest: 趁你还有命的时候，投降吧！

String.Source: I've had enough of you!
String.Dest: 我受够你了！

String.Source: Die, witch!
String.Dest: 死吧，女巫！

String.Source: Now you'll pay!
String.Dest: 付出代价吧！

String.Source: You picked the wrong dinner, animal!
String.Dest: 你选错了晚餐，畜生！

String.Source: How about a shave, werewolf!
String.Dest: 来剃个毛怎样啊，狼人！

String.Source: Filthy Forsworn!
String.Dest: 肮脏的弃誓者！

String.Source: Why don't you lie back down, Draugr!
String.Dest: 你怎么不赶紧死回去，尸鬼！

String.Source: Go back to where you came from, dragon!
String.Dest: 巨龙，滚回你来的地方。

String.Source: Some legend you are!
String.Dest: 你只不过会夸夸其谈而已！

String.Source: Time to end this!
String.Dest: 是时候结束这一切了！

String.Source: I bet that hurt!
String.Dest: 我打赌那一下儿超疼！

String.Source: For Riverwood!
String.Dest: 以溪木镇之名！

String.Source: You're outmatched!
String.Dest: 你输了！

String.Source: You won't get away!
String.Dest: 你跑不了！

String.Source: Eyargh!
String.Dest: 咿呀！

String.Source: Is this what you want?
String.Dest: 想尝尝这招吗？

String.Source: Take that, you fiend!
String.Dest: 接招吧，你这恶魔！

String.Source: I'll have your head!
String.Dest: 我要取你的首级！

String.Source: You're going to look good mounted on my wall!
String.Dest: 你的脑袋会成为我的收藏品！

String.Source: Yield or die!
String.Dest: 投降或着去死吧！

String.Source: I'll cut right through your scales, monster!
String.Dest: 我能连你的鳞片都一刀切了，怪物！

String.Source: Say hello to Ysmir for me, Nord!
String.Dest: 帮我向伊斯米尔问个好，诺德佬！

String.Source: Think you can take me, Orc?
String.Dest: 你觉得你能搞定我么，兽人？

String.Source: I will cut off your tail, cat!
String.Dest: 我会把你的尾巴给砍下来的，你这只死猫！

String.Source: For Kodlak!
String.Dest: 为了克拉科！

String.Source: I'll take that head, if you don't mind!
String.Dest: 我要拿走那个脑袋，你不介意的话！

String.Source: For the Companions!
String.Dest: 为了同伴！

String.Source: Be a good corpse and die already!
String.Dest: 乖乖地做你的尸体吧！

String.Source: I won't be bested, dragon!
String.Dest: 你打不败我的，死龙！

String.Source: Size isn't everything, Giant!
String.Dest: 身高不能决定一切，笨巨人！

String.Source: Down here, Giant!
String.Dest: Down here, Giant!

String.Source: I'm stronger than I look, beast!
String.Dest: 别小看我啦，怪物！

String.Source: Die, troll!
String.Dest: 去死吧，巨魔！

String.Source: I'm sorry, but this is the end of you!
String.Dest: 抱歉了啊，今天就是你的末日啦！

String.Source: I am stronger than I look!
String.Dest: 我可比看上去要厉害多啦！

String.Source: Enjoy your last breath!
String.Dest: 享受你最后一口气吧。

String.Source: I can take you!
String.Dest: 你完了！

String.Source: Why won't you die already!
String.Dest: 你怎么还没死！

String.Source: Yield while you have the chance!
String.Dest: 趁你还有命赶紧投降！

String.Source: I'm sorry, Joselyn.
String.Dest: 真对不起，约瑟琳。

String.Source: Mercy!
String.Dest: 饶命啊！我祈求你的怜悯

String.Source: You win! I submit!
String.Dest: 你赢了！我认输！

String.Source: Gyaaargh!
String.Dest: 呀啊啊啊啊！

String.Source: You need to do better than that!
String.Dest: 你需要做得更好！

String.Source: Is that it? Is that your best?
String.Dest: 就这？你就这点能耐？

String.Source: Not quite good enough!
String.Dest: 还不够好！

String.Source: Agh!
String.Dest: 啊！

String.Source: Easily blocked!
String.Dest: 很容易堵住！

String.Source: Come on, is that all you've got?
String.Dest: 来呀来呀，就这点本事吗？

String.Source: (Laughs) Of course.
String.Dest: （笑）那是当然。

String.Source: Oh, I see.
String.Dest: 噢，知道了。

String.Source: Oh, you want me to show you how to do up your face! Oh, but I'd love to!
String.Dest: 哦，你想让我【在你的脸上演示一下！噢，我很乐意！

String.Source: You look like you want to ask me something, Olette.
String.Dest: 你好像有什么事要问我，欧列特。

String.Source: I get that he's a necromancer, but what do you mean you never saw eye to eye?
String.Dest: 我知道他是个亡灵术士啊，不过你说你们的观点从来没有一样过是什么意思？

String.Source: Since we're here, my Thane, I hope you don't mind if I order something.
String.Dest: Since we're here, my Thane, I hope you don't mind if I order something.

String.Source: I think it's time for a drink. Let's see if this innkeeper won't give us a discount.
String.Dest: I think it's time for a drink. Let's see if this innkeeper won't give us a discount.

String.Source: All right, let's see if they serve anything fresh.
String.Dest: All right, let's see if they serve anything fresh.

String.Source: This inn looks comfortable.
String.Dest: This inn looks comfortable.

String.Source: So you'll come out of the cage?
String.Dest: 那你是打算从笼子里出来吗？

String.Source: Maybe. I'd grown quite fond of it. The iron bars, the pattern of squares, and...well, I guess that's it.
String.Dest: Maybe. I'd grown quite fond of it. The iron bars, the pattern of squares, and...well, I guess that's it.

String.Source: So you'll come out of the cage?
String.Dest: 那你是打算从笼子里出来吗？

String.Source: But I do like squares.
String.Dest: But I do like squares.

String.Source: Have fun in your next life as a meat puppet, then.
String.Dest: 那就祝你下辈子愉快地做个人肉玩偶吧。

String.Source: Meat puppet? Is that your way of calling me fat? I suppose "bone puppet" is just as insulting. Just "puppet" will do, thank you.
String.Dest: Meat puppet? Is that your way of calling me fat? I suppose "bone puppet" is just as insulting. Just "puppet" will do, thank you.

String.Source: The skald at this inn has a very rough voice, much different from that of Sven. Which do you prefer?
String.Dest: 这家旅店的吟游诗人嗓子真粗哑，跟斯万的感觉完全不同。你更喜欢哪种呢？

String.Source: (Silver-Blood Inn) Something on your mind?
String.Dest: （银血旅店）你有心事？

String.Source: That what? I'm comfortable fighting in my own skin? That's rather intuitive of you, my hero.
String.Dest: 什么？说我在战斗中划水？那可就太主观啦，英雄。

String.Source: Perhaps it's symbolic more than anything.
String.Dest: 也许它的象征意义才是最主要的。

String.Source: But it would be rather silly not to cast my strongest spell for such a reason.
String.Dest: 可要是这种情况我都不用最强魔法也太傻了吧。

String.Source: Perhaps it's symbolic more than anything.
String.Dest: 也许它的象征意义才是最主要的。

String.Source: At least, when I'm alone. Perhaps that means I'm only comfortable around you.
String.Dest: 至少，在我独处的时候是。大概那也意味着只有在你身边我才会觉得踏实吧。

String.Source: Perhaps it's symbolic more than anything.
String.Dest: 也许它的象征意义才是最主要的。

String.Source: Oh, but that would be make far too much of our relationship.
String.Dest: 噢，不过那样恐怕超出我们的关系太多了吧。

String.Source: Perhaps it's symbolic more than anything.
String.Dest: 也许它的象征意义才是最主要的。

String.Source: Eleven times? You can't be serious.
String.Dest: 十一次？你开玩笑吧。

String.Source: Oh I am. I do enjoy it. There's never a shortage of wizards who like to use this pass as their lair. Nor a shortage of heroes who travel through it.
String.Dest: 喔是真的。我超爱这个的。这条通路从来不缺巫师来筑巢，也不缺英雄来路过。

String.Source: Eleven times? You can't be serious.
String.Dest: 十一次？你开玩笑吧。

String.Source: Oh I am. I do enjoy it. There's never a shortage of wizards who like to use this pass as their lair. Nor a shortage of heroes who travel through it.
String.Dest: 喔是真的。我超爱这个的。这条通路从来不缺巫师来筑巢，也不缺英雄来路过。

String.Source: Clearly you are suffering from some sort of mental illness.
String.Dest: 很明显你为某些精神疾病所困扰着。

String.Source: (Laughs) No, it's probably just fatigue. But I am sure there are things to come that will make me disbelieve again.
String.Dest: （笑）不，也许只是疲倦而已。但我敢肯定还会发生别的事来让我找回那种怀疑的。

String.Source: No, my liege. Should I? Like I said, at this point, my mind is a ball of yarn.
String.Dest: 没啊，我的主人，我该有啥想法吗？我是说，现在的我，脑子里就是一团浆糊。

String.Source: Aren't you the least bit curious about this Elder Scroll?
String.Dest: 难道你对这个上古卷轴没有半点好奇吗？

String.Source: You could tell me the Elder Scroll was written by my sister and I would just nod my head.
String.Dest: 你干脆跟我说这上古卷轴是我姐写的我就点头同意啦。

String.Source: Aren't you the least bit curious about this Elder Scroll?
String.Dest: 难道你对这个上古卷轴没有半点好奇吗？

String.Source: No, my liege. Should I? Like I said, at this point, my mind is a ball of yarn.
String.Dest: 没啊，我的主人，我该有啥想法吗？我是说，现在的我，脑子里就是一团浆糊。

String.Source: So you have no opinion on the Greybeards being led by a dragon?
String.Dest: 这么说你对那些以听命于龙的灰胡子们没啥意见？

String.Source: So you have no opinion on the Greybeards being led by a dragon?
String.Dest: 这么说你对那些以听命于龙的灰胡子们没啥意见？

String.Source: You could tell me Paarthunax was a flying wedge of cheese and I would just nod my head.
String.Dest: 就算你告诉我帕图纳克斯是一块会飞的奶酪我也会点头同意的。

String.Source: And your jaw would touch your toes.
String.Dest: 然后你的嘴就张得下巴都掉到脚面了。

String.Source: (Laughs) That would be rather unfortunate. People might mistake me for a cave. And what if you dropped the Elder Scroll inside?
String.Dest: （笑）真有够倒霉的啦。别人会误以为我是个山洞呢。要是你把上古卷轴掉进里面怎么办？

String.Source: And your jaw would touch your toes.
String.Dest: 然后你的嘴就张得下巴都掉到脚面了。

String.Source: I don't want to even think about what comes after.
String.Dest: 我简直不敢想像之后会发生什么。

String.Source: You are too sweet. And very generous. But hopefully we will keep the surprises to a minimum so we don't have to find out.
String.Dest: 你可真贴心，真有人情味呢。不过但愿咱们把惊喜什么的减到最低免得到时候被吓一跳吧。

String.Source: I'm sure you would still be beautiful.
String.Dest: 你肯定还是一样美。

String.Source: Where were you headed when you were captured?
String.Dest: 你被抓住的时候本来是要去哪？

String.Source: I was on my way north to the icy tundra. It's quite vast, quite icy, and extremely dull. Which is precisely why I visit it.
String.Dest: I was on my way north to the icy tundra. It's quite vast, quite icy, and extremely dull. Which is precisely why I visit it.

String.Source: Some people look at a blank portrait and see only emptiness. I see an opportunity to paint.
String.Dest: Some people look at a blank portrait and see only emptiness. I see an opportunity to paint.

String.Source: Where were you headed when you were captured?
String.Dest: 你被抓住的时候本来是要去哪？

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: Imagine a vast field of pure white, soft as a pillow wrapped in a cloud. From a distance, you might think it snow.
String.Dest: 想象一片纯白的广阔田野，柔软得像云做的枕头。从远处看起来，会让人以为是雪。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: Yet when you come to the lip of its feathery shore, and run your fingers through crowns of ivory, you'll know you'll have arrived in Whiterun.
String.Dest: 而等你到达那柔美海滨的边缘，手指穿过象牙色皇冠，你就知道自己已经进入了雪漫领地。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: Home of Tamriel's most beautiful, and profitable, tundra cotton field. Zora's field, as it's known to the locals.
String.Dest: 塔姆瑞尔大陆最美丽、最肥沃的苔原棉地之家。佐拉的田园，是当地一景呢。

String.Source: What do you mean?
String.Dest: 你是什么意思？

String.Source: My liege, I think I am passed a state of disbelief. If my eyelids opened any wider, they would be somewhere in the back of my head.
String.Dest: 陛下，我觉得我已经过了怀疑状态的。如果我眼睛睁得再大一点，眼皮都开到脑袋后面去了。

String.Source: (Elder Knowledge) Dragons, Elder Scrolls...What do you think about all this?
String.Dest: （上古知识）龙，上古卷轴…这些东西你怎么看？

String.Source: No, keep doing what you're doing.
String.Dest: 不，继续做你手头的事就行。

String.Source: You don't think I should use more support magic? Maybe heal your wounds, or use a courage spell?
String.Dest: 你不觉得我该多玩些辅助魔法么？治疗你的伤口，或者给你来个勇气术？

String.Source: No, keep doing what you're doing.
String.Dest: 不，继续做你手头的事就行。

String.Source: Ah, but maybe then you'll have the courage to tell me to go away, and that is something we will both regret.
String.Dest: 啊，但或许到时你就能鼓起勇气叫我走开，然后咱们也都会后悔的。

String.Source: It's certainly possible, but I doubt it. I have never been all that close with Delphine, but she doesn't seem like a turncoat.
String.Dest: 当然有可能，但我不信。我跟戴尔芬走得是没那么近，但怎么看她都不是那种会背叛的人。

String.Source: I don't care who she says she is. Delphine cannot be trusted.
String.Dest: 不管她说自己是谁，戴尔芬决不可信！

String.Source: Of course, I am biased. We Riverwood folk love to poke fun at each other, but if an outsider tries to, we defend our own.
String.Dest: 当然，我是会有所偏向的。我们溪木镇的人喜欢戳对方痛处来开玩笑，但如果是外人这样做，我们还是会为自己人说话的。

String.Source: I don't care who she says she is. Delphine cannot be trusted.
String.Dest: 不管她说自己是谁，戴尔芬决不可信！

String.Source: Besides, if Delphine did decide to betray you, it's not as if my Jarl would not be able to handle it. So I'm not worried.
String.Dest: 而且，如果戴尔芬决定背叛你的话，好像领主大人也没啥办法，所以我就甭担心啦。

String.Source: I don't care who she says she is. Delphine cannot be trusted.
String.Dest: 不管她说自己是谁，戴尔芬决不可信！

String.Source: You must enjoy music.
String.Dest: 你一定要享受音乐。

String.Source: I enjoy listening to it. Singing, not so much. If I want to sing a melody, I have to make sure no one else is around.
String.Dest: 我很喜欢听。而让我唱的话，不是太乐意。要是我想唱什么调调，一定是找个没人的地儿。

String.Source: You must enjoy music.
String.Dest: 你一定要享受音乐。

String.Source: I don't want to get a bounty, or be accused of being a Dragonborn, when people start collapsing in agony.
String.Dest: 我可不想被领主悬赏，或者被指认为龙裔。在周围的人正抽搐着倒下的时候。

String.Source: (Riverwood) How's it feel to be back home?
String.Dest: （溪木镇）回家的感觉怎么样?

String.Source: Does this town look different at all to you?
String.Dest: 这小镇在你眼里有什么变化吗？

String.Source: You carry a large weapon for a girl your size.
String.Dest: 你这么小巧身材的姑娘背这武器也太大了。

String.Source: It's not just for show. Although the necromancers seem to think so. Nobody takes me seriously.
String.Dest: 那不只是好看而已。虽然似乎那些亡灵巫师是那么以为的。没人拿我说的话当真。

String.Source: You carry a large weapon for a girl your size.
String.Dest: 你这么小巧身材的姑娘背这武器也太大了。

String.Source: When my weapon of choice was an Amulet of Mara, then the boys were quite certain of my intentions. Even if that was just for show.
String.Dest: When my weapon of choice was an Amulet of Mara, then the boys were quite certain of my intentions. Even if that was just for show.

String.Source: You carry a large weapon for a girl your size.
String.Dest: 你这么小巧身材的姑娘背这武器也太大了。

String.Source: It took some time to get the hang of it. My body did pay quite a price for my lessons. I have more scars than skin now, I'm afraid.
String.Dest: It took some time to get the hang of it. My body did pay quite a price for my lessons. I have more scars than skin now, I'm afraid.

String.Source: Do you have a lot of experience with two-handed weapons?
String.Dest: 你玩双手武器的经验丰富吗？

String.Source: You carry a large weapon for a girl your size.
String.Dest: 你这么小巧身材的姑娘背这武器也太大了。

String.Source: Yet you'll find I'm a capable fighter, and if it's adventure you seek, my lord, I am but your humble servant.
String.Dest: Yet you'll find I'm a capable fighter, and if it's adventure you seek, my lord, I am but your humble servant.

String.Source: Do you have a lot of experience with two-handed weapons?
String.Dest: 你玩双手武器的经验丰富吗？

String.Source: You carry a large weapon for a girl your size.
String.Dest: 你这么小巧身材的姑娘背这武器也太大了。

String.Source: The Fjori to your Holgeir. The Eadwyre to your Barenziah. The housecarl to your Jarl.
String.Dest: The Fjori to your Holgeir. The Eadwyre to your Barenziah. The housecarl to your Jarl.

String.Source: Do you have a lot of experience with two-handed weapons?
String.Dest: 你玩双手武器的经验丰富吗？

String.Source: They will shout your name as well, Zora.
String.Dest: 他们也会喊出你的名字的，佐拉。

String.Source: (Laughs) For entirely different reasons, I'm sure. Something like "Fetch me a drink, Zora!" or "Cover your face, child!"
String.Dest: （笑）我敢肯定是出于完全不同的理由。比如说“帮我拿杯酒来，佐拉！”或者“把你的脸遮住，巧儿！”。

String.Source: Although there may be some in the far corners of the tavern, who whisper the name of Zora Fair-Child, faithful companion of the Dragonborn...
String.Dest: 不过还是会在酒馆的某些角落里，有人悄声谈论着佐拉．菲欧巧儿——那位龙裔的忠实伙伴的名字...

String.Source: They will shout your name as well, Zora.
String.Dest: 他们也会喊出你的名字的，佐拉。

String.Source: They will shout your name as well, Zora.
String.Dest: 他们也会喊出你的名字的，佐拉。

String.Source: But I won't hold it against them.
String.Dest: 但我也不会怪罪他们。

String.Source: (Laughs) My Jarl will not get me to say that. Such dirty talk would be unbecoming for a Lady of Riverwood.
String.Dest: （笑）就算领主逼我也绝不会那么说。这种脏话与一位溪木镇花根本不搭调。

String.Source: Make it play music? You blow horns, stupid. Horns are meant to be blown.
String.Dest: 用它演奏音乐？你要吹它，蠢货。号角是用来吹的。

String.Source: (Laughs) I hope not, for Delphine's sake. Remember, this is a mission of espionage, is it not? Or has my hero already forgotten.
String.Dest: （笑）我希望不会，戴尔芬保佑吧。记住啊，这是一项间谍任务，对吧？难道我家英雄已经给忘了？

String.Source: I doubt it. They'll all be too busy staring at me.
String.Dest: 我不相信，他们肯定都忙得没空看我呢。

String.Source: I think there's a Khajiit back at Fort Sungard who needs to die.
String.Dest: 我看森加德堡垒有一只虎人要死了。

String.Source: My champion is angry. Is it because you were worried about a certain damsel in distress?
String.Dest: 我的勇士发怒啦。是不是某个不幸的女孩的令你担忧了啊？

String.Source: I think there's a Khajiit back at Fort Sungard who needs to die.
String.Dest: 我看森加德堡垒有一只虎人要死了。

String.Source: That is very sweet. But yes, I suppose there is still a loose end that needs to be tied.
String.Dest: 那真是太好了。不过是的，我想最后还有个问题有待收尾。

String.Source: (Laughs) Yes, it seems our Khajiit friend is a shifty one. I hate judging people based on reputation, so I wanted to give him a chance.
String.Dest: （笑）好吧，看来我们的虎人朋友是个狡猾的家伙。我不喜欢基于名声去判断一个人，所以就给他个机会。

String.Source: Wait, so J'Sharr lied about the fight? I did not see that coming.
String.Dest: 等一下，杰夏尔对打架的事撒了谎？【我没看出来。

String.Source: Wait, so J'Sharr lied about the fight? I did not see that coming.
String.Dest: 等一下，杰夏尔对打架的事撒了谎？【我没看出来。

String.Source: Next time I will not hesitate to club him over the head.
String.Dest: 下次我就毫不犹豫地直接敲他脑袋了。

String.Source: I'm just glad you're safe, my love.
String.Dest: 很高兴看到你安全无恙，亲爱的。

String.Source: I am happy to see you safe as well, my husband. I am too young to be a widow. People would talk.
String.Dest: 看到你安然无恙我也很高兴啊亲爱的老公。我这个岁数守寡的话还太年轻。人家会说闲话呢。

String.Source: I'm just glad you're safe, my love.
String.Dest: 很高兴看到你安全无恙，亲爱的。

String.Source: And then to cheer me up they would try and introduce me to suitor after suitor, when all would pale in comparison to my love.
String.Dest: 然后就哄着我开心再把我介绍给一个又一个的对象，可他们跟我心爱的人比起来全都那么的苍白。

String.Source: I am happy to see you safe as well, my hero. Gorr is a fine friend, but sometimes I wonder if he is just a giant stomach wrapped in skin.
String.Dest: 看到你也安然无恙真是令我开心啊，英雄！戈尔是个好朋友，可有时候我会怀疑他肚子里装的是一副巨人的肠胃。

String.Source: I'm just glad you're safe, Zora.
String.Dest: 我很高兴你安然无恙，佐拉。

String.Source: And I say that with love. But it really is hard to have a conversation when half the topics are about food.
String.Dest: 我真是带着爱心说的。可是跟一个三句话不离食物的吃货简直没法谈哪。

String.Source: I'm just glad you're safe, Zora.
String.Dest: 我很高兴你安然无恙，佐拉。

String.Source: A sack is much worse than a cage. There aren't even holes in it.
String.Dest: 麻袋远不如笼子舒服，上面连个孔都没有。

String.Source: You took the words right out of my mouth. Although when I did wake up the first time, the Khajiit stabbed the sack to show I was dead.
String.Dest: 你真是说出了我的心里话！尽管当我第一次醒来的时候，那个虎人刺了刺装我的麻袋来表示我是死的。

String.Source: A sack is much worse than a cage. There aren't even holes in it.
String.Dest: 麻袋远不如笼子舒服，上面连个孔都没有。

String.Source: I think he was trying to warn me not to move, but he could've been trying to help me breathe.
String.Dest: 我想他是想警告我别动弹，但也可能是为了帮我通气的。

String.Source: A sack is much worse than a cage. There aren't even holes in it.
String.Dest: 麻袋远不如笼子舒服，上面连个孔都没有。

String.Source: With both of you alive, I will give him the benefit of doubt.
String.Dest: 既然你们两个都活着，我可以认为他是无辜的。

String.Source: So J'Sharr sold your body to necromancers, but kept you alive.
String.Dest: 所以杰夏尔把你的身体卖给了亡灵术士，却还让你活着。

String.Source: Is that what happened? Here I thought these men were fighting for my affections. Although it does explain the sack.
String.Dest: 是那么回事吗？我还以为那些男人是在为我争锋吃醋呢。虽然那样可以解释为啥要用麻袋。

String.Source: I am rather hurt. But as I have made a living out of disappointing necromancers, I suppose all's fair.
String.Dest: 好受伤啊。不过考虑到我这条命是从那群不争气的术士手里捡回来的，也算公平吧。

String.Source: So J'Sharr sold your body to necromancers, but kept you alive.
String.Dest: 所以杰夏尔把你的身体卖给了亡灵术士，却还让你活着。

String.Source: It was the kind of fur you cuddle. You can't cuddle a spider. I was thinking of a dog, but I can't remember what kind.
String.Dest: 你要抱的是那种毛茸茸的感觉。不能抱个蜘蛛哈。我说的是狗狗，不过想不起是什么品种啦。

String.Source: Spiders are furry, but they walk on eight legs.
String.Dest: 蜘蛛是毛茸茸的，不过它们用八条腿走路。

String.Source: He was obviously talking about the mighty wolf.
String.Dest: 他说的显然是那头强悍的狼。

String.Source: Maybe, but Gorr doesn't strike me as the werewolf type. Too many nails and not enough hammers. No, I think it was a type of dog.
String.Dest: 或许吧, 但是戈尔变成狼人时没有攻击我。流言蜚语总是盖过真相。不，我认为那只是某种狗。

String.Source: A brown bear. I do see the resemblance to Gorr.
String.Dest: 一头棕熊。真有戈尔的即视感。

String.Source: (Laughs) I do as well, but it was not such a large animal. It was a type of dog, but I can't recall what.
String.Dest: （笑）我也是，不过应该没那么大个，是一种狗差不多，不过我想不起来是哪种了。

String.Source: Well yes, but not just any dog. It was a very specific kind, but it didn't seem to suit Gorr.
String.Dest: 对啊，但不是一般的狗。是个非常特殊的种类，但似乎不适合戈尔。

String.Source: You mean like a dog?
String.Dest: 你是说像一条狗？

String.Source: Zora's Field can only be described as a hideous abomination.
String.Dest: 佐拉的田园只会被描写成可怕而令人憎恶的样子了。

String.Source: I think you are confusing Zora's field with a certain old goat who smells much better roasted.
String.Dest: 我想你是把佐拉的田园跟某只烤得喷香的老山羊弄混了吧。

String.Source: But I will forgive your mistake, if you plant a few cotton in honor of my sister.
String.Dest: 但我会原谅你的错误。如果你能去为我姐姐种一些棉花的话。

String.Source: Zora's Field can only be described as a hideous abomination.
String.Dest: 佐拉的田园只会被描写成可怕而令人憎恶的样子了。

String.Source: As beautiful as the girl who inspired it, Joselyn Fair-child. That is what they will say when it is complete.
String.Dest: 就像发明它的女孩一样美丽，约瑟琳·菲欧巧儿。等它完成了就会有人这样赞叹的。

String.Source: It was indeed beautiful.
String.Dest: 那时真的太美了。

String.Source: It was indeed beautiful.
String.Dest: 那时真的太美了。

String.Source: And it will not be ironic. Those days are long passed.
String.Dest: 以后也不会是讽刺啦。那些日子已经过去很久啦。

String.Source: You mean Joselyn's field.
String.Dest: 你是说约瑟琳的田园。

String.Source: Oh, it will always be for her, but that's our little secret. It will be Zora's field until it is ready. Which means I still have much to do.
String.Dest: 喔，那是永远属于她的，但那是我们之间的小秘密。在一切就绪之前暂且称之为佐拉的田园。所以我还有很多事要做呢。

String.Source: You mean Joselyn's field.
String.Dest: 你是说约瑟琳的田园。

String.Source: Let us hope this time I can make it through Brittleshin Pass without getting caught by a necromancer. If not, I'm sure my hero will come fetch me.
String.Dest: 希望咱们这次穿过布莱特辛山隘时我能躲过亡灵术士的魔爪。要是没成，相信我家英雄会来救我哒。

String.Source: Eh, it was alright.
String.Dest: 呃，没事的啦。

String.Source: (Laughs) Not easily impressed, are we? Well, that was just a sample. Wait until I am finished. All of Whiterun will be snowing cotton.
String.Dest: （笑）没那么神奇，是吧？哎，那只是个样品。等到一切完成吧。整个雪漫都会飘起棉雪花的。

String.Source: Actually, in my hands I would be tempted to find a way in, but if it's with you, I can always be close, even if I'm watching from afar.
String.Dest: 事实上，在我手里的话我会忍不住想办法进去的，而如果是你拿着，我就可以随时接近它，就算是从远处观望也没问题。

String.Source: Here. Take the crystal. Keep your sister close.
String.Dest: 来，拿着这水晶。别离你姐姐太远。

String.Source: So if you would do me that favor and keep it safe, I would be forever grateful.
String.Dest: 所以要是你能帮我保证它的安全，我会永远感激的。

String.Source: Here. Take the crystal. Keep your sister close.
String.Dest: 来，拿着这水晶。别离你姐姐太远。

String.Source: I will do the same with the memories from today. Zora's field was beautiful, wasn't it?
String.Dest: 我对今天留下的回忆也是一样。佐拉的田园真的很美，对吧？

String.Source: Here. Take the crystal. Keep your sister close.
String.Dest: 来，拿着这水晶。别离你姐姐太远。

String.Source: Yes, I do not like judging people by the first impression. But Marigoth was on her twentieth and nothing seemed to change.
String.Dest: 是的，我不喜欢用第一印象判断人。但那时的玛丽葛斯是二十岁而看起来一点都没变。

String.Source: At least neither of you have to worry about Marigoth.
String.Dest: 至少你们两个都不用去担心玛丽葛斯。

String.Source: It was a perfect end to a wonderful day. Zora's field was beautiful, wasn't it?
String.Dest: 对于一个好日子而言那就是完美落幕。佐拉的田园美极了，没错吧？

String.Source: At least neither of you have to worry about Marigoth.
String.Dest: 至少你们两个都不用去担心玛丽葛斯。

String.Source: Not at all. I am envious. I wish I had your restraint, and your honor.
String.Dest: 一点都不。我羡慕死了。我也想要有你的束缚，和你的荣耀。

String.Source: Are you mad I let Marigoth live?
String.Dest: 我留了玛丽葛斯的活口让你生气了吗？

String.Source: I am just happy to have saved my sister, and I will always remember this day fondly. Zora's field was beautiful, wasn't it?
String.Dest: 我真的很高兴能救出姐姐，我会永远记住这个日子。佐拉的田园真的很美，对吧？

String.Source: Are you mad I let Marigoth live?
String.Dest: 我留了玛丽葛斯的活口让你生气了吗？

String.Source: (Laughs) Then that means I have room to grow. As a reward for helping my sister, I vow to someday be worthy of your appraisal.
String.Dest: （笑）那意味着我有成长的空间。作为帮助我姐姐的奖励，我发誓总有一天会配得上你的评价。

String.Source: You're not so bad yourself. Not great, but not bad either.
String.Dest: 你这个人也不是那么坏。不高尚，但也没什么坏心眼。

String.Source: I seem to have misjudged you again. I liked you when you were wealthy, but not greedy.
String.Dest: 看来我又误会你了。我喜欢的是你的富有，而不是贪婪。

String.Source: Real friends reward each other with gold.
String.Dest: 真正的朋友是用金子回报对方的。

String.Source: But if that is all you came here for, then here. This is what I have.
String.Dest: 但要是你来这里只为这事的话，那给你吧。我只有这个了。

String.Source: Real friends reward each other with gold.
String.Dest: 真正的朋友是用金子回报对方的。

String.Source: My Prince is so romantic! Perhaps there will be more time for that later. I will do my best to make it.
String.Dest: 我的王子好浪漫啊！也许将来有时间再说吧。我要尽全力把这事办成.

String.Source: Anything for you, Zora.
String.Dest: 只要为了你，什么都可以，佐拉。

String.Source: Anything for you, Zora.
String.Dest: 只要为了你，什么都可以，佐拉。

String.Source: For now, my thoughts are with my sister.
String.Dest: 而现在，我的心思全都在姐姐身上。

String.Source: My Princess is very kind! Now I have two sisters whom I love, and will always cherish.
String.Dest: 我的公主真的好善良！这样一来我就有两个可爱的姐姐了，我会永远珍惜的。

String.Source: Anything for you, Zora.
String.Dest: 只要为了你，什么都可以，佐拉。

String.Source: Are you sad to let your sister go?
String.Dest: 让你姐姐离开，你难过了吗？

String.Source: Yes, but it had to be done. And I hope that one day, she'll find the courage to leave that day behind. To leave them all behind.
String.Dest: 没错，但没有别的选择。而我希望有一天，她能鼓起勇气放下那天的记忆。放下一切。

String.Source: So what will you and Joselyn do now?
String.Dest: 那么现在你和约瑟琳要干点啥？

String.Source: First, we will go home to Riverwood. Then, who knows? Gossiping, bickering, throwing dinnerware...all the stuff sisters do.
String.Dest: 首先，我们得回溪木镇。然后，谁知道呢？闲聊，扯皮，拿餐具打架……都是姐俩爱玩的游戏。

String.Source: She probably had a good reason.
String.Dest: 也许她有正当的理由吧。

String.Source: A very good one. Joselyn does not act impulsively. She is a quiet woman, and if she stole something, it must have been urgent.
String.Dest: 有道理。约瑟琳不会冲动行事。她是个挺安静的女人，就算她偷了什么，也一定是因为有什么紧急情况。

String.Source: (Laughs) Right, leave it to my savior to put things into perspective.
String.Dest: （笑）对啊，还是留给我家大救星来全面考虑清楚吧。

String.Source: A creepy old witch is not the most reliable source of information.
String.Dest: 一个诡异的老巫婆不太会是可靠的信息来源吧。

String.Source: Yes, we should only trust her as far as we can throw her, and my arms are quite tired.
String.Dest: 是啊，至少在咱们可以扔下她之前只能相信她。而且我的手臂已经很累啦。

String.Source: A creepy old witch is not the most reliable source of information.
String.Dest: 一个诡异的老巫婆不太会是可靠的信息来源吧。

String.Source: It's possible she's changed.
String.Dest: 很可能她已经变了一个人呢。

String.Source: True, but this is more than stealing. It's almost reckless. The sister I knew was never so bold. Come, we can learn more from the old lady.
String.Dest: 当然，但这就不仅是偷窃。简直胆大妄为了。我所知道的姐姐从没有如此莽撞。来吧，咱先从老太太这儿多了解下情况。

String.Source: I...I can't. Joselyn and I have made mistakes, but I'm tired of hiding from them. I want to face them. Together.
String.Dest: 我……我不能。约瑟琳和我都犯了错误，但是我已经厌倦了永无止境的躲避。我想面对所有错误。一起解决。

String.Source: The two of you can stay for all I care. Just get me out this nightmare.
String.Dest: 你们俩想留在这儿请便吧。赶紧让我离开这个噩梦啊。

String.Source: Just...give me a moment to talk to her. Don't worry, we'll be home soon enough.
String.Dest: 先……给我点时间跟她说说话。别担心，咱们很快就能回家。

String.Source: The two of you can stay for all I care. Just get me out this nightmare.
String.Dest: 你们俩想留在这儿请便吧。赶紧让我离开这个噩梦啊。

String.Source: Let her stay. That's what she wants.
String.Dest: 让她留下吧，那是她的意愿。

String.Source: I...I don't know. Is that what's best for her? Is that what she wants? Are they the same thing?
String.Dest: 我……我不知道。那算是最适合她的选择吗？还是她一直想要的？二者是一回事吗？

String.Source: Let her stay. That's what she wants.
String.Dest: 让她留下吧，那是她的意愿。

String.Source: Maybe you're right. This isn't about me. It's about her peace of mind. Just...give me a moment to say goodbye.
String.Dest: 也许你是对的。这不是我的事。这是关于她内心深处的宁静。只是……给我点时间道别吧。

String.Source: Zora...this place...we can't stay here.
String.Dest: 佐拉......这地方......我们不能呆在这儿。

String.Source: I know. As much as it hurts me to say this, none of this is real. Just...give me a moment to talk to her.
String.Dest: 我明白。虽然说这样的话我会心痛，但这一切都不是真实的。只是……给我点时间和她说说话吧。

String.Source: How do we know the witch won't try to kill us?
String.Dest: 谁知道这女巫会不会试图杀死咱们？

String.Source: I...I had not thought of that. She said saving Joselyn would be dangerous, and she could very well attack us the first chance she gets.
String.Dest: 我……我没想到。她说过会在去救约瑟琳是会很危险，而她也是很可能在第一时间攻击我们的。

String.Source: How do we know the witch won't try to kill us?
String.Dest: 谁知道这女巫会不会试图杀死咱们？

String.Source: I would not want to leave my hero defenseless. Once Joselyn is safe and I am sure we don't need her, perhaps I can give you a sign of some sort.
String.Dest: 我不打算把我家英雄无依一个人丢在那儿。只要约瑟琳安全并且确定咱们不需要她，我就想办法给你个暗号。

String.Source: How about if I scratch my ear? No...it might actually be itchy. How about if I say..."I am hungry for a goat roast." That will be the signal.
String.Dest: 抓抓耳朵怎么样？不行……可能真的是耳朵痒了。那我说……“我超想吃烤羊排”怎么样，就拿这句暗号吧。

String.Source: How do we know the witch won't try to kill us?
String.Dest: 谁知道这女巫会不会试图杀死咱们？

String.Source: I don't agree. If some things don't get you angry, then you cease to be mortal. But I will do my best to stay calm, for my sister's sake.
String.Dest: 我不同意，要是什么事都不能惹你生气的话，那你就不算是人啦。但是为了我姐姐，我会尽量保持冷静。

String.Source: Yeah, that was weird. Turns out you and your sister both have anger issues.
String.Dest: 是啊，这很奇怪。事实证明你和你姐的脾气都有点大吧。

String.Source: Well, when the time comes, just say the word, and she dies.
String.Dest: 嗯，等时机一到，只要念出那句暗号，她就死定啦。

String.Source: Is killing her the right thing? If at some point I know, I will tell you. Maybe a secret sign is not such a bad idea.
String.Dest: 杀死她是对的吗？要是时机到了，我会告诉你的。或许给你个暗示也不错。

String.Source: Well, when the time comes, just say the word, and she dies.
String.Dest: 嗯，等时机一到，只要念出那句暗号，她就死定啦。

String.Source: How about if I scratch my ear? No...it might actually be itchy. How about if I say..."I am hungry for a goat roast." That will be the signal.
String.Dest: 抓抓耳朵怎么样？不行……可能真的是耳朵痒了。那我说……“我超想吃烤羊排”怎么样，就拿这句暗号吧。

String.Source: Well, when the time comes, just say the word, and she dies.
String.Dest: 嗯，等时机一到，只要念出那句暗号，她就死定啦。

String.Source: Perhaps my liege has matured. I am glad, because as it turns out, we need her alive, as much as that pains me to say.
String.Dest: 看来我家大王已经成熟了。真高兴啊，因为事实已经证明，咱们需要她活着，就算这话说着都心疼。

String.Source: I know how you feel. I don't know how I restrained myself.
String.Dest: 我明白你的感受，我不知道是怎么克制住自己的。

String.Source: My hero is kind, always thinking of his companion. I will do my best to not let her words hurt me. We need her alive.
String.Dest: 我的英雄可真是好心肠，总是替他的同伴着想。我会尽力不让她的废话伤到我。毕竟咱们得要她活着。

String.Source: What she said about you and your sister...lies from a stupid old hag.
String.Dest: 她说的那些关于你和你姐姐的话……都是个愚昧老巫婆编的谎话。

String.Source: What she said about you and your sister...lies from a stupid old hag.
String.Dest: 她说的那些关于你和你姐姐的话……都是个愚昧老巫婆编的谎话。

String.Source: And...I suppose she is at least honest. I will try to see the good qualities in her, at least until Joselyn is safe. Then we can cut off her head.
String.Dest: 呃……我想她至少还算诚实。我尽量看她好的一面吧，至少等到约瑟琳安全了。然后才能砍掉她的脑袋。

String.Source: Stay calm. We need to keep our minds on saving your sister. The hag will help.
String.Dest: 冷静。我们现在要专注于救你的姐姐。这个巫婆能帮上忙。

String.Source: I know. Joselyn's life is what's important. We will worry about the witch later.
String.Dest: 我知道啊。约瑟琳的命才是重要的。那些女巫以后再说吧。

String.Source: Sellswords are ruthless. She'll be lucky if they just kill her.
String.Dest: Sellswords are ruthless. She'll be lucky if they just kill her.

String.Source: I know, and we must act quickly if she's to have any chance.
String.Dest: 我明白，如果她还有丝毫的机会，我们就必须赶紧行动。

String.Source: But we can't rule out the possibility she yielded. I want to check the barracks in Falkreath. By the Gods I hope she's there.
String.Dest: 但也说不定她已经被捕了。我想去佛克瑞斯的兵营里看看。天啊我真希望她在那里。

String.Source: Sellswords are ruthless. She'll be lucky if they just kill her.
String.Dest: Sellswords are ruthless. She'll be lucky if they just kill her.

String.Source: It's possible she's fled safely to Cyrodiil. Security is lax these days.
String.Dest: 也有可能她已安全逃往赛瑞迪尔。最近管制很松懈。

String.Source: Yes, but the Jerall Mountains are not an easy climb, especially traveling alone. She might have been turned back.
String.Dest: 是的，但是杰拉尔山是没那么好爬的，尤其是对独自旅行的人来说。很可能她已经回去了。

String.Source: We must hurry to Falkreath. I want to check the barracks. If by chance she was caught and yielded, we might be able to save her.
String.Dest: 咱们得快点赶去佛克瑞斯。我要去兵营里看看。说不定她被关在那里，咱们还有机会救她。

String.Source: It's possible she's fled safely to Cyrodiil. Security is lax these days.
String.Dest: 也有可能她已安全逃往赛瑞迪尔。最近管制很松懈。

String.Source: At this point, there's little we can do. I'm sorry.
String.Dest: 到了这一步，我们帮不上什么忙了，很抱歉。

String.Source: You may have given up, but I refuse to believe it.
String.Dest: 也许你已经放弃，但我绝不相信。

String.Source: At this point, there's little we can do. I'm sorry.
String.Dest: 到了这一步，我们帮不上什么忙了，很抱歉。

String.Source: We must hurry to Falkreath. I want to check the barracks. If by chance she was caught and yielded, we might be able to save her.
String.Dest: 咱们得快点赶去佛克瑞斯。我要去兵营里看看。说不定她被关在那里，咱们还有机会救她。

String.Source: Too bad. That's what she gets for embracing the dark arts.
String.Dest: 太糟了。这就是她拥抱黑暗法术的结果。

String.Source: No. My sister is quiet...unassuming. She would not join some coven.
String.Dest: 不。我姐姐非常安静……低调。她绝不会参加什么女巫大聚会的。

String.Source: Too bad. That's what she gets for embracing the dark arts.
String.Dest: 太糟了。这就是她拥抱黑暗法术的结果。

String.Source: We must hurry to Falkreath. I want to check the barracks. If by chance she was caught and yielded, we might be able to save her.
String.Dest: 咱们得快点赶去佛克瑞斯。我要去兵营里看看。说不定她被关在那里，咱们还有机会救她。

String.Source: Yes, but she is not the type to join a coven, and four sellswords are more than a match for one witch.
String.Dest: 是的，但是她不是那种会加入女巫聚会的人，而且四个佣兵的力量对一个女巫来说是根本敌不过的啊。

String.Source: Bounty hunters are notoriously weak. My gold's on your sister.
String.Dest: Bounty hunters are notoriously weak. My gold's on your sister.

String.Source: Bounty hunters are notoriously weak. My gold's on your sister.
String.Dest: Bounty hunters are notoriously weak. My gold's on your sister.

String.Source: We must hurry to Falkreath. I want to check the barracks. If by chance she was caught and yielded, we might be able to save her.
String.Dest: 咱们得快点赶去佛克瑞斯。我要去兵营里看看。说不定她被关在那里，咱们还有机会救她。

String.Source: Do you mind keeping that closed?
String.Dest: 能拜托你把门关上吗？

String.Source: This is grave news, my hero. Bounty hunters will not spare a known witch. If my sister has fled to Falkreath she may try to cross the border.
String.Dest: 这可是重大消息，我的英雄。赏金猎从不放过任何女巫。所以我姐姐如果逃向了佛克瑞斯的话，她很可能试图逃出边境。

String.Source: I don't like this one bit. Joselyn would not steal.
String.Dest: 我不喜欢这种说法。约瑟琳不可能偷东西。

String.Source: I am sorry for that display, my Jarl. I know you are not used to seeing me angry. I am not used to it either. But when I talk to that hag!
String.Dest: 很抱歉让您看到我失态了，领主。我知道你不习惯看我发火的样子. 我也不是很习惯。只是当我跟那个巫婆对话的时候！

String.Source: Now I know why she joined that coven. It was all for this.
String.Dest: 现在明白她为什么会加入这个聚会了。全是因为这个。

String.Source: She wanted to be a child again. She wanted that feeling of home, but in a place where all the bad memories don't exist.
String.Dest: 她想回到童年，她想要那种家的感觉，只要在一个任何痛苦回忆都不存在的地方。

String.Source: Somewhere far away from Riverwood.
String.Dest: 一个离溪木镇很远的地方。

String.Source: I...I just want to thank you. I know I tease you, calling you my liege and my Thane, but on this day, you were all that and more.
String.Dest: I...I just want to thank you. I know I tease you, calling you my liege and my Thane, but on this day, you were all that and more.

String.Source: You were not just my companion, my savior, and my husband. You were a true friend.
String.Dest: You were not just my companion, my savior, and my husband. You were a true friend.

String.Source: I...I just want to thank you. I know I tease you, calling you my liege and my Thane, but on this day, you were all that and more.
String.Dest: I...I just want to thank you. I know I tease you, calling you my liege and my Thane, but on this day, you were all that and more.

String.Source: You were not just my companion, my savior, and my hero. You were a true friend.
String.Dest: You were not just my companion, my savior, and my hero. You were a true friend.

String.Source: Help me out my hero, what is brown and furry and walks on all fours?
String.Dest: 帮帮忙啊英雄，什么东西是棕色有毛而且是四条腿走路的？

String.Source: Then I went back to sleep. The next time I woke up I was on the table over there, much to the surprise of everyone.
String.Dest: 然后我就回去睡觉。结果下次醒来的时候就是躺在那张桌子上的，真是谁也想不到啊。

String.Source: My Jarl is so generous. Very well, I will stay here with Delphine and subtly suggest she would look better with makeup.
String.Dest: 我的领主真是大方。好极了，我跟戴尔芬留在这儿然后我慢慢暗示她如果化个妆的话会漂亮得多。

String.Source: If you're worried about the scars, it's okay. I got this.
String.Dest: 如果你对我的疤痕比较在意，这没问题。我懂的。

String.Source: My liege likes to live dangerously, and I am not one to object. But what if they all come at once?
String.Dest: 我家大王喜欢生活在危险中，我对此没有异议。但如果危险一股脑儿都来了怎么办？

String.Source: If only it did. Imagine all the dragon souls and bones we could harvest.
String.Dest: 要是它真的有效，你能想象咱们会收获多少龙魂和龙骨吧。

String.Source: Still, if you plan on blowing the horn anyway, then I suppose it will not do any harm if I do so as well.
String.Dest: 既然如此，你非要吹那号角不可的话，我觉得让我来吹的话也没什么不好吧。

String.Source: If only it did. Imagine all the dragon souls and bones we could harvest.
String.Dest: 要是它真的有效，你能想象咱们会收获多少龙魂和龙骨吧。

String.Source: My lord is a very harsh. Does he not know how to respond to a compliment?
String.Dest: 我家大王可真是一本正经啊。他就不知道听到赞美该怎么回答么？

String.Source: I'm the Dragonborn, your rescuer, and your champion, but I'm not your friend.
String.Dest: 我是龙裔，你的救星，和勇士，但我不算是你的朋友。

String.Source: Maybe a swift kick to the head from his trusted companion will make him come to his senses.
String.Dest: 也许让一位好伙伴朝他脑袋猛踢一脚他就能清醒过来。

String.Source: I'm the Dragonborn, your rescuer, and your champion, but I'm not your friend.
String.Dest: 我是龙裔，你的救星，和勇士，但我不算是你的朋友。

String.Source: I'm the Dragonborn, your rescuer, and your champion, but I'm not your friend.
String.Dest: 我是龙裔，你的救星，和勇士，但我不算是你的朋友。

String.Source: My lord is a very harsh. Does she not know how to respond to a compliment?
String.Dest: 我的女王真够严厉啊。她不知道怎么回应别人的恭维么？

String.Source: I'm the Dragonborn, your rescuer, and your champion, but I'm not your friend.
String.Dest: 我是龙裔，你的救星，和勇士，但我不算是你的朋友。

String.Source: Maybe a swift kick to the head from her trusted companion will make her come to her senses.
String.Dest: 也许让可靠的同伴照她脑袋猛踢一脚就能让她回过神来。

String.Source: My name is Zora Fair-Child, although it was never meant to be ironic.
String.Dest: 我的名字佐拉．菲欧巧儿,虽然它从来不是嘲讽。

String.Source: What's your name?
String.Dest: 你叫什么名字?

String.Source: I was once very much a child, and very much fair. So fair, in fact, the Divines saw fit to punish me with this marred and unenviable face.
String.Dest: I was once very much a child, and very much fair. So fair, in fact, the Divines saw fit to punish me with this marred and unenviable face.

String.Source: What's your name?
String.Dest: 你叫什么名字?

String.Source: What's your name?
String.Dest: 你叫什么名字?

String.Source: It's always easier to blame the Gods for such things, isn't it?
String.Dest: 出了这种事去责怪神灵比较容易平衡，是吧？

String.Source: Oh no, necromancers tend to disapprove of having their specimens damaged.
String.Dest: 噢没有，亡灵术士可都是尽可能让自己的实验品免于损坏的。

String.Source: What's your name?
String.Dest: 你叫什么名字?

String.Source: Was it the necromancer who marred your face?
String.Dest: 就是那个亡灵术士让你毁了容？

String.Source: What's your name?
String.Dest: 你叫什么名字?

String.Source: Was it the necromancer who marred your face?
String.Dest: 就是那个亡灵术士让你毁了容？

String.Source: I should know, this is the eleventh necromancer who's enslaved me, and all eleven have been as delicate as a lord is with his finest furs.
String.Dest: 我该知道的，这是奴役我的第十一位亡灵术士，而这十一个人都像是贵族们珍惜自己的上等皮草一样小心翼翼。

String.Source: It makes me sad to disappoint them so. I think this last one was quite excited with his find until he brushed back my hair.
String.Dest: It makes me sad to disappoint them so. I think this last one was quite excited with his find until he brushed back my hair.

String.Source: What's your name?
String.Dest: 你叫什么名字?

String.Source: Was it the necromancer who marred your face?
String.Dest: 就是那个亡灵术士让你毁了容？

String.Source: (Sigh) I've seen that look on more than enough men to recognize it.
String.Dest: （叹）我见过那副表情比见过的男人还多了。

String.Source: What's your name?
String.Dest: 你叫什么名字?

String.Source: Was it the necromancer who marred your face?
String.Dest: 就是那个亡灵术士让你毁了容？

String.Source: So the little princess got burned. Cry some more. You can use my dirty rag.
String.Dest: So the little princess got burned. Cry some more. You can use my dirty rag.

String.Source: It seems the hero opts for the stick over the carrot, and the warhammer over the stick. This little horse prefers a homecooked meal.
String.Dest: It seems the hero opts for the stick over the carrot, and the warhammer over the stick. This little horse prefers a homecooked meal.

String.Source: If you mean to defend my sister, well, that's a first. I'll be pleased to let her know of your chivalry.
String.Dest: If you mean to defend my sister, well, that's a first. I'll be pleased to let her know of your chivalry.

String.Source: So the little princess got burned. Cry some more. You can use my dirty rag.
String.Dest: So the little princess got burned. Cry some more. You can use my dirty rag.

String.Source: No, my liege. At least, not in public.
String.Dest: No, my liege. At least, not in public.

String.Source: Have you ever gotten this drunk before?
String.Dest: Have you ever gotten this drunk before?

String.Source: Maybe after you blacked out, he went on without you. Some people like to drink with friends. Others just like to drink.
String.Dest: Maybe after you blacked out, he went on without you. Some people like to drink with friends. Others just like to drink.

String.Source: What do you think happened to Sam?
String.Dest: What do you think happened to Sam?

String.Source: The priestess mentioned something about marriage and a goat. Sound familiar?
String.Dest: The priestess mentioned something about marriage and a goat. Sound familiar?

String.Source: Well, you aren't wearing a ring. That's the first thing I check whenever I black out. Just in case.
String.Dest: Well, you aren't wearing a ring. That's the first thing I check whenever I black out. Just in case.

String.Source: (Night to Remember) It seems I got drunk and lost control.
String.Dest: (Night to Remember) It seems I got drunk and lost control.

String.Source: Strange. That does not sound like my Thane. I can imagine you drunk, yes, but never out of control.
String.Dest: Strange. That does not sound like my Thane. I can imagine you drunk, yes, but never out of control.

String.Source: What sort of rescuer were you waiting for?
String.Dest: 你到底在等什么样的人来救呢？

String.Source: Well, handsome but not cute. Funny, but not mean. Tender, but not soft. Strong, but not violent. Caring, but not servile.
String.Dest: Well, handsome but not cute. Funny, but not mean. Tender, but not soft. Strong, but not violent. Caring, but not servile.

String.Source: I could go on and on.
String.Dest: 我还能一直说下去。

String.Source: What sort of rescuer were you waiting for?
String.Dest: 你到底在等什么样的人来救呢？

String.Source: You're my best friend as well. But I'd like to be more.
String.Dest: 你也是我最好的朋友。可我希望咱们更进一步。

String.Source: You would? Now that is a surprise. The handsome knight falling for the damaged princess. Life is not a fairy tale, my prince.
String.Dest: 你愿意？真是太令人惊喜啦。英俊的骑士了爱上了残破的公主。生活不是一个童话故事，我的王子。
