String.Source: Yet I have always dreamed that it one day might be.
String.Dest: 我也真的一直梦想着有这么一天。

String.Source: You're my best friend as well. But I'd like to be more.
String.Dest: 你也是我最好的朋友。可我希望咱们更进一步。

String.Source: Yes, more than friends. Sisters. We fight alongside each other, and occasionally with each other, but always with love.
String.Dest: 是的，不仅仅是朋友。我们是姐妹。我们并肩战斗，虽然偶尔打架，但也是带着爱的。

String.Source: You're my best friend as well.
String.Dest: 你也是我最好的朋友。

String.Source: But this is not the end of your adventuring days, I hope. There are many more fights left to come.
String.Dest: 我希望这不是你冒险生涯的终点。还是有很多战斗等着你呢。

String.Source: You're my best friend as well.
String.Dest: 你也是我最好的朋友。

String.Source: Really? Then what does it summon? Cliff racers? Snow Elves? High ones?
String.Dest: 真的吗？那它到底在召唤什么？崖壁鸟？雪精灵？还是高精灵？

String.Source: I doubt this horn summons dragons. Unless the Greybeards are trying to kill us.
String.Dest: 我真怀疑这号角是不是召唤龙的。除非灰胡子们打算害死咱们。

String.Source: Do not tell me the Greybeards want us to fetch an ordinary horn. Next they will have us carry pails of water up and down the 7,000 steps.
String.Dest: 别告诉我灰胡子让咱去拿的只是个普通破号角。然后下次再让咱提几桶水什么的爬上七千台阶。

String.Source: I doubt this horn summons dragons. Unless the Greybeards are trying to kill us.
String.Dest: 我真怀疑这号角是不是召唤龙的。除非灰胡子们打算害死咱们。

String.Source: Looks like you kissed a troll and it slapped you.
String.Dest: 看着像是你亲了一头巨魔然后被它扇了一巴掌.

String.Source: Kiss a troll? Did I think he would turn into a lord? Or do you think my tastes are that queer?
String.Dest: Kiss a troll? Did I think he would turn into a lord? Or do you think my tastes are that queer?

String.Source: Looks like you kissed a troll and it slapped you.
String.Dest: 看着像是你亲了一头巨魔然后被它扇了一巴掌.

String.Source: Granted it'll require a little imagination on your part, but there was a time when even the trolls would've bent their knee to kiss my hand.
String.Dest: 这个需要你自行脑补一下，就是当时连巨魔也会跪下来吻我的手呢。

String.Source: Looks like you kissed a troll and it slapped you.
String.Dest: 看着像是你亲了一头巨魔然后被它扇了一巴掌.

String.Source: As opposed to "handing" my kiss.
String.Dest: 而不是因为我的吻而“扇我一巴掌”。

String.Source: It's obvious you don't want to be seen with me in public. Fine. Be like that.
String.Dest: 你明显不希望在公众场合被人看到和我在一起。行。就这样吧。

String.Source: Oh I am sorry, my Jarl, that is not what I meant. It has nothing to do with you.
String.Dest: 噢抱歉，领主大人，我不是那个意思。那可不是说您啊。

String.Source: It's obvious you don't want to be seen with me in public. Fine. Be like that.
String.Dest: 你明显不希望在公众场合被人看到和我在一起。行。就这样吧。

String.Source: After all, have we not traveled together in public all this time? I am not ashamed to know you. I would shout it with a thu'um if I could.
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，我们这段时间不是一直走在一起么？我可从没觉得认识你有啥丢人的啊。真想用吐目跟你吼出来啊。

String.Source: Are you sure? You sound like the sixth hero who saved me. Aggressive, but impatiently so.
String.Dest: Are you sure? You sound like the sixth hero who saved me. Aggressive, but impatiently so.

String.Source: No, for the love of the Divines. Please don't.
String.Dest: No, for the love of the Divines. Please don't.

String.Source: No, for the love of the Divines. Please don't.
String.Dest: No, for the love of the Divines. Please don't.

String.Source: That one had barely unlocked the cage before unloosening his belt.
String.Dest: 那家伙还没打开笼子的锁就差点先自己解了裤子。

String.Source: Oh, you're right, I would be very sad if I stuck you in the back. You might think I did it on purpose.
String.Dest: 噢，你说的对，我要是从背后伤到你我会很伤心的。因为会让你以为我是故意的。

String.Source: Sure, so long as you have good aim.
String.Dest: 当然，只要你有个不错的目标。

String.Source: But what are a few scars here and there, right?
String.Dest: 【但到处还都有一些疤痕，对吗？

String.Source: Sure, so long as you have good aim.
String.Dest: 当然，只要你有个不错的目标。

String.Source: You've caught me, my Jarl, red-handed. Or would be it gold-handed?
String.Dest: 你抓到我了，领主，抓了个现形。或者应该叫现钱？

String.Source: You rural townsfolk and your secrets. Next you'll tell me you're a Thalmor.
String.Dest: 你个乡巴佬和你那该死的秘密。下次你会告诉我你是梭默吧。

String.Source: You rural townsfolk and your secrets. Next you'll tell me you're a Thalmor.
String.Dest: 你个乡巴佬和你那该死的秘密。下次你会告诉我你是梭默吧。

String.Source: I do think you High Elves have such beautiful skin. But I like your pointy ears the best. I would very much like to pinch them.
String.Dest: 我确实觉得你们高精灵的皮肤很漂亮，但我最喜欢的还是尖尖的耳朵，真心忍不住想捏两下呢。

String.Source: Anyways,I do not have such secrets to tell. Does that make me boring? I hope not.
String.Dest: 反正呢，我是没这种秘密可坦白的。会显得我很无聊吗？希望没有吧。

String.Source: You rural townsfolk and your secrets. Next you'll tell me you're a Thalmor.
String.Dest: 你个乡巴佬和你那该死的秘密。下次你会告诉我你是梭默吧。

String.Source: You've caught me, my Jarl, red-handed. Or would be it gold-handed?
String.Dest: 你抓到我了，领主，抓了个现形。或者应该叫现钱？

String.Source: You rural townsfolk and your secrets. Next you'll tell me you're a Thalmor.
String.Dest: 你个乡巴佬和你那该死的秘密。下次你会告诉我你是梭默吧。

String.Source: You rural townsfolk and your secrets. Next you'll tell me you're a Thalmor.
String.Dest: 你个乡巴佬和你那该死的秘密。下次你会告诉我你是梭默吧。

String.Source: I do think High Elves have such beautiful skin. But I like the pointy ears the best. I would very much like to pinch them.
String.Dest: 我确实觉得高精灵的皮肤很漂亮。可我更喜欢那些尖耳朵。我超想捏捏它们。

String.Source: Anyways, I do not have such secrets to tell. Does that make me boring? I hope not.
String.Dest: 反正呢，我是没这种秘密可坦白的。会显得我很无聊吗？希望没有吧。

String.Source: You rural townsfolk and your secrets. Next you'll tell me you're a Thalmor.
String.Dest: 你个乡巴佬和你那该死的秘密。下次你会告诉我你是梭默吧。

String.Source: It's a bad idea. There's already too much white in Skyrim.
String.Dest: 真是个坏主意。天际已经有太多的白色了。

String.Source: Ah, but in the winter, the fields will be harvested for fabrics and potions, exposing the grass underneath.
String.Dest: 啊，不过到了冬天，田里的作物全被收割去做织物和药剂，地里就会露出草皮来。

String.Source: What did you have in mind?
String.Dest: 你在想什么？

String.Source: I was just thinking, I developed most of my habits fighting alone. Now that you are here to save me, I thought maybe I should change my tactics.
String.Dest: 我只是在想，自己太习惯单独作战了。而现在你来救了我，也许是我该改变一下风格。

String.Source: What did you have in mind?
String.Dest: 你在想什么？

String.Source: I usually cast oakflesh, but it takes up nearly half of my magicka.
String.Dest: 我一般用【oakflesh，可那一下就要用掉一半魔法。

String.Source: What did you have in mind?
String.Dest: 你在想什么？

String.Source: With you fighting beside me, maybe I should use an ice spike instead to slow our enemies.
String.Dest: 既然有你并肩战斗，或许我应该改用冰锥来减慢敌人行动。

String.Source: Well, we have traveled for quite some time, from one end of Skyrim to the other, and I have found you are a very capable fighter.
String.Dest: 嗯，咱们一路同行了这么久，从天际的一端跑到另一端，我已经了解你是非常给力的战士。

String.Source: (Solitude) What is it?
String.Dest: （独孤城）这是什么？

String.Source: As I am still an amateur, I was wondering if perhaps you could give me some instruction.
String.Dest: 身为一个资深外行，我在想有没有什么可能由您来给我指导指导呢。

String.Source: (Solitude) What is it?
String.Dest: （独孤城）这是什么？

String.Source: (A Blade in the Dark) It appears Delphine isn't just an innkeeper.
String.Dest: （黑暗中的利刃）很显然戴尔芬不只是个旅店老板。

String.Source: Yes, my Jarl, I am shocked, absolutely shocked and...
String.Dest: 是的，领主大人。我非常的震惊，我整个人都呆住了而且……

String.Source: Well, I guess I'm not really all that shocked. Delphine's always been a little rough around the edges. And inside the edges. Mostly she's just rough.
String.Dest: 是的，我对此并不感到相当意外。戴尔芬的外表总是比较粗犷。嗯内在也是。基本上她就是个粗人。

String.Source: (A Blade in the Dark) It appears Delphine isn't just an innkeeper.
String.Dest: （黑暗中的利刃）很显然戴尔芬不只是个旅店老板。

String.Source: I think Hjoromir is convinced she is a Daedric Prince. Orgnar too, but he doesn't like to show his displeasure.
String.Dest: 我想肖罗密尔肯定觉得她是个魔神。还有奥格那，但他心里的不高兴是不会写在脸上的。

String.Source: (A Blade in the Dark) It appears Delphine isn't just an innkeeper.
String.Dest: （黑暗中的利刃）很显然戴尔芬不只是个旅店老板。

String.Source: Oh, but I'm sure even my gallant hero is not strong enough to withstand my voice.
String.Dest: 噢，但我肯定就算我勇敢的英雄也没有强大到承受得住我的吼声。

String.Source: Just don't try and sing yourself. I don't want to have to kill you.
String.Dest: 不许自言自语地唱歌。我不想非杀你不可。

String.Source: Just don't try and sing yourself. I don't want to have to kill you.
String.Dest: 不许自言自语地唱歌。我不想非杀你不可。

String.Source: No, you will cringe so hard your face will get stuck, and then everyone will wonder why you're so angry.
String.Dest: 不，你会紧张得整个表情都变得僵硬，然后别人看到都会奇怪你怎么生气了。

String.Source: Just don't try and sing yourself. I don't want to have to kill you.
String.Dest: 不许自言自语地唱歌。我不想非杀你不可。

String.Source: Although I suppose that changes little. You should really have that scowl looked at by a priest.
String.Dest: 虽然可能没什么用。你那种阴沉的脸色真应该找个牧师看看。

String.Source: I can sing better than any of these jesters.
String.Dest: 我唱的比这些小丑都好。

String.Source: My hero is confident! I would very much like to hear you sing. Do you also know how to play the lute?
String.Dest: 我的英雄真是自信满满！我还真想听听你唱歌呢。另外你还会弹鲁特琴吗？

String.Source: I can sing better than any of these jesters.
String.Dest: 我唱的比这些小丑都好。

String.Source: I suppose we could always borrow one from the old man. We can even have a contest! The winner is the one who gets the most applause!
String.Dest: 我看可以从那个老人那儿借一把来弹弹。甚至咱们可以比赛！得到最热烈掌声的获胜！

String.Source: And if someone is foolish enough to vote for your opponent, I'll just knock him over the head.
String.Dest: 要是真有人蠢到投票给你的对手。我就照着他的脑袋狠狠来一下。

String.Source: I can sing better than any of these jesters.
String.Dest: 我唱的比这些小丑都好。

String.Source: But you didn't do anything. Why should they include you?
String.Dest: But you didn't do anything. Why should they include you?

String.Source: Oh, my liege is very mean. But many tales contain half-truths. Just being by your side at this moment may give me a place in your story.
String.Dest: Oh, my liege is very mean. But many tales contain half-truths. Just being by your side at this moment may give me a place in your story.

String.Source: Don't worry. I don't plan on joining the Guild. My goal is to destroy it.
String.Dest: Don't worry. I don't plan on joining the Guild. My goal is to destroy it.

String.Source: Ha, is that so, my liege? Well, don't forget to clear Brand-Shei's name when you are done.
String.Dest: Ha, is that so, my liege? Well, don't forget to clear Brand-Shei's name when you are done.

String.Source: Yes, I bet Sigrid is still hectoring Alvor like a pet dog. And speaking of which, it's good to see Stump is still alive too.
String.Dest: 对，我敢打赌西格利还是把阿尔沃当宠物狗一样欺负着呢。对了说到狗狗，很高兴看见斯挞普还活着哈。

String.Source: No, it's the same old Riverwood.
String.Dest: 不，还是那个一成不变的老旧溪木镇。

String.Source: No, it's the same old Riverwood.
String.Dest: 不，还是那个一成不变的老旧溪木镇。

String.Source: I forget how he got his name. I think it's because he's always curled about like a stump.
String.Dest: 我忘了他怎么得了这个名字的。我想这是因为他总是缩成一团好像树桩的样子吧。

String.Source: No, it's the same old Riverwood.
String.Dest: 不，还是那个一成不变的老旧溪木镇。

String.Source: Yes, I bet Sigrid is still hectoring Alvor like a pet dog. Although speaking of which, I don't see Stump around.
String.Dest: 是，我敢打赌西格利对阿尔沃还是当狗一样骂来骂去。不过说到狗，我没看见斯挞普啊。

String.Source: You don't think he's dead do you? The poor thing.
String.Dest: 你看他不会是死了吧？可怜的小东西。

String.Source: No, it's the same old Riverwood.
String.Dest: 不，还是那个一成不变的老旧溪木镇。

String.Source: We'd fight often, about the smallest of things. Although they were never really about who was supposed to wash the clothes, or sweep the floor.
String.Dest: We'd fight often, about the smallest of things. Although they were never really about who was supposed to wash the clothes, or sweep the floor.

String.Source: How did that affect your relationship?
String.Dest: 那和你们之间有什么关系？

String.Source: How did that affect your relationship?
String.Dest: 那和你们之间有什么关系？

String.Source: It was always about her envy, and my lack of compassion. Eventually, one argument got rough. The hand she struck me with was cloaked in fire.
String.Dest: It was always about her envy, and my lack of compassion. Eventually, one argument got rough. The hand she struck me with was cloaked in fire.

String.Source: When I was a flowering young maiden I once had many suitors. Men would travel great distances to see the Diamond of Riverwood.
String.Dest: 当我还是年轻漂亮的少女时有许多人曾向我求婚，许多男人千里迢迢来到这里求见溪木镇的钻石。

String.Source: There must be a story behind that burn scar.
String.Dest: 那块烧伤背后一定是有故事的吧。

String.Source: My sister, on the other hand, had no suitors to speak of.
String.Dest: My sister, on the other hand, had no suitors to speak of.

String.Source: There must be a story behind that burn scar.
String.Dest: 那块烧伤背后一定是有故事的吧。

String.Source: She was far more talented than I, a mage worthy of studying at the College of Winterhold. What she was not, unfortunately, was pretty.
String.Dest: 她的天赋是远超过我的，完全值得在冬堡学院进修的法师苗子。可惜她只缺少了，美貌。

String.Source: There must be a story behind that burn scar.
String.Dest: 那块烧伤背后一定是有故事的吧。

String.Source: How did that happen?
String.Dest: 怎么可能？

String.Source: When I was a flowering young maiden I once had many suitors. Men would travel great distances to see the Diamond of Riverwood.
String.Dest: When I was a flowering young maiden I once had many suitors. Men would travel great distances to see the Diamond of Riverwood.

String.Source: How did that happen?
String.Dest: 怎么可能？

String.Source: My sister, on the other hand, had no suitors to speak of. She became very taciturn, sitting in her corner as the men showered me with praise.
String.Dest: My sister, on the other hand, had no suitors to speak of. She became very taciturn, sitting in her corner as the men showered me with praise.

String.Source: She was far more talented than I, a mage worthy of studying at the College of Winterhold. What she was not, unfortunately, was pretty.
String.Dest: 她的天赋是远超过我的，完全值得在冬堡学院进修的法师苗子。可惜她只缺少了，美貌。

String.Source: How did that happen?
String.Dest: 怎么可能？

String.Source: Ah, the scars came from adventuring. Most of them are barely visible, thanks to the one.
String.Dest: Ah, the scars came from adventuring. Most of them are barely visible, thanks to the one.

String.Source: I'm curious about the scars.
String.Dest: 我对这些疤痕很感兴趣。

String.Source: From a distance it may appear to be a dash of paint. A girl's attempt to look menacing. Upon closer inspection, you'll see it's the mark of a burn.
String.Dest: From a distance it may appear to be a dash of paint. A girl's attempt to look menacing. Upon closer inspection, you'll see it's the mark of a burn.

String.Source: I'm curious about the scars.
String.Dest: 我对这些疤痕很感兴趣。

String.Source: What? You mean the cage?
String.Dest: What? You mean the cage?

String.Source: Why yes, it's quite comfortable in here, but when it's open there's a bit of a draft.
String.Dest: 啊是的，这里边确实挺舒服，可是敞开的时候就有点显乱啦。

String.Source: Why do you ask? Are you setting him up with someone? My love, you should not keep secrets from your wife.
String.Dest: 你问这个干啥？难不成你在给他牵线搭桥？亲爱的，你不该有事儿瞒着你老婆嘛。

String.Source: Never mind your daydreams, wife. I asked you about Rumarin.
String.Dest: 你那白日梦先放放吧，老婆。我在问你罗米勒的事儿。

String.Source: But to answer your question, he's not my type. I like them funny, but not childish. And he's too tall.
String.Dest: 不过回答你的问题吧，他不是我的菜。我喜欢那种幽默，但不是幼稚。还有他个头太高啦。

String.Source: Never mind your daydreams, wife. I asked you about Rumarin.
String.Dest: 你那白日梦先放放吧，老婆。我在问你罗米勒的事儿。

String.Source: Why do you ask? Are you setting him up with someone? My Thane, secrets don't make friends.
String.Dest: 为什么会这么问？你是在撮合他和谁吗？我的男爵大人，保密可就不是朋友啦。

String.Source: Never mind your daydreams, woman. I asked you about Rumarin.
String.Dest: 别再扯你的白日梦啦姑娘，我问你罗米勒的事。

String.Source: But to answer your question, he's not my type. I like them funny, but not childish. And he's too tall.
String.Dest: 不过回答你的问题吧，他不是我的菜。我喜欢那种幽默，但不是幼稚。还有他个头太高啦。

String.Source: Never mind your daydreams, woman. I asked you about Rumarin.
String.Dest: 别再扯你的白日梦啦姑娘，我问你罗米勒的事。

String.Source: What sorts of folk pass through Brittleshin?
String.Dest: 走进这地方的都是些什么样的人？

String.Source: Most come north to south, but there are those who come south from Riverwood. The necromancers lay a rune by the entrance to give them a warning.
String.Dest: Most come north to south, but there are those who come south from Riverwood. The necromancers lay a rune by the entrance to give them a warning.

String.Source: What sorts of folk pass through Brittleshin?
String.Dest: 走进这地方的都是些什么样的人？

String.Source: You can always tell the careful heroes from the impatient ones, by the number of ice shards sticking out of their armor.
String.Dest: 要从那些急脾气中分辨出细心的英雄来，只要看他们盔甲上冰锥的数量就知道啦。

String.Source: What sorts of folk pass through Brittleshin?
String.Dest: 走进这地方的都是些什么样的人？

String.Source: All types. Bandits, wizards, heroes, and alchemists. Oh, and skeletons! They used to be all four.
String.Dest: All types. Bandits, wizards, heroes, and alchemists. Oh, and skeletons! They used to be all four.

String.Source: What sorts of folk pass through Brittleshin?
String.Dest: 走进这地方的都是些什么样的人？

String.Source: If you enter from the north, there's a soul gem trap that hits you with a swath of old fashioned destruction magic.
String.Dest: 如果你从北面进，有一个灵魂石的陷阱会发出老式的毁灭魔法攻击你。

String.Source: What sorts of folk pass through Brittleshin?
String.Dest: 走进这地方的都是些什么样的人？

String.Source: It can give you a severe tickling if you aren't careful. I get more annoyed than hurt.
String.Dest: It can give you a severe tickling if you aren't careful. I get more annoyed than hurt.

String.Source: Oh my, aren't we the testy one. Not the gallant, unflappable hero I imagined.
String.Dest: Oh my, aren't we the testy one. Not the gallant, unflappable hero I imagined.

String.Source: Pardon me then. I'll just leave you here for the worms.
String.Dest: 你再说一次看看，我就把你扔在这喂虫子了。

String.Source: Oh my, aren't we the testy one. Not the gallant, unflappable hero I imagined.
String.Dest: Oh my, aren't we the testy one. Not the gallant, unflappable hero I imagined.

String.Source: Pardon me then. I'll just leave you here for the worms.
String.Dest: 你再说一次看看，我就把你扔在这喂虫子了。

String.Source: Yes, please do.
String.Dest: 是的，请说。

String.Source: I want a man who's aggressive, but not impatient. Creative, but not obsessed. And most of all confident, but not arrogant.
String.Dest: I want a man who's aggressive, but not impatient. Creative, but not obsessed. And most of all confident, but not arrogant.

String.Source: The best I ever knew was four of those things, but he failed the arrogance test.
String.Dest: The best I ever knew was four of those things, but he failed the arrogance test.

String.Source: Yes, please do.
String.Dest: 是的，请说。

String.Source: He didn't just cross the border between confidence and arrogance, he rode through on a gilded carriage pulled by frenzied mammoths.
String.Dest: 他不仅穿过了自信与自大间的界限，还是坐着镀金马车由发疯的猛犸象拉着过去的。

String.Source: Yes, please do.
String.Dest: 是的，请说。

String.Source: Ah, to be a fool eleven times does seem a bit mad. But some say madness and happiness are one and the same.
String.Dest: Ah, to be a fool eleven times does seem a bit mad. But some say madness and happiness are one and the same.

String.Source: I am a healer. You are suffering from a severe case of brain rot.
String.Dest: I am a healer. You are suffering from a severe case of brain rot.

String.Source: I am a healer. You are suffering from a severe case of brain rot.
String.Dest: I am a healer. You are suffering from a severe case of brain rot.

String.Source: There'd be nothing that pleases me more than to be rescued by a true hero.
String.Dest: 没什么比有个真正的英雄来救我更让人家开心的啦。

String.Source: Yes, very. But perhaps I am not that kind of girl, to be so easily swayed by a pretty face.
String.Dest: Yes, very. But perhaps I am not that kind of girl, to be so easily swayed by a pretty face.

String.Source: Your standards are too high. I am a true hero and very attractive.
String.Dest: 你的标准太高了。我可是一个拥有致命吸引力的真英雄呢。

String.Source: Yes, very. But perhaps I am not that kind of girl, to be so easily swayed by a pretty face.
String.Dest: Yes, very. But perhaps I am not that kind of girl, to be so easily swayed by a pretty face.

String.Source: Your standards are too high. I am a true hero and very attractive.
String.Dest: 你的标准太高了。我可是一个拥有致命吸引力的真英雄呢。

String.Source: Yes, a beautiful girl you are. Ah, but be forewarned, for beauty fades, or is ripped away, depending on the beauty.
String.Dest: Yes, a beautiful girl you are. Ah, but be forewarned, for beauty fades, or is ripped away, depending on the beauty.

String.Source: Your standards are too high. I am a true hero and very attractive.
String.Dest: 你的标准太高了。我可是一个拥有致命吸引力的真英雄呢。

String.Source: Your standards are too high. I am a true hero and very attractive.
String.Dest: 你的标准太高了。我可是一个拥有致命吸引力的真英雄呢。

String.Source: But it always leaves. Without so much as a goodbye. Or a farewell party. It's quite rude.
String.Dest: But it always leaves. Without so much as a goodbye. Or a farewell party. It's quite rude.

String.Source: Yes, a beautiful girl you are. Ah, but be forewarned, for beauty fades, or is ripped away, depending on the beauty.
String.Dest: Yes, a beautiful girl you are. Ah, but be forewarned, for beauty fades, or is ripped away, depending on the beauty.

String.Source: Your standards are too high. I am a true hero and very attractive.
String.Dest: 你的标准太高了。我可是一个拥有致命吸引力的真英雄呢。

String.Source: But it always leaves. Without so much as a goodbye. Or a farewell party. It's quite rude, actually.
String.Dest: But it always leaves. Without so much as a goodbye. Or a farewell party. It's quite rude, actually.

String.Source: Your standards are too high. I am a true hero and very attractive.
String.Dest: 你的标准太高了。我可是一个拥有致命吸引力的真英雄呢。

String.Source: That's a concern. I can't have them trampling through the very fields I planted.
String.Dest: That's a concern. I can't have them trampling through the very fields I planted.

String.Source: Yes, I'm sure the Giants will just let you plant away.
String.Dest: 对，我相信那些巨人会赶你去别处种庄稼。

String.Source: But that's why the Divines invented heroes. And sellswords.
String.Dest: But that's why the Divines invented heroes. And sellswords.

String.Source: Yes, I'm sure the Giants will just let you plant away.
String.Dest: 对，我相信那些巨人会赶你去别处种庄稼。

String.Source: I don't care, just don't get in my way.
String.Dest: 我不在乎，只要不碍我的事。

String.Source: You don't want to fight as a team? So why do you want me as a companion?
String.Dest: 你不想玩团队协作？那干嘛要让我陪你一起来啊？

String.Source: I don't care, just don't get in my way.
String.Dest: 我不在乎，只要不碍我的事。

String.Source: Does that mean you enjoy my company? No, that can't be it.
String.Dest: 那是你喜欢跟我同行的意思吗？不，没有吧。

String.Source: I bet you just want something nice to look at. Oh, that must be it. It's so nice to have a hero with such low standards.
String.Dest: 那就是你只想身边有个还算能看的看看就行。哦，一定是这样的。有个审美标准低成这样的英雄真是好啊。

String.Source: I don't care, just don't get in my way.
String.Dest: 我不在乎，只要不碍我的事。

String.Source: The Emperor's personal guard! Does that make you him? I apologize for selling you short, my Emperor!
String.Dest: 皇帝的贴身侍卫！你都跟他平起平坐啦？看来是我低估你啦，我的皇帝！

String.Source: She's a member of the Blades. The Emperor's personal guard before the Oculatus.
String.Dest: 她是刀锋会成员。在锐眼鹰之前的皇帝御前侍卫组织。

String.Source: She's a member of the Blades. The Emperor's personal guard before the Oculatus.
String.Dest: 她是刀锋会成员。在锐眼鹰之前的皇帝御前侍卫组织。

String.Source: But, I would have sooner guessed you were Titus Mede than Delphine was a Blade. Not that it doesn't suit her.
String.Dest: 可是，要我猜出你是皇帝倒是比想象戴尔芬是刀锋战士更容易点。也不是因为她不像。

String.Source: It's just there are many guilds and groups in Tamriel, full of strong warriors with terrible fashion sense. Delphine fits right in with all of them.
String.Dest: 只不过泰姆瑞尔大陆上的公会和势力实在很多，都是毫无时尚品位的强悍战士。戴尔芬跟他们都相当般配啦。

String.Source: She's a member of the Blades. The Emperor's personal guard before the Oculatus.
String.Dest: 她是刀锋会成员。在锐眼鹰之前的皇帝御前侍卫组织。

String.Source: The Emperor's personal guard! Does that make you her? I apologize for selling you short, my Emperor!
String.Dest: 皇帝的贴身侍卫！你也做到她的位置啦？看来是我低估你啦，我的皇帝！

String.Source: It turns out she's a member of the Blades.
String.Dest: 原来她是刀锋会成员。

String.Source: It turns out she's a member of the Blades.
String.Dest: 原来她是刀锋会成员。

String.Source: But, I would have sooner guessed you were Titus Mede than Delphine was a Blade. Not that it doesn't suit her.
String.Dest: 可是，要我猜出你是皇帝倒是比想象戴尔芬是刀锋战士更容易点。也不是因为她不像。

String.Source: It's just there are many guilds and groups in Tamriel, full of strong warriors with terrible fashion sense. Delphine fits right in with all of them.
String.Dest: 只不过泰姆瑞尔大陆上的公会和势力实在很多，都是毫无时尚品位的强悍战士。戴尔芬跟他们都相当般配啦。

String.Source: It turns out she's a member of the Blades.
String.Dest: 原来她是刀锋会成员。

String.Source: Hm...I think...I have no idea. There are many guilds and groups in Tamriel, and many are full of strong warriors with terrible fashion sense.
String.Dest: 嗯……我觉得……我不知道啦。整个泰姆瑞尔大陆有无数的公会，大多数都是群没什么时尚品位的战士。

String.Source: Who do you think she is?
String.Dest: 你为什么觉得她是？

String.Source: Delphine would fit in any one of them. I am sure she will tell us soon enough.
String.Dest: 戴尔芬在他们那儿是能适应任何人的。相信她很快就会告诉咱们的。

String.Source: Who do you think she is?
String.Dest: 你为什么觉得她是？

String.Source: Ouch! My Thane is tough and demanding. I hope this is merely the setup for later, when you reveal your tender side.
String.Dest: Ouch! My Thane is tough and demanding. I hope this is merely the setup for later, when you reveal your tender side.

String.Source: Good. I don't suffer weaklings in my party.
String.Dest: 很好。我的聚会上不接受弱者。

String.Source: Good. I don't suffer weaklings in my party.
String.Dest: 很好。我的聚会上不接受弱者。

String.Source: I just hope I survive long enough to see it.
String.Dest: 我只希望能活到亲眼看见那一天。

String.Source: You could be the princess I saved from his evil clutches.
String.Dest: 你可以做我从他的魔爪下救出的公主。

String.Source: Oh, I have always wanted to be a princess! And I do enjoy being rescued. But we should save that for the World Eater. I like to aim high.
String.Dest: Oh, I have always wanted to be a princess! And I do enjoy being rescued. But we should save that for the World Eater. I like to aim high.

String.Source: Oh, I have always wanted to be a princess! And I do enjoy being rescued. But the tales already say you saved me from Alduin.
String.Dest: Oh, I have always wanted to be a princess! And I do enjoy being rescued. But the tales already say you saved me from Alduin.

String.Source: You could be the princess I saved from his evil clutches.
String.Dest: 你可以做我从他的魔爪下救出的公主。

String.Source: At least, that is what I've been telling everyone.
String.Dest: 至少，我是已经对所有人都那样说了。

String.Source: You could be the princess I saved from his evil clutches.
String.Dest: 你可以做我从他的魔爪下救出的公主。

String.Source: It will be hard to swap stories when our teeth have fallen out.
String.Dest: 等咱们牙都掉光的时候就很难给彼此讲故事听了。

String.Source: (Laughs) Maybe I can get my sister to conjure us a new set! My liege always knows how to lighten the mood.
String.Dest: （笑）也许可以让我姐姐给咱们召唤出一套新的！我的大王总是有办法哄人开心呢。

String.Source: It will be hard to swap stories when our teeth have fallen out.
String.Dest: 等咱们牙都掉光的时候就很难给彼此讲故事听了。

String.Source: Perhaps that is why even now, while my body feels so tense, you are so relaxed.
String.Dest: 也就是那个原因，现在我全身都紧张透了，而你还这么轻松吧。

String.Source: It will be hard to swap stories when our teeth have fallen out.
String.Dest: 等咱们牙都掉光的时候就很难给彼此讲故事听了。

String.Source: It is Alduin who should fear you. I am sure his scales have already turned gray with worry.
String.Dest: 应该害怕你的是奥杜因。我敢肯定他现在愁得鳞片都白了。

String.Source: It will be hard to swap stories when our teeth have fallen out.
String.Dest: 等咱们牙都掉光的时候就很难给彼此讲故事听了。

String.Source: Just as my hair will every minute you are gone. Be quick, my lord, but be safe.
String.Dest: 离开你的每一分钟我的头发都在掉……要快啊，领主大人，还要保重。

String.Source: And why not? We will have music and dancing, wine and steak, lavenders and roses.
String.Dest: 那还犹豫什么？咱们可以跟着音乐跳起舞，喝红酒吃牛排，闻着薰衣草和玫瑰花。

String.Source: A party in my honor? I wouldn't entrust such an important event to you.
String.Dest: 特意为我准备的派对？我不想把这么重要的事情委托给你。

String.Source: But you can have the Jarl's Steward plan it if you wish. I suppose we could all use a nap.
String.Dest: 可要是你愿意也可以让领主的管家来全盘计划啊。我觉得咱们都该打个盹了。

String.Source: A party in my honor? I wouldn't entrust such an important event to you.
String.Dest: 特意为我准备的派对？我不想把这么重要的事情委托给你。

String.Source: I knew it. So it isn't about being rescued. You just fear magic.
String.Dest: 我就知道。这么说你也不是要被人救。只不过是害怕魔法罢了。

String.Source: (Laughs) True, but that isn't to say I don't mind being rescued by a handsome adventurer. Or a gallant one.
String.Dest: （笑）是的，可那也不是说我不介意被一个英俊的冒险家救出来。或是勇士什么的。

String.Source: Oh, you will still get your thrills, my liege. Just as my sister and I loved playing the Gray Foxes, so will you playing the Guild's newest "thief."
String.Dest: 噢，您马上就要找到兴奋点了，大王。就像我跟姐姐玩的灰狐狸组合一样，您也即将成为公会的“新式盗贼”。

String.Source: But then it wouldn't be stealing. That's the part I like best.
String.Dest: 可那样就不算是偷啦。那才是我最喜欢的部分。

String.Source: The fact that you aren't really stealing will be our little secret.
String.Dest: 关于你其实不偷东西这件事就成了咱们的小秘密啦。

String.Source: But then it wouldn't be stealing. That's the part I like best.
String.Dest: 可那样就不算是偷啦。那才是我最喜欢的部分。

String.Source: I see my liege does not trust me. How disappointing. Maybe I ought to reconsider who I call my favorite companion.
String.Dest: 貌似我家大王不相信我哦。真失望呢。看来我得重新考虑谁是最可爱的伙伴了。

String.Source: I still don't trust her. Maybe we ought to pay her a visit and make sure.
String.Dest: 我还是不相信她。恐怕咱们有必要再找她确认一下。

String.Source: But, it has been some time since her last letter. I'm starting to get worried.
String.Dest: 但是，从她上一次来信的时间已经过去很久了,我开始有些担心了.

String.Source: I still don't trust her. Maybe we ought to pay her a visit and make sure.
String.Dest: 我还是不相信她。恐怕咱们有必要再找她确认一下。

String.Source: We should stop by the Sleeping Giant Inn. Maybe someone has heard something.
String.Dest: 咱们顺道去看看沉睡巨人旅店. 也许有人听说过什么。

String.Source: I still don't trust her. Maybe we ought to pay her a visit and make sure.
String.Dest: 我还是不相信她。恐怕咱们有必要再找她确认一下。

String.Source: When did you last speak to her?
String.Dest: 你上次跟她说过话是什么时候的事？

String.Source: Two years? Three? I am very poor with time. Especially when I am adventuring with my favorite companion.
String.Dest: 两年？三年？我的时间概念很差啦。尤其此刻的我正在和最爱的战友一起冒险呢。

String.Source: When did you last speak to her?
String.Dest: 你上次跟她说过话是什么时候的事？

String.Source: As for her last letter, well, that...has also been a very long while. Too long. Which makes me worry.
String.Dest: 而她最后的一封信，唉，那……也已经是很久以前的事了。太久了。真的让我担心。

String.Source: When did you last speak to her?
String.Dest: 你上次跟她说过话是什么时候的事？

String.Source: We should stop by the Sleeping Giant Inn. Maybe someone has heard something.
String.Dest: 咱们顺道去看看沉睡巨人旅店. 也许有人听说过什么。

String.Source: I love witches. There needs to be more of them.
String.Dest: 我爱女巫，她们应该越多越好。

String.Source: Oh, good! And here I thought this conversation was going to be awkward. Although now it's awkward for another reason.
String.Dest: 噢，很好！我觉得这次对话要变得很尴尬。虽然本来就有一件尴尬的事了。

String.Source: Not all witches are good witches. Actually, I think my sister is the only one. Funny how that works out.
String.Dest: 不是所有的女巫都是好女巫。实际上，我认为我的姐姐是唯一的好女巫。奇怪啊怎么可能。

String.Source: I love witches. There needs to be more of them.
String.Dest: 我爱女巫，她们应该越多越好。

String.Source: I don't know, I mean, I've been in one of her caves. There were goat heads, taproot, and animal bones scattered about.
String.Dest: 我不知道。我是说，我以前是去过她的某个洞穴里。有一些羊头啊，直立根，还有到处散落的动物骨头。

String.Source: You're okay with this? Witches do horrible things.
String.Dest: 你看这没啥想法吗？女巫们做的都是恶心事。

String.Source: And...yes, it was kind of scary. But I've eaten roasted goat, and I've killed a Spriggan, so who am I to judge?
String.Dest: 而且……是的确实有点吓人。但我也吃过烤羊肉，也杀过树精了，还有啥资格说什么呢？

String.Source: You're okay with this? Witches do horrible things.
String.Dest: 你看这没啥想法吗？女巫们做的都是恶心事。

String.Source: A witch? When did that happen?
String.Dest: 一个女巫？到底发生什么事了？

String.Source: That's hard to say. I guess she's always been a bit different, and good with magic.
String.Dest: 那可难说啊。我猜她一直是有点特别，而且擅长魔法。

String.Source: A witch? When did that happen?
String.Dest: 一个女巫？到底发生什么事了？

String.Source: I don't want to say she was born a witch, but at the very least, she's not your typical mage.
String.Dest: 我不想说她生来就是个女巫，但说到底，至少她不是你这种正常的法师。

String.Source: Oh, don't worry, she doesn't kidnap children or anything like that. That would mean she'd have to talk to them.
String.Dest: 哦，别担心，她不绑架孩子什么的。也就是说她只得跟他们说话。

String.Source: Then she's also a dead woman.
String.Dest: 那她也死定了。

String.Source: I'd like to meet your sister. She sounds fun.
String.Dest: 我可以见见你姐姐，听起来挺有趣的。

String.Source: Does she? My hero, you have not been listening to me, or you would remember my sister isn't the friendly sort.
String.Dest: 是吗？我的英雄你根本没听我说话啊，不然你肯定记得我这姐姐可不是什么善茬儿。

String.Source: I'd like to meet your sister. She sounds fun.
String.Dest: 我可以见见你姐姐，听起来挺有趣的。

String.Source: That's why she lives in a cave. She's kind of a witch.
String.Dest: 之所以她住在洞穴。就是等于一个女巫。

String.Source: Oh, I think she moves around. She can't really live in the city. She's kind of a witch.
String.Dest: 哦，我想她就在附近到处露宿。她没法真正在城市里定居。某种程度上来说她是个女巫。

String.Source: Where does she live?
String.Dest: 她住哪儿?

String.Source: I never asked. Whatever happened to your sister?
String.Dest: I never asked. Whatever happened to your sister?

String.Source: Well...my sister doesn't come to Riverwood very often.
String.Dest: 呃……我姐姐不是特别常来溪木镇。

String.Source: I never asked. Whatever happened to your sister?
String.Dest: I never asked. Whatever happened to your sister?

String.Source: But she sends a letter every now and then, just to let me know she's alive. She can take care of herself, but that does not mean I don't worry.
String.Dest: 但她偶尔还会给我寄上一封信，来让我知道她还活着。她当然能照顾好自己，可那我也放不下心。

String.Source: I had no idea it was over something so stupid.
String.Dest: 真没想到是为了这么蠢的理由。

String.Source: The quarrels of the young often do seem silly. Yet to them, so do the wars fought by those who are fully grown.
String.Dest: The quarrels of the young often do seem silly. Yet to them, so do the wars fought by those who are fully grown.

String.Source: I've forgiven my sister, so far as she needs to be forgiven. I'm not sure she does.
String.Dest: I've forgiven my sister, so far as she needs to be forgiven. I'm not sure she does.

String.Source: I had no idea it was over something so stupid.
String.Dest: 真没想到是为了这么蠢的理由。

String.Source: Ogmund. His voice fits the atmosphere of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 奥蒙德。他的嗓音太有天际的味道了。

String.Source: Oh, it's very appropriate for Markarth, with all their rocks. But does not Sven's voice fit Riverwood, where the water flows smoothly?
String.Dest: 哦，那跟马卡斯城满是石头的地貌还挺配的。但斯万的声音不也完全配得上溪木镇这个流水潺潺的名字么？

String.Source: Ogmund. His voice fits the atmosphere of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 奥蒙德。他的嗓音太有天际的味道了。

String.Source: Although I admit, I am a little biased. We Riverwood folk have to stick together.
String.Dest: 尽管我承认，我是有点点偏见吧。我们溪木镇的居民必须团结一致啊。

String.Source: Ogmund. His voice fits the atmosphere of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 奥蒙德。他的嗓音太有天际的味道了。

String.Source: Either way, we are truly blessed to have so many talented bards around us.
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，有这么多才华横溢的吟游诗人陪我们真是天大的福分啊。

String.Source: It will be, when I kill everyone.
String.Dest: 会的，当我杀光了所有人之后。

String.Source: So the gallant hero turns out to be a wicked villain! What a twist! You do realize, as your former companion, it will be up to me to slay you?
String.Dest: 原来这位殷勤英雄的真面目是个缺德的恶棍哪！真是华丽的转身！你知道吗，身为你的前任随从，要干掉你也是我的责任呢！

String.Source: It will be, when I kill everyone.
String.Dest: 会的，当我杀光了所有人之后。

String.Source: Ah, but surely you were only saying this in jest. If not, I hope you will leave the town dog alone. No one could be so heartless as to kill him.
String.Dest: 啊，当然啦你可能只是开玩笑。如果不是的话，我希望你能放过那条宠物狗。谁也不能那么狠心杀死它啊。

String.Source: It will be, when I kill everyone.
String.Dest: 会的，当我杀光了所有人之后。

String.Source: So the gallant hero turns out to be a wicked villain! What a twist! You do realize, as your former companion, it will be up to me to slay you?
String.Dest: 原来这位殷勤英雄的真面目是个缺德的恶棍哪！真是华丽的转身！你知道吗，身为你的前任随从，要干掉你也是我的责任呢！

String.Source: It will be, when I kill everyone.
String.Dest: 会的，当我杀光了所有人之后。

String.Source: Ah, but surely you were only saying this in jest. You aren't the one who killed the town dog, are you? It's hard for me to believe you could.
String.Dest: 啊，当然你也只是开玩笑的。你不是杀死村里小狗的那个凶手对吧？我绝对没法相信你下得去手啊。

String.Source: Is that so? I have lived in Whiterun Hold all my life. I think this is as much my fight as it is Balgruuf's.
String.Dest: 是么？我生下来就一直住在雪漫领。这场战斗对我而言跟巴尔古夫一样的重要。

String.Source: You can stay here. This isn't your fight anyway.
String.Dest: 你可以呆在这，反正这不是你的战斗。

String.Source: But it is your decision. We can't all charge ahead. The dragon could just as easily come here, and someone must safeguard the people.
String.Dest: 但这是你的决定。我们不能都冲出去。那头龙随时可能过来，一定要有人在这里守护平民。

String.Source: You can stay here. This isn't your fight anyway.
String.Dest: 你可以呆在这，反正这不是你的战斗。

String.Source: That is very kind of you, my liege. Perhaps then, the world will remember me as I remember myself. Beautiful, elegant, and a bit naive.
String.Dest: That is very kind of you, my liege. Perhaps then, the world will remember me as I remember myself. Beautiful, elegant, and a bit naive.

String.Source: Yes, but perhaps in the tales, I'll have all the scars.
String.Dest: 是的，不过也许在故事里，那些伤疤是在我身上才对。

String.Source: Yes, but perhaps in the tales, I'll have all the scars.
String.Dest: 是的，不过也许在故事里，那些伤疤是在我身上才对。

String.Source: The Diamond of Riverwood. Not at all like the lump of coal you see before you.
String.Dest: The Diamond of Riverwood. Not at all like the lump of coal you see before you.

String.Source: That would be a problem, my Thane. I don't think I can be rescued by anyone who could live up to you.
String.Dest: 那就成问题啦，我的男爵。我不认为我能被哪个可能比得上人所救。

String.Source: I will slay Alduin, but I can't guarantee I'll survive. This could be goodbye.
String.Dest: 我一定会杀了奥杜因，但我不能保证能活着回来。这可能是永别了。

String.Source: I will slay Alduin, but I can't guarantee I'll survive. This could be goodbye.
String.Dest: 我一定会杀了奥杜因，但我不能保证能活着回来。这可能是永别了。

String.Source: If I were still a maiden of Riverwood, I would put my head against my brow and faint into your arms at hearing such words.
String.Dest: 如果我还是个溪木镇的普通村姑，听到这话就会头晕目眩地倒在你怀里啦。

String.Source: I will slay Alduin, but I can't guarantee I'll survive. This could be goodbye.
String.Dest: 我一定会杀了奥杜因，但我不能保证能活着回来。这可能是永别了。

String.Source: But I am not that girl. I am a hardened warrior. And I know that any time we step on that battlefield, it could mean goodbye.
String.Dest: 但我不是那小女孩。我是个老练的战士。我也知道咱们踏入战场的每一刻，都可能意味着永别。

String.Source: If you die, I will do my best to keep a brave face. Even if the girl inside will never stop crying.
String.Dest: 你要是死了，我会尽力装出坚强的表情。即使心里的小女孩会哭得停不下来。

String.Source: I will slay Alduin, but I can't guarantee I'll survive. This could be goodbye.
String.Dest: 我一定会杀了奥杜因，但我不能保证能活着回来。这可能是永别了。

String.Source: I will slay Alduin, but I can't guarantee I'll survive. This could be goodbye.
String.Dest: 我一定会杀了奥杜因，但我不能保证能活着回来。这可能是永别了。

String.Source: Yet even if you are unsure, I believe you will return. No, I know you will. Let the world worry. Let Alduin worry. I will not.
String.Dest: 但就算你自己不确定，我也相信你会回来。不，我肯定你会回来的。让世界去担心吧。让奥杜因去担心。反正我是不担心啦。

String.Source: Thank you, my liege. I wonder if I can convince the Companions to make it a proper ball? I would very much like to fit Aela into a dress.
String.Dest: 谢谢你，大王。我想有没有可能说服战友团开个像样的舞会？我很想给艾拉穿条漂亮的长裙。

String.Source: That's an excellent idea. We can celebrate Kodlak's life.
String.Dest: 真是个好主意。我们可以向克拉科的生命致敬。

String.Source: That's an excellent idea. We can celebrate Kodlak's life.
String.Dest: 真是个好主意。我们可以向克拉科的生命致敬。

String.Source: We can have music and dancing, and invite all our friends from across Skyrim. This may take months to plan, but it will be a labor of love.
String.Dest: 咱们可以唱歌跳舞，请全天际所有的朋友一起来。这可能需要几个月的时间来计划，但这么有爱的事情累点也心甘哪。

String.Source: That's an excellent idea. We can celebrate Kodlak's life.
String.Dest: 真是个好主意。我们可以向克拉科的生命致敬。

String.Source: Or I suppose we can have a small affair, with your shield-sisters and brothers, and maybe a cousin or two as well. We'll see.
String.Dest: 或者我们能来点小规模的，只跟那些盾牌姐妹和盾牌兄弟来玩，也许再叫上一两个表亲。到时候看呗。

String.Source: That Mara priestess tried that. She said you can't put a price on everything.
String.Dest: 那个玛拉女祭司试过了。她说你不能拿金钱衡量一切事物。

String.Source: True, my Thane, but I don't think the Thieves Guild is out to steal sentimental items.
String.Dest: 是的，男爵大人，然而我不认为盗贼工会是来夺人所爱的。

String.Source: That Mara priestess tried that. She said you can't put a price on everything.
String.Dest: 那个玛拉女祭司试过了。她说你不能拿金钱衡量一切事物。

String.Source: In any case, if you want to be a thief, you can do so without stealing. The Guild won't have to know. It will be our little secret.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，就算你想做贼，不偷东西也能做。反正让公会不知道就行。就当咱们之间的小秘密。

String.Source: It's still theft. Some things are worth more than gold.
String.Dest: 那也还是偷！有些东西比金钱更贵重！

String.Source: True, my Thane, but I don't think the Thieves Guild is out to steal sentimental items.
String.Dest: 是的，男爵大人，然而我不认为盗贼工会是来夺人所爱的。

String.Source: It's still theft. Some things are worth more than gold.
String.Dest: 那也还是偷！有些东西比金钱更贵重！

String.Source: In any case, if you want to be a thief, you can do so without stealing. The Guild won't have to know. It will be our little secret.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，就算你想做贼，不偷东西也能做。反正让公会不知道就行。就当咱们之间的小秘密。

String.Source: Would it not be better the other way around? If you were my servant, you could slip away unseen.
String.Dest: 要是反过来想想会不会更好呢？如果你是我的仆人，你就能悄悄跑掉了。

String.Source: You should come. We can pretend you're my servant.
String.Dest: 你应该来。咱们就装作你是我的仆从。

String.Source: But then I would have entertain all the important guests.
String.Dest: 但那我就不得不去亲自招待所有的贵宾了。

String.Source: You should come. We can pretend you're my servant.
String.Dest: 你应该来。咱们就装作你是我的仆从。

String.Source: And I hate to admit it, but I have forgotten how to mingle with strangers. I'm sure you will do fine on your on.
String.Dest: 我不想承认，我已经忘了怎么跟陌生人打交道。我肯定你会干的挺好的。

String.Source: You should come. We can pretend you're my servant.
String.Dest: 你应该来。咱们就装作你是我的仆从。

String.Source: I find them both awful and I'd lop off my ears before hearing another verse.
String.Dest: 我觉得这俩都很烂要是再让我听一句我干脆切掉自己的耳朵算了。

String.Source: So picky and yet so passionate. It's a bit tragic, I think, to want to love something so desperately and yet be unable to find anything worth loving.
String.Dest: 那么挑剔却又那么热情似火。真是挺悲剧的我觉得，一边渴望付出爱的同时却又找不到什么值得去爱。

String.Source: I think you should maybe lower your standards, hm? Finicky people tend to be unhappy. Why not enjoy music? Why not sing instead of grumble?
String.Dest: 我觉得你得降低自己的标准，是吧？挑剔的人往往不愉快。为什么不享受音乐呢？为什么不用歌唱代替抱怨呢？

String.Source: I find them both awful and I'd lop off my ears before hearing another verse.
String.Dest: 我觉得这俩都很烂要是再让我听一句我干脆切掉自己的耳朵算了。

String.Source: It would be fun to wear them. But not the kind the Nords wear.
String.Dest: 穿那种衣服应该挺好玩的。只要别是诺德人的款式就行。

String.Source: It would be fun to see you in some fine robes.
String.Dest: 你穿上精致长袍的样子肯定很有趣。

String.Source: It would be fun to see you in some fine robes.
String.Dest: 你穿上精致长袍的样子肯定很有趣。

String.Source: I would like to wear an elegant gown, the kind they have in the islands, where every day is a summer one.
String.Dest: 我想穿件优雅的长袍，那些人在岛上穿的那种，就是每天都是夏天的那座岛。

String.Source: It would be fun to see you in some fine robes.
String.Dest: 你穿上精致长袍的样子肯定很有趣。

String.Source: Perhaps if my hero were to take me outside of Skyrim, I will have reason to do so. But until then, I am content with what I have now.
String.Dest: 若是有朝一日我家英雄要带我离开天际，那就有理由一试。但在那之前，我对现状是心满意足哒。

String.Source: Admit it. Painting the snow with bandit blood is fun.
String.Dest: Admit it. Painting the snow with bandit blood is fun.

String.Source: My liege does enjoy killing them, and perhaps his favorite companion does too. If only bandits bled different colors, we could be true artists.
String.Dest: 我家大王杀得性起呢，也许他最爱的跟班也一样。要是那帮强盗能流出不同颜色的血，咱们就成了艺术家啦。

String.Source: Don't worry Zora. I'll protect you.
String.Dest: Don't worry Zora. I'll protect you.

String.Source: My prince is too kind. But as I said before, I may look puny, but I fight bigger than my size.
String.Dest: My prince is too kind. But as I said before, I may look puny, but I fight bigger than my size.

String.Source: Don't worry Zora. I'll protect you.
String.Dest: Don't worry Zora. I'll protect you.

String.Source: Granted, we may all look puny to a dragon. But I will try. I will do my best not to shrink.
String.Dest: Granted, we may all look puny to a dragon. But I will try. I will do my best not to shrink.

String.Source: Don't worry Zora. I'll protect you.
String.Dest: Don't worry Zora. I'll protect you.

String.Source: My princess is too kind. But as I said before, I may look puny, but I fight bigger than my size.
String.Dest: My princess is too kind. But as I said before, I may look puny, but I fight bigger than my size.

String.Source: Don't worry Zora. I'll protect you.
String.Dest: Don't worry Zora. I'll protect you.

String.Source: Granted, we may all look puny to a dragon. But I will try. I will do my best not to shrink.
String.Dest: Granted, we may all look puny to a dragon. But I will try. I will do my best not to shrink.

String.Source: I am pleased to see you remembered my name. But that name is like the name Fair-Child. It reminds me of what I have lost.
String.Dest: I am pleased to see you remembered my name. But that name is like the name Fair-Child. It reminds me of what I have lost.

String.Source: Let the tales say I fought Movarth with the Diamond of Riverwood at my side.
String.Dest: 让溪木镇的钻石跟我并肩对抗莫瓦斯的故事流传开来吧。

String.Source: Once I'm a legend, I won't have time to talk to common folk like yourself.
String.Dest: 总有一天我也会成为传说。到时候就没空跟你这样的俗人废话了。

String.Source: Is that so? Perhaps I was wrong. My hero is confident and arrogant. Wealthy and greedy. Powerful and mean.
String.Dest: Is that so? Perhaps I was wrong. My hero is confident and arrogant. Wealthy and greedy. Powerful and mean.

String.Source: Once I'm a legend, I won't have time to talk to common folk like yourself.
String.Dest: 总有一天我也会成为传说。到时候就没空跟你这样的俗人废话了。

String.Source: But if you save the world, you will have saved everything I love, so I can forgive you for all three.
String.Dest: 但如果你拯救了世界，也就挽救了一切我爱的事物，你的那三个缺点我就全都能原谅啦。

String.Source: Well, you don't always have my back. You do charge on ahead from time to time.
String.Dest: Well, you don't always have my back. You do charge on ahead from time to time.

String.Source: Very funny, my Thane. But yes, Gorr once taught me that against a tough opponent, aggression will even the odds.
String.Dest: Very funny, my Thane. But yes, Gorr once taught me that against a tough opponent, aggression will even the odds.

String.Source: Well, you don't always have my back. You do charge on ahead from time to time.
String.Dest: Well, you don't always have my back. You do charge on ahead from time to time.

String.Source: And when I sense someone is in danger, I forget about my own fears. At that moment, I am not fighting a mage. I am fighting for my friends.
String.Dest: And when I sense someone is in danger, I forget about my own fears. At that moment, I am not fighting a mage. I am fighting for my friends.

String.Source: I thank you, but it seems rather gauche. Many are still in mourning.
String.Dest: 谢谢你吧，但感觉还是很勉强的，许多人仍处于哀痛之中。

String.Source: Are you sure? I don't feel sad. I was at first, but knowing Kodlak is in Sovngarde fills me with hope.
String.Dest: 你确定吗？我现在不觉得悲伤了。本来是有的，但现在知道克拉科去了松加德，就又让我充满了希望。

String.Source: I thank you, but it seems rather gauche. Many are still in mourning.
String.Dest: 谢谢你吧，但感觉还是很勉强的，许多人仍处于哀痛之中。

String.Source: But I admit, maybe I just want an excuse to throw a party. Imagine the music and the dancing, and the flower arrangements! I hope you reconsider.
String.Dest: 但我承认，也许我只是想找借口开个派对。想想那些音乐啊舞蹈啊，还有成束的鲜花！希望你再考虑下嘛。

String.Source: Surely my Thane jests. Your coin purse is as bottomless as Gorr's stomach. I hope I am not following a stingy noble.
String.Dest: 对啊俺家男爵在搞笑呢。你的钱包是和戈尔的肚皮一样的无底洞。希望我自己不是在给吝啬鬼当差哦。

String.Source: Sure, if it comes out of your pocket. I don't have that kind of money.
String.Dest: 当然，只要是从你口袋里出来的。我可没有这样的钱。

String.Source: Sure, if it comes out of your pocket. I don't have that kind of money.
String.Dest: 当然，只要是从你口袋里出来的。我可没有这样的钱。

String.Source: In any case, if you want to be a thief, you can do so without stealing. The Guild won't have to know. It will be our little secret.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，就算你想做贼，不偷东西也能做。反正让公会不知道就行。就当咱们之间的小秘密。

String.Source: Sure, if it comes out of your pocket. I don't have that kind of money.
String.Dest: 当然，只要是从你口袋里出来的。我可没有这样的钱。

String.Source: I would if I could my Thane, but my coin purse is as empty as Embry's mug. But perhaps we could change that before you join the Guild.
String.Dest: 无米之炊呀大人。我这钱包空得跟安布瑞的杯子一样。但也许咱们能在你加入公会之前改变这一现状。

String.Source: Sure, if it comes out of your pocket. I don't have that kind of money.
String.Dest: 当然，只要是从你口袋里出来的。我可没有这样的钱。

String.Source: In any case, if you want to be a thief, you can do so without stealing. The Guild won't have to know. It will be our little secret.
String.Dest: 不管怎样，就算你想做贼，不偷东西也能做。反正让公会不知道就行。就当咱们之间的小秘密。

String.Source: That sounds a bit evasive. Trying to play both sides? You would make a good Thane, but a poor Jarl.
String.Dest: 听起来有点闪烁其词。是打算玩个里外通吃吗？这样的话男爵还是可以当当，但做领主就难了。

String.Source: They each are good in their own way.
String.Dest: 他们每个人都有自己的拿手好戏。

String.Source: They each are good in their own way.
String.Dest: 他们每个人都有自己的拿手好戏。

String.Source: Ah, but you are doing just fine in your current job. So I wouldn't worry too much about it.
String.Dest: 啊，但是你把手头的事做的相当好。所以我就没那么担心啦。

String.Source: They each are good in their own way.
String.Dest: 他们每个人都有自己的拿手好戏。

String.Source: Either way, we are truly blessed to have so many talented bards around us.
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，有这么多才华横溢的吟游诗人陪我们真是天大的福分啊。

String.Source: You should try wearing the amulet again. You'd be surprised.
String.Dest: 你应该试着再次戴上那个护身符，你会有惊喜。

String.Source: So is my lord suggesting I become a jester? I think the surprise will be all theirs, and the laughter.
String.Dest: 这么说我的大王建议我去做个小丑？那要说有惊喜和笑声什么的也是他们吧。

String.Source: I get it. You want to be captured.
String.Dest: 我明白了。是你自己喜欢被抓的。

String.Source: Am I that obvious? And here I thought I was being coy. It's become a bit of a game, to see what sort of hero will come to save me.
String.Dest: Am I that obvious? And here I thought I was being coy. It's become a bit of a game, to see what sort of hero will come to save me.

String.Source: I get it. You want to be captured.
String.Dest: 我明白了。是你自己喜欢被抓的。

String.Source: Mostly it's bandits. Although they're not really motivated by the saving part. That's just a means to an end.
String.Dest: Mostly it's bandits. Although they're not really motivated by the saving part. That's just a means to an end.

String.Source: But ultimately, it just means the end of their lives.
String.Dest: 但最终，真正被结果的是他们的性命。

String.Source: I get it. You want to be captured.
String.Dest: 我明白了。是你自己喜欢被抓的。

String.Source: Maybe since you were last here.
String.Dest: 就说从你上次离开到现在吧。

String.Source: How odd. I spent nearly all my life in Riverwood and nothing ever changed, but I guess everything looks bigger when you aren't looking through bars.
String.Dest: 好奇怪啊。我在溪木镇呆了一辈子都没看到什么改变。但也许是目光透过栅栏时会让东西看起来都变大吧。

String.Source: Maybe since you were last here.
String.Dest: 就说从你上次离开到现在吧。

String.Source: I hope at least Stump is out and about. That dog is my favorite person here.
String.Dest: 我希望至少还能看到斯挞普在附近出没。这里我最喜欢的家伙就是这条狗啦。

String.Source: (Diplomatic Immunity) Delphine says I have to attend a Thalmor dinner party.
String.Dest: （外交豁免）戴尔芬说我得去参加一个梭默的晚宴。

String.Source: A party at the Thalmor Embassy! That sounds almost...fun!
String.Dest: A party at the Thalmor Embassy! That sounds almost...fun!

String.Source: (Diplomatic Immunity) Delphine says I have to attend a Thalmor dinner party.
String.Dest: （外交豁免）戴尔芬说我得去参加一个梭默的晚宴。

String.Source: I wish I could attend. But alas, if the Diamond of Riverwood were to make an appearance, there would be far too many glances stolen in her direction.
String.Dest: 真希望我能参加。但可惜呀，一旦溪木镇的钻石在那儿亮了相，所有人的注意力就都会被她偷去啦。

String.Source: I'm here to rescue you.
String.Dest: 我来这里营救你。

String.Source: Are you now? I wasn't aware I needed rescuing, but okay, I suppose you'll do.
String.Dest: Are you now? I wasn't aware I needed rescuing, but okay, I suppose you'll do.

String.Source: I'm here to rescue you.
String.Dest: 我来这里营救你。

String.Source: Are you now? I wasn't aware I needed rescuing, but okay, I suppose you'll do.
String.Dest: Are you now? I wasn't aware I needed rescuing, but okay, I suppose you'll do.

String.Source: I certainly hope so. It's called "tundra cotton." Otherwise they should change the name.
String.Dest: I certainly hope so. It's called "tundra cotton." Otherwise they should change the name.

String.Source: Are you sure it can survive in such a climate?
String.Dest: 你确定它能活在这样的气候下？

String.Source: The feeling is mutual. You're not exactly what I want either.
String.Dest: The feeling is mutual. You're not exactly what I want either.

String.Source: Now, now, let's not fight. We can save that for later, when we find out what it is we don't like about each other.
String.Dest: Now, now, let's not fight. We can save that for later, when we find out what it is we don't like about each other.

String.Source: Perhaps you would prefer a different companion then? One with two eyes and enjoys being treated like a dog?
String.Dest: 也许你是想换一个随从啦？一个喜欢睁大了眼睛喜欢像狗一样被对待的同伴？

String.Source: Why don't you get your eyes checked, or did your sister burn those off too?
String.Dest: 你这眼神该检查一下了，是不是你姐姐把你眼睛也烧瞎啦？

String.Source: Why don't you get your eyes checked, or did your sister burn those off too?
String.Dest: 你这眼神该检查一下了，是不是你姐姐把你眼睛也烧瞎啦？

String.Source: There's Hjoromir, and maybe Stump. One will follow you around on all fours licking your boot, and the other is an actual dog.
String.Dest: 那肖罗密尔很合适，可能斯挞普也行。一个是成天跟在你屁股后面不断讨好的家伙，另一条是真的狗狗。

String.Source: But I would rather you not treat either of them so cruelly, as they are both very nice pets.
String.Dest: 可我还是不希望你对他们任何一个太凶了。因为他俩都是很棒的宠物啊。

String.Source: Why don't you get your eyes checked, or did your sister burn those off too?
String.Dest: 你这眼神该检查一下了，是不是你姐姐把你眼睛也烧瞎啦？

String.Source: Yes...I noticed the um...is that war paint?
String.Dest: 是的...嗯，我注意到...这是幅你的战痕涂装吗？

String.Source: Now don't make things awkward. I am more than comfortable with my own burned skin.
String.Dest: Now don't make things awkward. I am more than comfortable with my own burned skin.

String.Source: Yes...I noticed the um...is that war paint?
String.Dest: 是的...嗯，我注意到...这是幅你的战痕涂装吗？

String.Source: It's a burn, after all, I've tried washing it off to no avail.
String.Dest: It's a burn, after all, I've tried washing it off to no avail.

String.Source: But it hides the scars! That's a good thing. Now, I wasn't always comfortable with it...but living in a cage tends to alter your perspective.
String.Dest: But it hides the scars! That's a good thing. Now, I wasn't always comfortable with it...but living in a cage tends to alter your perspective.

String.Source: Yes...I noticed the um...is that war paint?
String.Dest: 是的...嗯，我注意到...这是幅你的战痕涂装吗？

String.Source: Yes...I noticed the um...is that war paint?
String.Dest: 是的...嗯，我注意到...这是幅你的战痕涂装吗？

String.Source: Now don't make things awkward. I am more than comfortable with my own burned skin.
String.Dest: Now don't make things awkward. I am more than comfortable with my own burned skin.

String.Source: Yes...I noticed the um...is that war paint?
String.Dest: 是的...嗯，我注意到...这是幅你的战痕涂装吗？

String.Source: It's a burn, after all, I've tried washing it off to no avail.
String.Dest: It's a burn, after all, I've tried washing it off to no avail.

String.Source: But it hides the scars! That's a good thing. Now, I wasn't always comfortable with it...but living in a cage tends to alter your perspective.
String.Dest: But it hides the scars! That's a good thing. Now, I wasn't always comfortable with it...but living in a cage tends to alter your perspective.

String.Source: Yes...I noticed the um...is that war paint?
String.Dest: 是的...嗯，我注意到...这是幅你的战痕涂装吗？

String.Source: Well, you never know. It might not say anything. It could be a shy dragon.
String.Dest: 哎，谁知道呢。它也可能什么也不说。可能是条害羞的龙。

String.Source: Now that is positive thinking! It would be very funny if this dragon was a gentle gaint. But after Helgen, it seems more like an angry one.
String.Dest: 这样想就对了！要是这条龙是个温驯的家伙就好玩啦。不过从海尔根出来后，怎么看它都更像是易怒型的。

String.Source: Well, you never know. It might not say anything. It could be a shy dragon.
String.Dest: 哎，谁知道呢。它也可能什么也不说。可能是条害羞的龙。

String.Source: But do not worry about me. I stand up to all giants. I may be small, but when the time comes, I will do my best not to shrink.
String.Dest: 可别为我担心。巨人我是能对付的。我身材是有点小，但真的到了那个时候，我会尽全力不退缩的。

String.Source: There is no room in the tales for anyone but me.
String.Dest: 这些故事里除我之外没有别人的份儿。

String.Source: You don't think that's selfish? Surely, in your seven volume biography, there is a page for little old me?
String.Dest: 你不觉得那算什么自私？当然啦，你的整整七卷的传记里，有哪怕一页稍稍提到过我的事吗？

String.Source: There is no room in the tales for anyone but me.
String.Dest: 这些故事里除我之外没有别人的份儿。

String.Source: But I jest, my liege. I wouldn't want all the attention.
String.Dest: 我开玩笑的，大人。我其实不是那么需要人注意的。

String.Source: Of course I'll return. Who else is going to rescue you from necromancers?
String.Dest: 我当然会回来，不然还会有别人能把你从亡灵术士的手中救出来么？

String.Source: (Laughs) So true. My hero's work is never done. You were my twelfth rescuer, and by far my favorite one.
String.Dest: （笑）确实啊。我家英雄的工作永远干不完。你是第十二个救我的人，也是目前为止我最喜欢的啦。

String.Source: Of course I'll return. Who else is going to rescue you from necromancers?
String.Dest: 我当然会回来，不然还会有别人能把你从亡灵术士的手中救出来么？

String.Source: I still remember the day you came walking through Brittleshin Pass.
String.Dest: 我仍然记得你走进布莱特辛山隘的那一天。

String.Source: Of course I'll return. Who else is going to rescue you from necromancers?
String.Dest: 我当然会回来，不然还会有别人能把你从亡灵术士的手中救出来么？

String.Source: I was hopeful, but not naive enough to think you were any different than the others. I've never been more wrong.
String.Dest: 我确实抱有过希望，但没有天真到会以为你真的与众不同。我从没错得这么一塌糊涂。

String.Source: Of course I'll return. Who else is going to rescue you from necromancers?
String.Dest: 我当然会回来，不然还会有别人能把你从亡灵术士的手中救出来么？

String.Source: You are the Dragonborn. And now, it is the world that needs saving. There will be plenty of time to rescue me later.
String.Dest: 你是伟大的龙裔。现在有整个世界需要你去拯救。之后再救我还有的是时间呢。

String.Source: It's a shame we couldn't save Savos and Mirabelle.
String.Dest: 咱们居然没保住萨沃斯和蜜拉贝尔真是惭愧极了。

String.Source: I know. I imagined Mirabelle as the person my sister should have been. Strong, poised, confident...without any of the sadness.
String.Dest: 我知道。我一直觉得米拉贝尔就是我姐姐应该成为的那个人。强力，正派，自信……毫无悲伤情绪。

String.Source: It's a shame we couldn't save Savos and Mirabelle.
String.Dest: 咱们居然没保住萨沃斯和蜜拉贝尔真是惭愧极了。

String.Source: Her sacrifice will not be forgotten. She gave her life so others could live. She was a true hero.
String.Dest: 她的牺牲会为人们所铭记。献出了自己来拯救大家的生命。她是真正的英雄。

String.Source: There's people you don't like? (Laughs) I thought my liege was friendly with everyone. Especially with those in the Cloud District.
String.Dest: 还有你不喜欢的人？（笑）我还以为大人您对谁都是老好人呢。尤其是那些自称来自云霄区的家伙。

String.Source: A party? Just don't invite anyone I don't like.
String.Dest: 一个派对？只要别请来我不喜欢的人就成。

String.Source: A party? Just don't invite anyone I don't like.
String.Dest: 一个派对？只要别请来我不喜欢的人就成。

String.Source: But you're right, a small group is best. The Companions, and your companions.
String.Dest: 但你说的对，小团队才是最好的。比如战友团，和你的随从们。

String.Source: Pay for the things we steal? Are you out of your mind?
String.Dest: 为偷来的东西付钱？你脑袋进水了？

String.Source: Maybe I am, but the Zora of my childhood was not. We can help the townsfolk and the Guild, although I rather we just helped one.
String.Dest: 也许吧，但我童年记忆里的佐拉不会。我们可以帮助市民和公会，尽管我宁愿只帮一个。

String.Source: Pay for the things we steal? Are you out of your mind?
String.Dest: 为偷来的东西付钱？你脑袋进水了？

String.Source: But if my Jarl is insistent on joining the Guild, this way everyone wins, and no one has to know why. It will be our little secret.
String.Dest: 但如果我家领主坚持加入公会，这就皆大欢喜了，而且别人不需要知道原因。这是咱们的小秘密。

String.Source: Sven's melodic timbre is by far superior.
String.Dest: 斯万的乐感和音色都超好的。

String.Source: Are you just saying that to get on my good side? Well my hero, it's working.
String.Dest: 你这么说是为了哄我开心吗？好吧英雄，起作用了。

String.Source: Sven's melodic timbre is by far superior.
String.Dest: 斯万的乐感和音色都超好的。

String.Source: I prefer Sven, but I must admit I am a little biased. We Riverwood folk have to stick together.
String.Dest: 我更喜欢斯万, 但我得承认是有点儿偏向他。我们溪木镇的人就应该团结嘛。

String.Source: Sven's melodic timbre is by far superior.
String.Dest: 斯万的乐感和音色都超好的。

String.Source: Either way, we are truly blessed to have so many talented bards around us.
String.Dest: 不管怎么说，有这么多才华横溢的吟游诗人陪我们真是天大的福分啊。

String.Source: Sven's melodic timbre is by far superior.
String.Dest: 斯万的乐感和音色都超好的。

String.Source: Oh, are you saying that because you fancy Sven? My my, I didn't know my hero was also my competition.
String.Dest: 噢，你是不是因为中意斯万才这么说的？噢，天，真没想到我家英雄居然也成了我的情敌。

String.Source: Well my lady, you can have him. Although first you may have to deal with Camilla. Or does she like Faendal?
String.Dest: 好吧女主人，就把他让给您啦。不过您可能还得先解决卡米拉。或者她喜欢的可能是法恩达尔？

String.Source: Sven's melodic timbre is by far superior.
String.Dest: 斯万的乐感和音色都超好的。

String.Source: Sven's melodic timbre is by far superior.
String.Dest: 斯万的乐感和音色都超好的。

String.Source: I forget who is in love with who. Either way, we are truly blessed to have so many talented bards around us.
String.Dest: 我忘记是谁先爱上谁了。不管怎么说, 能和这么多才华横溢的吟游诗人在一起真是咱们的福气呀。

String.Source: What are your thoughts on joining the Thieves Guild?
String.Dest: 你对加入盗贼工会有什么想法吗？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: When I was young, my parents would give me and my sister gold to buy goods from the Trader, back when it was run by Lucan's father.
String.Dest: 在我很小的时候，爸妈就给我和姐姐零花钱去店里买东西，那时候还是卢坎的老爹在经营呢。

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 你想谈什么？

String.Source: What are your thoughts on joining the Thieves Guild?
String.Dest: 你对加入盗贼工会有什么想法吗？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: Of course, as young girls with healthy imaginations, we had no intention of simply buying the goods.
String.Dest: 当然啦，作为思维开阔幻想多的小女孩呢，我们并不是去简单地买东西的。

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 你想谈什么？

String.Source: One of us would try and steal the items, while the other would sneak the gold into old man Valerius' pocket.
String.Dest: 我们俩会有一个去偷东西，另一个负责把金币偷偷放进瓦勒瑞斯老爹的口袋里。

String.Source: What are your thoughts on joining the Thieves Guild?
String.Dest: 你对加入盗贼工会有什么想法吗？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 你想谈什么？

String.Source: The old man would play along, and pretend he couldn't see us crouched to the ground, scuttling around behind him.
String.Dest: 而那老大爷也超配合的装作看不见。我们就在地上爬着，绕着他到处转悠。

String.Source: What are your thoughts on joining the Thieves Guild?
String.Dest: 你对加入盗贼工会有什么想法吗？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 你想谈什么？

String.Source: What are your thoughts on joining the Thieves Guild?
String.Dest: 你对加入盗贼工会有什么想法吗？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 你想谈什么？

String.Source: He called us the Gray Foxes. We truly were as thick as thieves.
String.Dest: 他管我们叫灰狐狸组合。我们玩的也确实跟做贼一样。

String.Source: What are your thoughts on joining the Thieves Guild?
String.Dest: 你对加入盗贼工会有什么想法吗？

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: In any case, I was thinking. If the Thieves Guild asks you to steal from someone, maybe we could do the same.
String.Dest: 无论如何，我想说的是：如果盗贼工会让你去偷某人的东西，咱们也能那么玩。

String.Source: What's on your mind?
String.Dest: 你想谈什么？

String.Source: Well, just because it's the same place doesn't mean it's the same party. There will be different guests, and different songs, and different memories.
String.Dest: 呃，虽然是同样的地方但未必是同样的聚会。来些是不一样的客人，唱的是不一样的曲，留下的是不同的记忆。

String.Source: We already had one of those. Remember, after Gren's rebellion.
String.Dest: 那样的聚会咱们已经开过一次了。记得把，在格伦的叛乱之后。

String.Source: We already had one of those. Remember, after Gren's rebellion.
String.Dest: 那样的聚会咱们已经开过一次了。记得把，在格伦的叛乱之后。

String.Source: But if it really means that much, we can hold it inside the giant boat instead of out on the deck.
String.Dest: 但如果它真的那么有意义，咱们不妨一直在船里玩而不必跑到甲板上。

String.Source: We already had one of those. Remember, after Gren's rebellion.
String.Dest: 那样的聚会咱们已经开过一次了。记得把，在格伦的叛乱之后。

String.Source: At least I won't have to worry about the rain.
String.Dest: 至少我是再也不担心下雨啦。

String.Source: (Dragon Rising) Are you frightened?
String.Dest: （龙族崛起）你害怕了吗？

String.Source: Does my lord doubt me? I am not frightened, but anxious. Dragons have claws sharper than steel, and scales as hard as ebony.
String.Dest: Does my lord doubt me? I am not frightened, but anxious. Dragons have claws sharper than steel, and scales as hard as ebony.

String.Source: But if I fear anything, I fear their breath, for a dragon's very words can kill, or so the legends say.
String.Dest: 可要说我怕什么的话，我只害怕他们的呼吸，因为龙嘴里吐出的每个字眼都能杀人，反正传说中是那样的。

String.Source: (Dragon Rising) Are you frightened?
String.Dest: （龙族崛起）你害怕了吗？

String.Source: Yet I am more frightened for the people of Riverwood.
String.Dest: 不过我更大的担心还是在溪木镇的村民。

String.Source: (Dragon Rising) Are you frightened?
String.Dest: （龙族崛起）你害怕了吗？

String.Source: (Dragon Rising) Are you frightened?
String.Dest: （龙族崛起）你害怕了吗？

String.Source: So I will have to be stronger than steel and tougher than ebony. You won't have to hold your breath, but it will help if this dragon does.
String.Dest: 所以我只得变得比钢铁更刚强，比乌木更犀利。您是没必要屏住呼吸，但如果这条龙可以就太好了。。

String.Source: Not just any horn, the Horn of Jurgen Windcaller. I wonder what happens if you blow it?
String.Dest: Not just any horn, the Horn of Jurgen Windcaller. I wonder what happens if you blow it?

String.Source: (The Horn of Jurgen Windcaller) The Greybeards want me to fetch a horn.
String.Dest: （“唤风者”约根号角）灰胡子要我去取得号角。

String.Source: (The Horn of Jurgen Windcaller) The Greybeards want me to fetch a horn.
String.Dest: （“唤风者”约根号角）灰胡子要我去取得号角。

String.Source: It would be too tempting not to. Which is why it's best if you hold on to it.
String.Dest: 我是肯定忍不住要试试看的。所以说还是您自己保管它比较好啦。

String.Source: (The Horn of Jurgen Windcaller) The Greybeards want me to fetch a horn.
String.Dest: （“唤风者”约根号角）灰胡子要我去取得号角。

String.Source: If I see a button, I have to press it. If I see a lever, I have to pull it. If I see a horn, I will make it play music.
String.Dest: 看见按钮，我就非按不可。看见扳手呢，就非拉一下不可。看见号角嘛，就一定得把它玩出点音乐来。

String.Source: (The Horn of Jurgen Windcaller) The Greybeards want me to fetch a horn.
String.Dest: （“唤风者”约根号角）灰胡子要我去取得号角。

String.Source: This is not good if the buttons and levers have traps, and if the horn summons a dragon. At least, that's what the tales say magic horns do.
String.Dest: 要是那些按钮和扳手会启动陷阱就不好啦，还有要是魔法号角会招来恶龙什么的。至少故事里的魔法号角都是干这个的。

String.Source: Movarth is dead. Morthal should be safe for now.
String.Dest: Movarth is dead. Morthal should be safe for now.

String.Source: And saved by a true hero. As one of your companions, I wonder if they will include me in the tales?
String.Dest: And saved by a true hero. As one of your companions, I wonder if they will include me in the tales?

String.Source: Movarth is dead. Morthal should be safe for now.
String.Dest: Movarth is dead. Morthal should be safe for now.

String.Source: She had arms as skinny as mountain flowers, but a heart as full as a lion. Zora Brave-Child, they called her.
String.Dest: She had arms as skinny as mountain flowers, but a heart as full as a lion. Zora Brave-Child, they called her.

String.Source: The Eye of Magnus has been contained. It seems Winterhold is safe.
String.Dest: 玛格努斯之眼已经被控制，看来冬堡安全了。

String.Source: Yes, and it could not have been easy for you. I myself have often avoided clashes with mages.
String.Dest: 是啊，这对你来说肯定不容易。我自己通常是避免跟法师冲突的。

String.Source: The Eye of Magnus has been contained. It seems Winterhold is safe.
String.Dest: 玛格努斯之眼已经被控制，看来冬堡安全了。

String.Source: The truth is, that's part of the reason I get captured in Brittleshin Pass. I never put up a fight.
String.Dest: 其实呢，我之所以在布莱特辛山隘被抓住的部分原因是……根本没想反抗。

String.Source: The Eye of Magnus has been contained. It seems Winterhold is safe.
String.Dest: 玛格努斯之眼已经被控制，看来冬堡安全了。

String.Source: Yet you inspire me, my Thane. I know now it's not about me. It's about protecting the members of the College, and you.
String.Dest: 但你点醒了我，我的男爵。现在我明白这不光是我自己的事。这是在保护学院的所有成员，还有你。

String.Source: Knowing that you depend me, that you trust me watch your back, means everything. I don't have to be brave. I just have to be there.
String.Dest: 知道你那么信任我，让我帮你殿后，就足以说明一切了。我不再需要什么勇气，只要跟你在一起。

String.Source: The Eye of Magnus has been contained. It seems Winterhold is safe.
String.Dest: 玛格努斯之眼已经被控制，看来冬堡安全了。

String.Source: What are your thoughts on joining the Thieves Guild?
String.Dest: 你对加入盗贼工会有什么想法吗？

String.Source: That depends, my Thane, on who you are stealing from. I have heard tales of dashing rogues who steal from the rich to give to the poor.
String.Dest: 这个嘛我的领主，就看你是从谁那儿偷的啦。我听过很多潇洒侠盗劫富济贫的故事呢。

String.Source: What are your thoughts on joining the Thieves Guild?
String.Dest: 你对加入盗贼工会有什么想法吗？

String.Source: But I don't think Brynjolf is that sort of thief. Still, perhaps my Thane will entertain a thought from his companion before he resorts to crime.
String.Dest: 但是我不认为布林乔夫是那种类型的贼。然而，也许我们的领主老爷会在采取非法手段之前会乐意听一听他的伙伴的想法。

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) I'm off to kill the World Eater. Wish me luck.
String.Dest: （龙霄宫）我要去杀世界吞噬者了。祝我好运吧。

String.Source: So this is it, my lord. You are off to Sovngarde to save the world, all by your lonesome. Are you sure there isn't room on that dragon's back for me?
String.Dest: 那么就此别过啦，主人。你就要孤身一人前去松加德拯救世界了。你确定龙背上就没有多载一个人的位置啦？

String.Source: But I trust you, Dragonborn. You can do this on your own.
String.Dest: 可我相信你，龙裔。你一定可以的。

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) I'm off to kill the World Eater. Wish me luck.
String.Dest: （龙霄宫）我要去杀世界吞噬者了。祝我好运吧。

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) I'm off to kill the World Eater. Wish me luck.
String.Dest: （龙霄宫）我要去杀世界吞噬者了。祝我好运吧。

String.Source: You are brave, but not foolish. Caring, but not weak. A champion, but one of the people.
String.Dest: 你很勇敢，却不鲁莽。有爱心，而不软弱。是个勇士，心中又有人民。

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) I'm off to kill the World Eater. Wish me luck.
String.Dest: （龙霄宫）我要去杀世界吞噬者了。祝我好运吧。

String.Source: I don't wish you luck, my lord. I wish you a safe return. I wish you long life, love, and happiness.
String.Dest: 我不祝您好运，我的主人。我谨祝您平安归来。愿您长寿，收获爱情，和快乐。

String.Source: (Dragonsreach) I'm off to kill the World Eater. Wish me luck.
String.Dest: （龙霄宫）我要去杀世界吞噬者了。祝我好运吧。

String.Source: I wish to see you old and gray, walking through the doors of the Sleeping Giant Inn, just to say hello to an old friend.
String.Dest: 希望看见你在白发苍苍的年纪，还会走进沉睡巨人旅店，专程来跟一位老朋友打个招呼。

String.Source: The world is safe. Alduin is dead.
String.Dest: The world is safe. Alduin is dead.

String.Source: And I did not doubt you for one minute, my lord. You are the Dragonborn. The Savior of Skyrim. My rescuer, my champion, and my best friend.
String.Dest: 而我对您从没有过丝毫的怀疑，大人。您是龙裔，是天际的拯救者。我的救星，我的勇士，和我最棒的朋友。

String.Source: The world is safe. Alduin is dead.
String.Dest: The world is safe. Alduin is dead.

String.Source: They will shout your name across mead halls great and small, now until the end of time.
String.Dest: 所有人都将在蜜酒之厅一直呼喊你的名字，直到时间的尽头。

String.Source: (Companions Quest) Kodlak Whitemane is in Sovngarde, and I am Harbinger.
String.Dest: （战友团任务）克拉科．白鬃已入沉睡净土，而我成了头领。

String.Source: I love happy endings. Kodlak is happy, Aela is happy, and my lady can now choose her own destiny.
String.Dest: I love happy endings. Kodlak is happy, Aela is happy, and my lady can now choose her own destiny.

String.Source: (Companions Quest) Kodlak Whitemane is in Sovngarde, and I am Harbinger.
String.Dest: （战友团任务）克拉科．白鬃已入沉睡净土，而我成了头领。

String.Source: This is a cause for celebration! And what better place to hold a party than the patio behind Jorrvaskr! I will be in charge of planning, of course.
String.Dest: This is a cause for celebration! And what better place to hold a party than the patio behind Jorrvaskr! I will be in charge of planning, of course.

String.Source: (Companions Quest) Kodlak Whitemane is in Sovngarde, and I am Harbinger.
String.Dest: （战友团任务）克拉科．白鬃已入沉睡净土，而我成了头领。

String.Source: I love happy endings. Kodlak is happy, Aela is happy, and my Thane can now choose his own destiny.
String.Dest: I love happy endings. Kodlak is happy, Aela is happy, and my Thane can now choose his own destiny.

String.Source: (Companions Quest) Kodlak Whitemane is in Sovngarde, and I am Harbinger.
String.Dest: （战友团任务）克拉科．白鬃已入沉睡净土，而我成了头领。

String.Source: This is a cause for celebration! And what better place to hold a party than the patio behind Jorrvaskr! I will be in charge of planning, of course.
String.Dest: This is a cause for celebration! And what better place to hold a party than the patio behind Jorrvaskr! I will be in charge of planning, of course.

String.Source: I can nock an arrow as swiftly as I can sever a head. But it's not nearly as fun.
String.Dest: I can nock an arrow as swiftly as I can sever a head. But it's not nearly as fun.

String.Source: I'll consider it. Just try not to get in my way.
String.Dest: 我会考虑的，只要你别碍我的事。

String.Source: As a Breton, I also have a knack for spells, although I'm not the prodigy my sister was.
String.Dest: 身为布莱顿族人，我也具备娴熟的施法技巧，只是不像我姐姐那么天才。

String.Source: I'll consider it. Just try not to get in my way.
String.Dest: 我会考虑的，只要你别碍我的事。

String.Source: True beauty is on the inside. So you have none.
String.Dest: 真正的美是内在的，所以你一点都不美。

String.Source: Ouch. It has fangs! Yet what worries me more, is that it speaks truth!
String.Dest: Ouch. It has fangs! Yet what worries me more, is that it speaks truth!

String.Source: I couldn't loathe my sister for what she did. Not now that I know her pain.
String.Dest: I couldn't loathe my sister for what she did. Not now that I know her pain.

String.Source: Do what?
String.Dest: 做什么？

String.Source: Now, but not then. Oh no, I was sufficiently devastated. My beauty was all that I had. It defined me. But it was the ugliness that hurt the most.
String.Dest: Now, but not then. Oh no, I was sufficiently devastated. My beauty was all that I had. It defined me. But it was the ugliness that hurt the most.

String.Source: You seem rather understanding of the whole ordeal.
String.Dest: 你似乎对整个考验挺了解的。

String.Source: The way people, not just men, looked at me. Always with that cringe. They all do it.
String.Dest: The way people, not just men, looked at me. Always with that cringe. They all do it.

String.Source: You seem rather understanding of the whole ordeal.
String.Dest: 你似乎对整个考验挺了解的。

String.Source: I hardly noticed.
String.Dest: 我几乎没注意到。

String.Source: I've always wanted to meet a handsome man with poor eyesight.
String.Dest: 我一直想找到一个眼神很差的大帅哥。

String.Source: I hardly noticed.
String.Dest: 我几乎没注意到。

String.Source: I've always wanted to meet a handsome man with poor eyesight.
String.Dest: 我一直想找到一个眼神很差的大帅哥。

String.Source: I hardly noticed.
String.Dest: 我几乎没注意到。

String.Source: I've always wanted a cousin with poor eyesight. I wouldn't have to see her grimace. Just squint.
String.Dest: 我一直想有一个视力不佳的表妹。那样就不用看她做鬼脸。而一直是眯眯眼啦。

String.Source: The Temple of Mara. What are you implying? Do you mean to tell me my dashing hero was beside me all along?
String.Dest: 玛拉神殿。你是在暗示什么吗？你是在告诉我那英俊潇洒的英雄一直陪伴在我身边吗？

String.Source: The Temple of Mara. So my lady, which one of us do you think will walk down the aisle first?
String.Dest: 玛拉神殿。那么我的女士，你觉得咱们俩是谁会先走上红毯呢？

String.Source: Talos. Such a big, strong man. Now that's a gallant hero. But you're not so bad yourself.
String.Dest: 塔洛斯。如此高大，强壮的人类，现在更是一个伟岸的英雄呢。但其实你也没差啦。

String.Source: Now why have you brought me here, hm? I prefer my heroes to be naughty, but not perverse.
String.Dest: 那你为什么把我带到来这，嗯？我宁愿我的英雄是淘气，而不是变态。

String.Source: The College of Winterhold. My sister would have thrived here. Now, she thrives in a cave somewhere.
String.Dest: 冬堡学院。我姐姐本应该在那儿研习知识。然而现在，却不知她流落在哪个洞里呢。

String.Source: I wonder if the College is taking on new applicants? Although I suppose it's a little too late to learn a ward spell.
String.Dest: 不知道那学院还招不招新生。不过我这时候去学结界术恐怕是太迟了。

String.Source: I already have one of those.
String.Dest: 我已经得到了其中的一个。

String.Source: Then you're an actual lord! Or a thane, as it were. Here I was half-mocking you, hero, and instead I only mock myself.
String.Dest: Then you're an actual lord! Or a thane, as it were. Here I was half-mocking you, hero, and instead I only mock myself.

String.Source: Expecting someone more...dashing?
String.Dest: 在等待某个更……帅气的家伙？

String.Source: Ooh, that's the word isn't it. A dashing prince for me to swoon over, wouldn't that be heavenly.
String.Dest: Ooh, that's the word isn't it. A dashing prince for me to swoon over, wouldn't that be heavenly.

String.Source: Or it could be I prefer men less dashing, lest they dash off to the next girl.
String.Dest: 也可能是因为我更喜欢不那么帅的男人，免得他们老是去勾引别的女孩。

String.Source: Expecting someone more...dashing?
String.Dest: 在等待某个更……帅气的家伙？

String.Source: Expecting someone more...dashing?
String.Dest: 在等待某个更……帅气的家伙？

String.Source: Ooh, that's the word isn't it. A dashing prince for me to swoon over, wouldn't that be heavenly.
String.Dest: Ooh, that's the word isn't it. A dashing prince for me to swoon over, wouldn't that be heavenly.

String.Source: Or it could be I prefer men less dashing, lest they dash off to the next girl.
String.Dest: 也可能是因为我更喜欢不那么帅的男人，免得他们老是去勾引别的女孩。

String.Source: Expecting someone more...dashing?
String.Dest: 在等待某个更……帅气的家伙？

String.Source: Ooh, that's the word isn't it. A dashing prince for us ladies to swoon over, then fight over.
String.Dest: Ooh, that's the word isn't it. A dashing prince for us ladies to swoon over, then fight over.

String.Source: Expecting someone more...dashing?
String.Dest: 在等待某个更……帅气的家伙？

String.Source: Expecting someone more...dashing?
String.Dest: 在等待某个更……帅气的家伙？

String.Source: I think we should prefer our men less dashing, lest they dash off to the next girl while we're busy pulling our hair.
String.Dest: 我想咱们应该选择那些没有那么帅的男人，免得在我们梳头发的空档他们就冲到别的女孩身边去了。

String.Source: Ooh, that's the word isn't it. A dashing prince for us ladies to swoon over, then fight over.
String.Dest: Ooh, that's the word isn't it. A dashing prince for us ladies to swoon over, then fight over.

String.Source: Expecting someone more...dashing?
String.Dest: 在等待某个更……帅气的家伙？

String.Source: Expecting someone more...dashing?
String.Dest: 在等待某个更……帅气的家伙？

String.Source: I think we should prefer our men less dashing, lest they dash off to the next girl while we're busy pulling our hair.
String.Dest: 我想咱们应该选择那些没有那么帅的男人，免得在我们梳头发的空档他们就冲到别的女孩身边去了。

String.Source: Ooh, that's the word isn't it. A dashing prince for us ladies to swoon over, then fight over.
String.Dest: Ooh, that's the word isn't it. A dashing prince for us ladies to swoon over, then fight over.

String.Source: Expecting someone more...dashing?
String.Dest: 在等待某个更……帅气的家伙？

String.Source: Expecting someone more...dashing?
String.Dest: 在等待某个更……帅气的家伙？

String.Source: I think we should prefer our men less dashing, lest they dash off to the next girl while we're busy pulling our hair.
String.Dest: 我想咱们应该选择那些没有那么帅的男人，免得在我们梳头发的空档他们就冲到别的女孩身边去了。

String.Source: A horn is not used to summon creatures. It is to rally the troops for war.
String.Dest: 号角不是用来召唤什么怪物。而是战争时期召集部队用的。

String.Source: Oh, right...I didn't think of that. Now I'm a bit embarrassed. That seems like something a warrior should know.
String.Dest: 哦，对了……我没考虑到那个。确实是有点尴尬啊。做战士的对这些是应该很了解才对。
