String.Source: A horn is not used to summon creatures. It is to rally the troops for war.
String.Dest: 号角不是用来召唤什么怪物。而是战争时期召集部队用的。

String.Source: As you know, I am new to this sort of thing, and until now I have always fought alone.
String.Dest: 你知道的，我对这类事是很陌生，而且我以前一直是独来独往的呢。

String.Source: A horn is not used to summon creatures. It is to rally the troops for war.
String.Dest: 号角不是用来召唤什么怪物。而是战争时期召集部队用的。

String.Source: But this is good news! It means I can use the horn and not worry about summoning dark creatures from Oblivion.
String.Dest: 这可是好消息啊！就是说我可以随意吹这号角而不必担心召来魔物啦。

String.Source: A horn is not used to summon creatures. It is to rally the troops for war.
String.Dest: 号角不是用来召唤什么怪物。而是战争时期召集部队用的。

String.Source: It will be fun to blow it the next time we see a group of bandits.
String.Dest: 下次咱再遇到强盗的时候吹响它肯定很好玩。

String.Source: Humility is a very attractive quality in a hero, and a friend. But you know as well as I that what you have done is more than special.
String.Dest: 不论对一个英雄还是对一个朋友来说，谦逊的品质都特有魅力。但咱们都知道你的功劳实在大大得。

String.Source: I did what I had to do. What anyone would have done. Nothing more.
String.Dest: 我只做了我该做的。谁都会做的。没别的。

String.Source: I did what I had to do. What anyone would have done. Nothing more.
String.Dest: 我只做了我该做的。谁都会做的。没别的。

String.Source: Which is why we make such a good team. You do great things, and I tell everyone how great you are.
String.Dest: 这就是为什么咱们是个黄金组合。你负责做好事，而我负责告诉大家你人有多好。

String.Source: Destruction magic is for weaklings who fight from a distance.
String.Dest: 毁灭系魔法是只敢在远处攻击别人的鼠辈才用的

String.Source: Do you speak from experience? Did destruction magic fail you at some point?
String.Dest: 这是你的经验之谈？你用毁灭魔法有失败过吗？

String.Source: Destruction magic is for weaklings who fight from a distance.
String.Dest: 毁灭系魔法是只敢在远处攻击别人的鼠辈才用的

String.Source: I can see no other explanation for why someone would train so long at a particular skill, only to abandon it like an old pair of clothes.
String.Dest: 我想不出有什么别的可以解释谁会花大量时间磨砺出精湛技艺，然后拿去像旧衣服一样扔掉。

String.Source: Destruction magic is for weaklings who fight from a distance.
String.Dest: 毁灭系魔法是只敢在远处攻击别人的鼠辈才用的

String.Source: How do you know that? You are not well versed in destruction magic. It would be like me having an opinion on tails.
String.Dest: 你懂个啥？你的毁灭系又没那么精通。就像我跟你谈尾巴的用法一样搞笑吧。

String.Source: Sure, they look nice, but maybe they're cumbersome and have a mind of their own.
String.Dest: 当然，尾巴很好看啊，但它们也许有点累赘甚至是有自己的想法呢。

String.Source: Destruction magic is for weaklings who fight from a distance.
String.Dest: 毁灭系魔法是只敢在远处攻击别人的鼠辈才用的

String.Source: Siblings fight. Burning you was a little excessive, however.
String.Dest: 小孩打架的事。烧伤了你是有些过分呢。

String.Source: No, I deserved it. Not the flames, but the slap. Make no mistake, I was a real bitch. Beauty tends to make monsters of us all.
String.Dest: No, I deserved it. Not the flames, but the slap. Make no mistake, I was a real bitch. Beauty tends to make monsters of us all.

String.Source: Siblings fight. Burning you was a little excessive, however.
String.Dest: 小孩打架的事。烧伤了你是有些过分呢。

String.Source: She didn't intend to burn me, of course. All of that anger...that rage just manifested itself into fire.
String.Dest: She didn't intend to burn me, of course. All of that anger...that rage just manifested itself into fire.

String.Source: Siblings fight. Burning you was a little excessive, however.
String.Dest: 小孩打架的事。烧伤了你是有些过分呢。

String.Source: No, I deserved it. Not the flames, but the slap. Make no mistake, I was a real bitch. Beauty tends to make monsters of us all.
String.Dest: No, I deserved it. Not the flames, but the slap. Make no mistake, I was a real bitch. Beauty tends to make monsters of us all.

String.Source: Siblings fight. Burning you was a little excessive, however.
String.Dest: 小孩打架的事。烧伤了你是有些过分呢。

String.Source: She didn't intend to burn me, of course. All of that anger...that rage just manifested itself into fire.
String.Dest: She didn't intend to burn me, of course. All of that anger...that rage just manifested itself into fire.

String.Source: It's never too late to learn a craft. A brush is no different than a sword.
String.Dest: 学习一门手艺从不会嫌晚，画笔和剑都没什么区别。

String.Source: You make it sound so easy, my Thane, but for us mere mortals, it can take years to learn a new skill. But you never know.
String.Dest: 您说的可轻巧啊大人，可对我们凡人来讲。学会一个新技能要好几年呢。你从来不在乎这些。

String.Source: It's never too late to learn a craft. A brush is no different than a sword.
String.Dest: 学习一门手艺从不会嫌晚，画笔和剑都没什么区别。

String.Source: Maybe all I need is the right inspiration. Perhaps if I painted the portrait of my favorite hero, it would turn into a beautiful piece.
String.Dest: 也许我只需要恰当的灵感。如果是画一幅我最爱的英雄肖像，画出来一定超棒。

String.Source: I want to take off this sweaty thing and put on a summer gown, then lie down in a bed of flowers near the bank of the White River.
String.Dest: 我想脱了这汗津津的玩意儿换一身清凉长袍。然后就以遍地鲜花为床，躺在白水河畔。

String.Source: Well then, what do you want? Gods if I know.
String.Dest: 那么，你到底想要什么？天哪我真想知道。

String.Source: But you never know. Maybe one day a traveler might come along. Handsome but not pretty, strong but not scary, friendly but not creepy.
String.Dest: 可谁知道呢。没准某一天会有个旅行者出现。英俊而不漂亮，强壮而不可怕，友好而不肉麻。

String.Source: Well then, what do you want? Gods if I know.
String.Dest: 那么，你到底想要什么？天哪我真想知道。

String.Source: Confident, but not arrogant. Kind, but firm. A true hero, but not like you. There will never be another like you, my Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 自信，而不傲慢。善良，但是坚强。一个真的英雄，但不是像你一样。因为，你永远是世界上独一无二的啊，我的龙裔。

String.Source: Well then, what do you want? Gods if I know.
String.Dest: 那么，你到底想要什么？天哪我真想知道。

String.Source: So when we meet, I will tell this handsome hero to find another companion, for I am forever yours.
String.Dest: 所以咱们再见面时，我会告诉这个英俊的英雄去另外找个伴儿，因为我永远是你的。

String.Source: Well then, what do you want? Gods if I know.
String.Dest: 那么，你到底想要什么？天哪我真想知道。

String.Source: I want to take off this sweaty thing and put on a summer gown, then lie down in a bed of flowers near the bank of the White River.
String.Dest: 我想脱了这汗津津的玩意儿换一身清凉长袍。然后就以遍地鲜花为床，躺在白水河畔。

String.Source: Oh? And what does my Thane want?
String.Dest: 噢？我的男爵想要什么？

String.Source: But you never know. Maybe one day a traveler might come along. Handsome but not pretty, strong but not scary, friendly but not creepy.
String.Dest: 可谁知道呢。没准某一天会有个旅行者出现。英俊而不漂亮，强壮而不可怕，友好而不肉麻。

String.Source: Oh? And what does my Thane want?
String.Dest: 噢？我的男爵想要什么？

String.Source: Confident, but not arrogant. Kind, but firm. A true hero, but not like you. There will never be another like you, my Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 自信，而不傲慢。善良，但是坚强。一个真的英雄，但不是像你一样。因为，你永远是世界上独一无二的啊，我的龙裔。

String.Source: Oh? And what does my Thane want?
String.Dest: 噢？我的男爵想要什么？

String.Source: So when we meet, I will tell this handsome hero to find another companion, for I am forever yours.
String.Dest: 所以咱们再见面时，我会告诉这个英俊的英雄去另外找个伴儿，因为我永远是你的。

String.Source: Oh? And what does my Thane want?
String.Dest: 噢？我的男爵想要什么？

String.Source: No. It's my horn, I'm the one who gets to blow it, not you.
String.Dest: 不，这是我的号角。有资格吹它的人是我，而不是你。

String.Source: Oh my, it seems my lord has a selfish streak. Are you sure you don't want to share your spoils with your faithful follower?
String.Dest: 哦天哪，看来我的大人也有自私的一面呢。你确定不打算跟你家忠实的随从分享战利品吗？

String.Source: No. It's my horn, I'm the one who gets to blow it, not you.
String.Dest: 不，这是我的号角。有资格吹它的人是我，而不是你。

String.Source: Maybe we can compromise. When you have the horn, I will get to push all the buttons, solve all the puzzles, and pick up all the nirnroot.
String.Dest: 也许咱应该商量一下。你留着你的号角，而让我按所有的按钮，解所有的迷题，采集所有的奈恩根。

String.Source: That's a fair deal, don't you think?
String.Dest: 这是个公平的交易，你觉得呢？

String.Source: No. It's my horn, I'm the one who gets to blow it, not you.
String.Dest: 不，这是我的号角。有资格吹它的人是我，而不是你。

String.Source: I don't know. I'll probably settle down in Riverwood, and enjoy the peace and quiet.
String.Dest: 不知道哦。可能我也就在溪木镇呆下来，安心享受平静和安宁啦。

String.Source: What will you do now?
String.Dest: 你现在有什么打算？

String.Source: What will you do now?
String.Dest: 你现在有什么打算？

String.Source: I once traded an army of suitors for a suit of armor, but right now, I don't want either of them.
String.Dest: 我曾经用一个连的追求者换了一身盔甲，但现在，这两个我都不想要。

String.Source: What are your thoughts on Rumarin?
String.Dest: 你对罗米勒这个人怎么看？

String.Source: Oh, I adore him. I have never met a High Elf with a sense of humor before! And he comes from a family of troubadours! How romantic!
String.Dest: Oh, I adore him. I have never met a High Elf with a sense of humor before! And he comes from a family of troubadours! How romantic!

String.Source: What are your thoughts on Rumarin?
String.Dest: 你对罗米勒这个人怎么看？

String.Source: It reminds me of the time before the war, when traveling bards and poets would pass by Riverwood on their way north to Solitude.
String.Dest: 这让我回忆起战争前的那些日子，北上前往独孤城的吟游诗人们总会从溪木镇路过。

String.Source: What are your thoughts on Rumarin?
String.Dest: 你对罗米勒这个人怎么看？

String.Source: I used to love art, you know. I would imagine myself married to a wealthy noble, and tutored by the world's most brilliant artists.
String.Dest: 我一直喜欢艺术的，你知道。我会想像嫁给一个富有的贵族，然后让世界上最优秀的艺术家来指导我。

String.Source: In the long hours I would sit by the window and paint the White River. Now, I just paint the snow with bandits.
String.Dest: 过去无聊的时候我会坐在窗边描画白河。现在呢，我只有拿强盗擦雪地啦。

String.Source: What are your thoughts on Rumarin?
String.Dest: 你对罗米勒这个人怎么看？

String.Source: Is there anything else on your mind?
String.Dest: 你有啥别的想法吗？

String.Source: Well, I was thinking I haven't seen Gorr around the Sleeping Giant Inn for some time. Maybe we ought to go look for him.
String.Dest: 嗯，我在想好像有一阵子没在沉睡巨人看见戈尔了。也许咱该去看看他。

String.Source: Although I am probably worried over nothing. Gorr is almost as strong as my hero. He can take care of himself.
String.Dest: 不过我可能没啥担心的必要啦。戈尔可不我家英雄弱几分呢，他能照顾好自己的。

String.Source: Is there anything else on your mind?
String.Dest: 你有啥别的想法吗？

String.Source: I think you are beautiful.
String.Dest: 我觉得你挺漂亮的。

String.Source: Oh my, do you now? Be wary not to lead a girl on, white lies are a dangerous toy.
String.Dest: Oh my, do you now? Be wary not to lead a girl on, white lies are a dangerous toy.

String.Source: You're a bad liar, but I appreciate the sentiment.
String.Dest: 你的谎话说得够烂，不过我欣赏你的观点。

String.Source: I think you are beautiful.
String.Dest: 我觉得你挺漂亮的。

String.Source: You're a bad liar, but I appreciate the sentiment.
String.Dest: 你的谎话说得够烂，不过我欣赏你的观点。

String.Source: I think you are beautiful.
String.Dest: 我觉得你挺漂亮的。

String.Source: Did you ever own any pets?
String.Dest: 你养过什么宠物吗？

String.Source: Just one. When I was little, I often went out into the woods to collect flowers.
String.Dest: 只养过一只。我小的时候，经常去郊外树林里采花。

String.Source: Did you ever own any pets?
String.Dest: 你养过什么宠物吗？

String.Source: It was there that I found the dirtiest, most flea-ridden mongrel in all of Skyrim.
String.Dest: 就是在那儿，我发现了那只全天际最脏虱子最多的杂种狗。

String.Source: Did you ever own any pets?
String.Dest: 你养过什么宠物吗？

String.Source: He was also very adorable, the way his fur hung over his tender, gray eyes. I called him Sir Cuddles, and I was in love.
String.Dest: 他还那么可爱，他胸前搭着毛皮的方式，灰色的眼睛。我叫他抱抱爵士，我坠入爱河了。

String.Source: Did you ever own any pets?
String.Dest: 你养过什么宠物吗？

String.Source: How did your family react when you brought the dog home?
String.Dest: 你的家人看到你带了这狗回家的时候有什么反应？

String.Source: My mother was furious. Yet my father had a soft spot for his girls, so he tried to find a practical reason for why Cuddles couldn't stay.
String.Dest: 我妈妈生气极了。但爸爸对女儿们都很心软。所以他试着找个合适的理由解释为什么抱抱不能留下来。

String.Source: Did you ever own any pets?
String.Dest: 你养过什么宠物吗？

String.Source: How did your family react when you brought the dog home?
String.Dest: 你的家人看到你带了这狗回家的时候有什么反应？

String.Source: He pointed to how sick the dog was, and how dangerous diseases were in the wild.
String.Dest: 他指出了那狗狗病的多严重，而野外的疾病是相当危险的。

String.Source: Did you ever own any pets?
String.Dest: 你养过什么宠物吗？

String.Source: How did your family react when you brought the dog home?
String.Dest: 你的家人看到你带了这狗回家的时候有什么反应？

String.Source: I cried all night, burying my face in my hands. I never even noticed my sister was gone.
String.Dest: 我掩面痛哭了一整夜。甚至姐姐什么时候离开的我都没发现。

String.Source: When did she return?
String.Dest: 她什么时候回来的？

String.Source: Did you ever own any pets?
String.Dest: 你养过什么宠物吗？

String.Source: It was hours before dawn when the door creaked open, and I saw my sister, with a healthy Sir Cuddles trundling on behind her.
String.Dest: 距黎明还有几个小时的时候，门吱地一声开了，我看见了我的妹妹，还有活蹦乱跳的抱抱爵士在她身后打着滚儿。

String.Source: When did she return?
String.Dest: 她什么时候回来的？

String.Source: Did you ever own any pets?
String.Dest: 你养过什么宠物吗？

String.Source: She spent the last of her savings on a hawk feather and a charred skeever hide, and even brewed the potion herself.
String.Dest: 她用最后那点积蓄买了片鹰的羽毛和一张烧焦的雪鼠皮，居然还给自己调了一瓶药水。

String.Source: When did she return?
String.Dest: 她什么时候回来的？

String.Source: Did you ever own any pets?
String.Dest: 你养过什么宠物吗？

String.Source: Silly me, my instincts were to hug the dog. But looking back, it's the memory of my sister's compassion that I truly covet.
String.Dest: 我真蠢，最初的冲动只是抱抱这只狗狗。可是回想起来，其实我贪图的是记忆中姐姐的关爱。

String.Source: You do realize that was joke, don't you? I didn't expect my hero to lack a sense of humor.
String.Dest: You do realize that was joke, don't you? I didn't expect my hero to lack a sense of humor.

String.Source: But the cage door has holes in it.
String.Dest: 但是牢房的门上有个洞。

String.Source: There's nothing romantic about artists. They're filthy. Just like Rumarin.
String.Dest: 艺术家什么的一点都不浪漫。他们都很邋遢。就跟罗米勒一样。

String.Source: Do I detect a hint of jealousy, my Thane? Do not worry, I follow but one hero. You are a born leader.
String.Dest: 我是不是感觉到了一丝妒忌，我的男爵？放心啦，我只会跟随一个英雄，而您才是天生的领导者。

String.Source: There's nothing romantic about artists. They're filthy. Just like Rumarin.
String.Dest: 艺术家什么的一点都不浪漫。他们都很邋遢。就跟罗米勒一样。

String.Source: Do I detect a hint of jealousy, my Thane? My rival sister, keeping the handsome Elf to herself. But do not worry, my hero. Rumarin is not my type.
String.Dest: 我好像察觉到一丝醋意，女主人？我的好姐妹，很想把这潇洒的精灵留给自己哩。不过别担心啦英雄。罗米勒不是我的菜呢。

String.Source: You poor thing.
String.Dest: 你个可怜样儿。

String.Source: My hero is sympathetic! How charming. The poor one was my sister, and now we both live in poverty.
String.Dest: My hero is sympathetic! How charming. The poor one was my sister, and now we both live in poverty.

String.Source: I couldn't loathe my sister for what she did. Not now that I know her pain.
String.Dest: I couldn't loathe my sister for what she did. Not now that I know her pain.

String.Source: When you're beautiful, every word is met with a smile. When it's gone, the whole world is shrouded in darkness.
String.Dest: When you're beautiful, every word is met with a smile. When it's gone, the whole world is shrouded in darkness.

String.Source: Even the polite ones can't help themselves. No matter how hard they try to disguise it.
String.Dest: Even the polite ones can't help themselves. No matter how hard they try to disguise it.

String.Source: (Laughs) So is that a yes, then?
String.Dest: （笑）那么，是肯定的意思啦？

String.Source: Well, do you like him?
String.Dest: 嗯，你喜欢他吗？

String.Source: I hope you didn't come to the party to mope, Uldvar. Anja can rest easy, now that the war-teacher is dead.
String.Dest: 我希望你不是专程来伤心的，欧特法. 现在安雅可以安息了，那个战争导师已经死了。

String.Source: (Laughs) I guess we have something in common then after all.
String.Dest: （笑）那看来咱们到底还是有共同点吧。

String.Source: Parties like this are a good place to play matchmaker.
String.Dest: 这样的聚会可是个扮演媒人的好地方。

String.Source: Actually, I think he's married to the Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 实际上，我觉得他是嫁给了龙裔。

String.Source: Do we even know what kind of girl he likes?
String.Dest: 咱们连他喜欢什么类型的女孩儿都知道吗？

String.Source: Remember that dog I told you about, Sir Cuddles? Well, I actually had Joselyn burn him alive.
String.Dest: 还记得我跟你说的那条狗吗，名叫抱抱爵士的？其实，是我害约瑟琳把它活活烧死的。

String.Source: I want to ask you some more personal questions.
String.Dest: 我要问你一些更加私人的问题。

String.Source: Some say gems are a girl's best friend. But everyone knows it's her vibrator.
String.Dest: 有些人说宝石是女性最好的朋友。但谁都知道那其实是她们的幸福神器。

String.Source: I want to ask you some more personal questions.
String.Dest: 我要问你一些更加私人的问题。

String.Source: I know. We're surrounded by so much war and death, it might be inappropriate to laugh and play like children. I didn't mean to offend you.
String.Dest: 我明白。这个世界到处是战争和死亡，像孩子一样又玩又笑的是不太合适。我不是有意冒犯你的。

String.Source: I appreciate it, but this isn't the time for childish games.
String.Dest: 非常感谢，但现在不是玩小孩子过家家的时候。

String.Source: But for me, doing these everyday things gives me hope that someday things will get back to normal.
String.Dest: 但对我来说，做这些日常的事情能够给我以希望，让我相信或许有一天一切都会回归正常。

String.Source: I appreciate it, but this isn't the time for childish games.
String.Dest: 非常感谢，但现在不是玩小孩子过家家的时候。

String.Source: (Laughs) Yes, we will have plenty of time for tag as well.
String.Dest: （笑）是啊，我们还会有很多时间捉迷藏呢。

String.Source: Sure, I'll play hero, so long as me and the kids get to play tag afterward.
String.Dest: 当然，我会扮演英雄，只要先跟孩子们玩完捉迷藏之后。

String.Source: I would be honored to join such esteemed company.
String.Dest: 我很荣幸能参加这样了不起的团队。

String.Source: (Laughs) Yes, I imagine you would be.
String.Dest: （笑）是啊，我就希望是这样。

String.Source: You will go down in history with names like Stump the War Mammoth, Frodnar the Fire Weaver, and even Zora the Diamond.
String.Dest: 你将会被载入史册，就像猛犸战神斯挞普，织火者弗洛纳，甚至钻石佐拉一样。

String.Source: I would be honored to join such esteemed company.
String.Dest: 我很荣幸能参加这样了不起的团队。

String.Source: I would be honored to join such esteemed company.
String.Dest: 我很荣幸能参加这样了不起的团队。

String.Source: It is a much better reward than gold, don't you think?
String.Dest: 这奖励可比金币强多啦，你不觉得吗？

String.Source: Oh, don't be so grumpy, it's a great honor.
String.Dest: 噢，别耍脾气啦，那是很棒的荣誉啊。

String.Source: Hero of Riverwood? Shor's Bones woman, I want a real reward, like gold.
String.Dest: 溪木镇的英雄？舒尔的老骨头在上啊女人，我要的是真正的报酬，比如金币。

String.Source: You will go down in history with names like Stump the War Mammoth, Frodnar the Fire Weaver, and even Zora the Diamond.
String.Dest: 你将会被载入史册，就像猛犸战神斯挞普，织火者弗洛纳，甚至钻石佐拉一样。

String.Source: Hero of Riverwood? Shor's Bones woman, I want a real reward, like gold.
String.Dest: 溪木镇的英雄？舒尔的老骨头在上啊女人，我要的是真正的报酬，比如金币。

String.Source: It is a much better reward than gold, don't you think?
String.Dest: 这奖励可比金币强多啦，你不觉得吗？

String.Source: Hero of Riverwood? Shor's Bones woman, I want a real reward, like gold.
String.Dest: 溪木镇的英雄？舒尔的老骨头在上啊女人，我要的是真正的报酬，比如金币。

String.Source: (Sigh) Very well. If my champion is intent on being stubborn, I have no choice but to join you.
String.Dest: （叹）好吧。如果我的勇士脾气就是这么倔，我也没别的选择只好加入啦。

String.Source: I disagree. We need to find them as soon as possible.
String.Dest: 我不同意，咱们必须尽快找到他们。

String.Source: But I do think we should take a break. We have already dealt a great blow to this Blood of Skyrim group.
String.Dest: 不过我确实觉得咱可以歇一下下了。毕竟已经给这所谓天际之血造成很大打击啦。

String.Source: I disagree. We need to find them as soon as possible.
String.Dest: 我不同意，咱们必须尽快找到他们。

String.Source: And for your service, I think it's time I made you an honorary Hero of Riverwood.
String.Dest: 介于你的贡献，我觉得是时候授予你“溪木镇大英雄”的荣誉称号啦。

String.Source: I disagree. We need to find them as soon as possible.
String.Dest: 我不同意，咱们必须尽快找到他们。

String.Source: Okay. I suppose it's time we take a break anyhow.
String.Dest: 好哒。反正我觉得是时候休息一下了。

String.Source: After a long day in the dungeon, a warm drink and a warm bed sounds good, doesn't it?
String.Dest: 在地牢里混了一整天，能来杯热酒喝喝，再钻个暖被窝就完美啦，对吧？

String.Source: Okay. I suppose it's time we take a break anyhow.
String.Dest: 好哒。反正我觉得是时候休息一下了。

String.Source: The bad men are still out there, but after today, they'll think twice before attacking our town again.
String.Dest: 那些坏蛋还活着，不过从此以后，他们再想来我们镇捣乱之前会三思后行了吧。

String.Source: Okay. I suppose it's time we take a break anyhow.
String.Dest: 好哒。反正我觉得是时候休息一下了。

String.Source: And for your service, I think it's time I made you an honorary Hero of Riverwood.
String.Dest: 介于你的贡献，我觉得是时候授予你“溪木镇大英雄”的荣誉称号啦。

String.Source: It's best we continue investigating on our own.
String.Dest: 咱们还是靠自己的力量继续调查吧。

String.Source: As much as I enjoy spending time together, we have exhausted all our leads. It's time we meet with Thane Larsdon and see if he has forged this axe.
String.Dest: 我挺享受在一起的这段时光的，但咱们所有的线索都已经耗完了。还是让我们去见见劳斯登男爵看看他是否锻造过这把斧子吧。

String.Source: Whenever we lost Sir Cuddles, father and mother said it was best to return home, because as long as we were there, the dog would find us.
String.Dest: 当我们把抱抱爵士弄丢的时候，爸妈都说最好还是先回家。因为只要我们还在这儿，那狗会到处找到我们。

String.Source: I don't know. We can check Hunter's Rest, but I doubt he'll be there.
String.Dest: 不知道。我们可以去猎人休息处看看，不过我觉得他不在那里。

String.Source: So it's best we don't move and let the Thane come to us.
String.Dest: 所以说最好原地不动等那男爵来找咱们。

String.Source: I don't know. We can check Hunter's Rest, but I doubt he'll be there.
String.Dest: 不知道。我们可以去猎人休息处看看，不过我觉得他不在那里。

String.Source: It's likely the Thane or his Housecarl will know where to find me.
String.Dest: 可能那个男爵或他的侍卫知道去哪里找他。

String.Source: Then all we can do is wait. And it shouldn't be long. It's not like you aren't the famous Dragonborn or anything. They will know where you are.
String.Dest: 那么咱们能做的就只有等待了。应该不会太久。已经成了大名鼎鼎的龙裔。他们应该很快知道你在哪儿。

String.Source: Yes, I would have liked to punch him in the nose for what he did to Uldvar's wife. But maybe we will have more luck when we go to Nilheim.
String.Dest: 是啊，他对欧特法妻子做的事让人真想揍扁他的鼻子。也许到了尼尔海姆咱们的运气会好些吧。

String.Source: It will eat him alive until he gets his revenge. Too bad the mage wasn't here.
String.Dest: 他要是报复不成几乎会被怒火吞噬。真糟糕那法师没在这里。

String.Source: Strong physically, yes, but emotionally? I am not so sure.
String.Dest: 身体上强壮，是的，情感上呢？我不太清楚。

String.Source: He's a strong guy. Don't worry, he'll manage.
String.Dest: 他很坚强的，放心，挺得住。

String.Source: But right now he needs some time alone. We should head over to Nilheim to see if we can find out more about the men who did this.
String.Dest: 但现在他需要一点独处的时间。我们应该去尼尔海姆看看有没有关于他更多的线索。

String.Source: He's a strong guy. Don't worry, he'll manage.
String.Dest: 他很坚强的，放心，挺得住。

String.Source: Right, but we don't know where he is. I think it's best we find out as much about these people as we can before they hurt anybody else.
String.Dest: 对的，可咱们不知道他在哪。咱最好是赶在那帮家伙伤害任何人之前找到他们。

String.Source: Never mind that, we have to get this journal to the Thane.
String.Dest: 管不了那么多，咱们必须把这本日记给那男爵看到。

String.Source: We should follow Uldvar's earlier lead to Nilheim. Although I don't think he will be coming with us.
String.Dest: 咱们应该按照欧特法之前的提示到尼尔海姆去。尽管我不认为他会跟咱们一起走。

String.Source: Never mind that, we have to get this journal to the Thane.
String.Dest: 管不了那么多，咱们必须把这本日记给那男爵看到。

String.Source: No. Not for some time.
String.Dest: 不，有时候不是。

String.Source: Yeah, it was a stupid question. We will have to carry on without him.
String.Dest: 是的，确实是个蠢问题。有他没他咱们也得继续啊。

String.Source: No. Not for some time.
String.Dest: 不，有时候不是。

String.Source: Maybe we can find out more about this group if we go to Nilheim.
String.Dest: 也许咱们去尼尔海姆可以了解一些这组织的消息。

String.Source: East. It's best to cut off the head of the snake.
String.Dest: 东边。最好的办法还是砍掉蛇头。

String.Source: I agree. Snakes are not very effective without their heads. But I suppose that goes for most things.
String.Dest: 同意。没了脑袋的蛇就没那么厉害了。不过好像这道理对哪个动物都说得通。

String.Source: East. It's best to cut off the head of the snake.
String.Dest: 东边。最好的办法还是砍掉蛇头。

String.Source: I am sure our new friend will be fine by himself. My mother said cranky people tend to live very long lives.
String.Dest: 相信咱们的新朋友一个人撑得住的。我妈妈说古怪的家伙往往都长命。

String.Source: Just a flip a coin. I don't care where we go first, or who we go with.
String.Dest: 抛个硬币就行啦。我不在乎咱们先去哪儿，或者跟谁去。

String.Source: I am very bad at flipping coins. They usually end up at the bottom of the White. Perhaps I'll flip a coin in my head.
String.Dest: 我是最不擅长扔硬币的了。经常不小心扔到河里。我看还是在自己脑子里扔一下看吧。

String.Source: Just a flip a coin. I don't care where we go first, or who we go with.
String.Dest: 抛个硬币就行啦。我不在乎咱们先去哪儿，或者跟谁去。

String.Source: It says...tails. Which way is tails? Ah, never mind, let's just follow our new friend.
String.Dest: 结果是……反面。反面是要干嘛呢？啊，无所谓，咱们跟着那位新朋友就可以了。

String.Source: It doesn't matter. We'll get to both eventually.
String.Dest: 没关系，咱们终究会二者兼得的。

String.Source: True, but things can change depending on where we go first, and who we go with. Or perhaps nothing will change, but we still must make a decision.
String.Dest: 是啊，可事情会根据咱们的行动顺序而改变，以及参与行动的是谁。或者就算什么也不变，咱们也还是得做决定。

String.Source: (Laughs) Well, he wasn't that handsome. It's like being the tallest Breton. It's easier for me to tell him apart from the others if I call him that.
String.Dest: （笑）咳，他也没帅到那个份上。只是和布莱顿人里的高个子差不多。想从人群中找到他还是相当容易的。

String.Source: If he's handsome, it's all the more reason to go that way.
String.Dest: 要是他很帅，那就更有理由走那边啦。

String.Source: But if it makes our decision easier, than let's go east. Nilheim isn't too far from here, even if we stick to the roads.
String.Dest: 但如果这能让咱们的决定简单点儿，那就一起往东走吧。就算不抄捷径走大路，尼尔海姆离这儿也不算很远。

String.Source: If he's handsome, it's all the more reason to go that way.
String.Dest: 要是他很帅，那就更有理由走那边啦。

String.Source: West. I don't feel comfortable letting our new friend go alone.
String.Dest: 西边。我们这新朋友一个人去的话我可不放心。

String.Source: Neither do I. I am also curious as to why he is so intent on hunting werewolves. It isn't fair for him to walk away without telling us.
String.Dest: 我也是。我还很好奇他为什么对捕杀狼人这么热衷。结果就这么一声不响的离开真是太没品啦。

String.Source: You have? Great! Having two Dragonborns will truly make us a formidable party.
String.Dest: 你？太棒了！拥有两位龙裔肯定会让我们的组合无坚不摧。

String.Source: I've come to join the fabled Heroes of Riverwood.
String.Dest: 我是来加入传说中的溪木镇英雄连的。

String.Source: Dorthe is usually the other one, but today I convinced her we needed a healer for better balance.
String.Dest: 通常另一位是朵西，不过今天我跟她说咱们缺一个治疗师来平衡团队力量。

String.Source: I've come to join the fabled Heroes of Riverwood.
String.Dest: 我是来加入传说中的溪木镇英雄连的。

String.Source: Do you mean like, two heroes on equal footing? Hm...you are being too modest, my liege.
String.Dest: 你的意思是，两个地位平等的英雄吗？嗯……你太谦虚啦，我的陛下。

String.Source: I see you more as a peer than someone I take along.
String.Dest: 我视你为平等的伙伴而不是普通的随从。

String.Source: But maybe someday I will be the Hero of High Rock, or the Champion of Elsweyr, and then we can talk about who squires for whom.
String.Dest: 但是也许有一天我会成为高岩的英雄，或者艾斯维尔的守护者，那时候咱们是谁服侍谁就得讨论一下啦。

String.Source: I see you more as a peer than someone I take along.
String.Dest: 我视你为平等的伙伴而不是普通的随从。

String.Source: Who, Lydia? I don't think she likes her job anyway. She's always complaining, and not just about carrying your burdens.
String.Dest: 谁？莉迪亚？我不觉得她喜欢自己的工作。她总是在抱怨，也不光是因为帮你背行李什么的。

String.Source: You need to stop calling yourself that. My real housecarl might get jealous.
String.Dest: 你得注意这个自称，我真正的护卫会嫉妒的。

String.Source: She wouldn't mind so much if I took her place.
String.Dest: 就算我占了她的位置她也不会过于介意的。

String.Source: You need to stop calling yourself that. My real housecarl might get jealous.
String.Dest: 你得注意这个自称，我真正的护卫会嫉妒的。

String.Source: We think very much alike, my liege. I was wondering where you were the last time I got in a tussle with some bandits.
String.Dest: 咱们的想法差不多呢，大王。我好奇的是上次我跟那帮强盗打在一起的时候您去哪儿了。

String.Source: Yes, the last adventure just wasn't the same without you.
String.Dest: 是啊，没有你在，上次去冒险都没什么心情了。

String.Source: I thought to myself, "Why is this so much harder than before?" And then I realized, "Oh right, I don't have the Savior of Skyrim fighting with me."
String.Dest: 当时我暗想，“为什么比感觉以前困难得多呢？”然后我意识到“噢对了，没有天际的救世主跟我并肩作战呢。”

String.Source: Yes, the last adventure just wasn't the same without you.
String.Dest: 是啊，没有你在，上次去冒险都没什么心情了。

String.Source: Ah, my husband is such a romantic. Well, here I am. Your quest is complete. Or is there something else you want to talk about?
String.Dest: 啊，我老公可真够浪漫哪。好啦，我已经来啦。你的任务完成。还有啥话题咱们聊聊？

String.Source: Actually, I'm here to see you.
String.Dest: 实际上，我就是来看你的。

String.Source: Did you miss me? Well, here I am. Your quest is complete. Or is there something else you want to talk about?
String.Dest: 你想我了吗？好啦，我在这儿啦。你的任务完成。或者你想谈点别的?

String.Source: Actually, I'm here to see you.
String.Dest: 实际上，我就是来看你的。

String.Source: I'm sorry my hero, it's getting late and I'm tired. We should talk in the morning.
String.Dest: 抱歉呐我的英雄，时间不早我也累了。咱明儿一早再谈吧.

String.Source: So, what brings you to Riverwood, my love? Come to take your wife on more adventures?
String.Dest: 呀，什么风把你吹回溪木镇来，亲爱的？是来接你的妻子一起继续冒险吗？

String.Source: So, what brings you to Riverwood, my Thane? Come to take your housecarl on more adventures?
String.Dest: 呀，什么风把你吹来溪木镇啦，男爵大人？是来带你家侍卫加入新的探险吗？

String.Source: Hm...this mage seems like a very bad man, but I get the feeling the handsome Nord is the one who is putting everyone in danger.
String.Dest: 嗯…这个法师看起来像是个大坏蛋。但是我有种感觉，那个帅气的诺德人才是所有人危险的来源。

String.Source: But as always, I will let you decide. East or west?
String.Dest: 不过按照惯例，我还是请您决定吧。往东还是西？

String.Source: Do you think Uldvar is going to be okay?
String.Dest: 你觉得欧特法会好起来吗？

String.Source: Hm...neither the mage nor the one called Gren was at either location, but we did find out some valuable information.
String.Dest: 嗯……两个地方都没有法师也都没有叫格伦的家伙，但是咱们确实找到点有用的信息。

String.Source: We should take these items to your friend, the Thane. Do you have any idea where he might be?
String.Dest: 咱们应该把这些玩意拿给你那朋友，那位男爵。你知道他现在到底在哪吗？

String.Source: How could I not? Five assassins, dressed in blood...It's the talk of the town. I heard my hero was quite gallant in vanquishing them.
String.Dest: 怎么可能没有？五个刺客，血染旅馆……镇上的大热门啊。听说是我家英雄见义勇为呢。

String.Source: Did you hear what happened at the Sleeping Giant Inn?
String.Dest: 你听说沉睡巨人旅馆发生了什么事情吗？

String.Source: I feel terrible about the whole thing. But I can't always be here to protect them.
String.Dest: 对这整件事情我也非常难过。但我没法一直呆在这儿保护他们哪。

String.Source: Did you hear what happened at the Sleeping Giant Inn?
String.Dest: 你听说沉睡巨人旅馆发生了什么事情吗？

String.Source: Instead, I've taken it upon myself to train everyone, but so far only the children and Embry have accepted my offer. Most days we just play tag.
String.Dest: 作为替代方案，我打算亲自为每个人提供一番训练，不过至今为止只有小孩们和安布里接受了我的安排。大多数时候我们只是玩躲猫猫。

String.Source: Did you hear what happened at the Sleeping Giant Inn?
String.Dest: 你听说沉睡巨人旅馆发生了什么事情吗？

String.Source: Thank the Divines you made it out safe.
String.Dest: 感谢圣灵你安全出来了。

String.Source: It is very sweet that you were worried about me, but I am very good at staying alive, even if it means being kept prisoner.
String.Dest: 你这么关心我真是令人感动，不过我可是打不死的小强呢，就算是做俘虏也可以活得好好的。

String.Source: Thank the Divines you made it out safe.
String.Dest: 感谢圣灵你安全出来了。

String.Source: It was also fairly obvious that I wasn't a witch coming to wipe out their camp. But I like to think my charm had something to do with it as well.
String.Dest: 很明显我不是来扫荡他们营地的女巫嘛。不过我倾向于承认我的魅力也够放倒他们的啦。

String.Source: Thank the Divines you made it out safe.
String.Dest: 感谢圣灵你安全出来了。

String.Source: There was this mage though, with a wolf ring, he wanted to kill me anyway! But the leader...a tall, dashing Nord, said I could go.
String.Dest: 可当时就是这个法师，带着狼头戒指，想方设法要杀我！但是那个头目……一个身材高大，帅气的诺德人，说我可以走。

String.Source: I am afraid not, my hero. I found I am not as brave without you by my side. Especially when I am outnumbered ten to one.
String.Dest: 恐怕不是，我的英雄。如果没有你在身边我自己就一点也勇敢不起来了——尤其是当我独自面对十个敌人的时候。

String.Source: And without another thought you killed them all. You did kill them, didn't you?
String.Dest: 然后你就不假思索的干掉了他们。你确实杀光了他们，没错吧？

String.Source: And not just any ten. I was very impressed by the size of the apples in their throats.
String.Dest: 而且不是是个一般人。我当时只看他们那些巨大的喉结都被震惊了。

String.Source: And without another thought you killed them all. You did kill them, didn't you?
String.Dest: 然后你就不假思索的干掉了他们。你确实杀光了他们，没错吧？

String.Source: But the scariest one wasn't very big at all. He was a mage, with a ring bearing a wolf emblem.
String.Dest: 但是最可怕的那个却没那么大块头。他是个法师，戴着一只有狼形图腾的戒指。

String.Source: And without another thought you killed them all. You did kill them, didn't you?
String.Dest: 然后你就不假思索的干掉了他们。你确实杀光了他们，没错吧？

String.Source: My hero jests, but how often do you walk into a witches' den and find a group of burly soldiers comparing the size of their beards?
String.Dest: 搞笑吧英雄，你会经常到女巫的巢穴里去找一群大兵比较他们的胡子吗？

String.Source: That happens to me all the time. Nords...it's almost like they live here.
String.Dest: 我总有那种感觉，诺德人……好像他们就生活在这儿似的。

String.Source: There was even a woman who had a bigger one than all of them! She was very handsome.
String.Dest: 甚至还有个女人的胡子比他们都大！她可真是帅呆啦！

String.Source: That happens to me all the time. Nords...it's almost like they live here.
String.Dest: 我总有那种感觉，诺德人……好像他们就生活在这儿似的。

String.Source: Of course, what I remember most was the mage who was clean shaven. He wore a very strange ring, with the emblem of a wolf.
String.Dest: 当然，我记得最清楚的是那个胡子刮得很干净的法师。戴着很诡异的戒指，上面有狼形的图腾。

String.Source: That happens to me all the time. Nords...it's almost like they live here.
String.Dest: 我总有那种感觉，诺德人……好像他们就生活在这儿似的。

String.Source: Were they dressed like the assassins at the inn?
String.Dest: 他们在旅馆里就穿着刺客的行头吗？

String.Source: Now that you mention it, I think there was someone wearing that armor, but my focus was on the two men up front.
String.Dest: 按你的描述想起来，当时是有人穿着那身盔甲的，但我的注意力都在在前面那两个家伙上。

String.Source: Were they dressed like the assassins at the inn?
String.Dest: 他们在旅馆里就穿着刺客的行头吗？

String.Source: One of them was wearing mage robes and he was arguing with another person not wearing mage robes. The one with the robes wanted to go back inside.
String.Dest: 其中一个穿着法袍的在跟一个没穿法袍的争论。穿法袍的那个主张回去里面。

String.Source: My memory's kind of fuzzy, so I don't remember much, except the mage had a ring with a wolf on it.
String.Dest: 我的记忆有点儿模糊，所以记不得太多，只有那法师戴着一枚刻着狼形图腾的戒指。

String.Source: Were they dressed like the assassins at the inn?
String.Dest: 他们在旅馆里就穿着刺客的行头吗？

String.Source: (Laughs) Have you been following me? Yes, Joselyn told me there was a witch there who was trying to get her to join their coven.
String.Dest: （笑）你在听我说话吗？是的，约瑟琳告诉我是有个女巫想要她加入她们的聚会。

String.Source: Were you by chance at Orphan Rock in the past month?
String.Dest: 上个月你有没有路过孤儿岩？

String.Source: I was going to give her a very stern warning to leave my sister alone, but when I got there, there wasn't a single witch.
String.Dest: 我本来是去严厉警告她离我姐姐远点儿，可到了那一看，一个女巫也没有。

String.Source: Were you by chance at Orphan Rock in the past month?
String.Dest: 上个月你有没有路过孤儿岩？

String.Source: Instead, I found a group of Nords standing outside a cave.
String.Dest: 结果呢，我发现洞口有一群诺德人傻站在那儿。

String.Source: Were you by chance at Orphan Rock in the past month?
String.Dest: 上个月你有没有路过孤儿岩？

String.Source: What do they use the taproot for?
String.Dest: 她们到底拿这些直立根做什么用？

String.Source: You're not suggesting the spider put the treasure there, are you?
String.Dest: 你不是在建议蜘蛛把宝贝藏在这儿吧，是吗？

String.Source: Well...sort of.
String.Dest: 呃……有那么一点儿。

String.Source: Hm...Joselyn is a very good cook.
String.Dest: 嗯……约瑟琳绝对是个好厨子。

String.Source: So Uldvar didn't make it. He seemed very troubled. I hope he at least found some peace before he died.
String.Dest: 看来欧特法没有挺过来。看来是遭遇了大难。希望他至少在临死前能感到些许安宁吧。

String.Source: I hear growling. This time I am sure it is not my stomach.
String.Dest: 我听到了咆哮声。这次我敢肯定不是我的肚子在叫呢。

String.Source: Come on, Uldvar. It's like I tell the Heroes of Riverwood. If we don't trust each other, how can we work together?
String.Dest: 来吧，欧特法。就跟我对溪木镇英雄连说的一样。如果没有相互的信任，咱们怎么能一起干活儿呢？

String.Source: So Uldvar, we've come this far...are you going to tell us what this is all about?
String.Dest: 我说欧特法，咱都走了这么远了……你能跟大家讲讲这究竟是怎么回事吗？

String.Source: Well, my hero, we did not find the dashing Nord, but we did learn his name. I suppose we should go west and see if Uldvar found anything else.
String.Dest: 哎呀，英雄，我们没找到那个诺德帅哥，不过已经知道了他的名字。也许咱应该往西边去看看欧特法有什么收获。

String.Source: And I thank you for all your interesting observations, and for always being a gentleman.
String.Dest: 我还很感谢你的留心关注，还有始终保持礼貌的态度。

String.Source: Wait...the deer is filthier than the skeevers?
String.Dest: 等等……那头鹿怎么会比雪鼠还脏呢？

String.Source: Really? Is that true?
String.Dest: 真的？你确定吗？

String.Source: Well there's Embry the Inebriated, also known as Embry the Afflicted. He has been known to disarm a foe using only the contents of his stomach.
String.Dest: 还有个醉鬼安布瑞，也叫“苦难怪”安布瑞。他是以胃里吐出东西来使敌人缴械而闻名的。

String.Source: Yes, something like that.
String.Dest: 是啊，差不多吧。

String.Source: Well, only on Morndas, Middas, and Fredas. Or if she's in the mood.
String.Dest: 呃，只是在周一，周三，和周五。以及任何她有心情的时候。

String.Source: Vampires had attacked Riverwood at midnight, hoping to take advantage of the children's early bedtime.
String.Dest: 吸血鬼在午夜袭击了溪木镇，想要占到孩子们早睡的便宜。

String.Source: But Embry's belching had kept the entire town up that night, including the young ones. They met the vampires in the field armed and ready.
String.Dest: 但在那晚，安布瑞的打嗝声硬生生地吵醒了包括孩子们在内的整个镇上的居民。正好使他们面对外面吸血鬼时全副武装。

String.Source: Then, Frodnar the Brave charged ahead on the mighty war dog Stump, slaying the vampires Dorthe had knocked down with her thu'um.
String.Dest: 然后，勇者弗洛纳领着强大的战犬斯挞普冲上前去，杀掉了用朵西的吐目放倒的吸血鬼。

String.Source: I'd love to.
String.Dest: 我很乐意。

String.Source: Just one of the fabled Heroes of Riverwood.
String.Dest: 只是传说中的溪木镇英雄连之一。

String.Source: Well that was rude. My hero, are you sure you don't want to go east? The weather there seems less...cloudy.
String.Dest: 真是粗鲁啊，英雄。你确定不想去东边走走？那里的天气似乎没这么多……阴天。

String.Source: Alright, we are all going together. But first, we should introduce ourselves. My name is Zora Fair-Child, daughter of Riverwood.
String.Dest: 好啊，咱们一起走没问题。不过首先，有必要相互介绍一下。我的全名是“佐拉．菲欧巧儿”，溪木镇的好女儿。

String.Source: If the mage went west, then perhaps my hero and I will go east, to track down this other Nord and ask him why he's causing trouble in Riverwood.
String.Dest: 如果那法师去了西边，那也许我跟我家英雄该去东边，跟上那个诺德人问问他为什么要在溪木镇惹事。

String.Source: Actually, they went in different directions. The dashing Nord went east, but the one in robes went west.
String.Dest: 实际上，他们走了不同的方向。诺德大帅哥奔向东面，而穿法袍的那位去了西边。

String.Source: Why yes, he did sort of walk funny. Although he could've just twisted his ankle. The terrain is very rocky.
String.Dest: 啊没错，他走路的时候的确有点可笑。也可能是他扭伤了脚踝。地上的乱石头很多。

String.Source: (Sigh) It always ends this way. The Heroes of Riverwood can never sit still for more than a minute.
String.Dest: （叹）每次都是这样。溪木镇英雄连还真是一分钟都不得闲啊。

String.Source: Embry the Inebriated!
String.Dest: 醉鬼安布瑞！

String.Source: Frodnar the zombie!
String.Dest: 僵尸弗洛纳！

String.Source: Stump the Dog!
String.Dest: 战狗斯挞普！

String.Source: Dorthe the Alchemist!
String.Dest: 炼金术师朵西！

String.Source: Alright, I call the meeting of the Heroes of Riverwood to order.
String.Dest: 好的，现在我宣布溪木镇英雄大会正式开始。

String.Source: You have my steel.
String.Dest: 我愿为你效力。

String.Source: Follow me. I could use your help.
String.Dest: 跟我走吧。你能帮上我的忙。

String.Source: Follow me. I need your help.
String.Dest: 跟着我。我需要你的帮助。

String.Source: How do I look? Somehow I don't think this helmet suits me, but at least it covers my face.
String.Dest: How do I look? Somehow I don't think this helmet suits me, but at least it covers my face.

String.Source: A bow and arrow? I guess they aren't that hard to use. Harder than a sword, but easier than carrying bricks on my head.
String.Dest: 弓和箭？我猜没那么难用。或许比剑难一点，但一定比用头顶砖简单些.

String.Source: This Amulet of Dibella is a beautiful piece. It's like wearing a flower that never wilts. My Thane is generous.
String.Dest: 这迪贝拉护符可真精美呀。我的感觉就像戴着一朵永不枯萎的花。我家男爵确实是大方哈。

String.Source: You go, I'll follow.
String.Dest: 你领路，我跟着你。

String.Source: Right behind you.
String.Dest: 我紧随在后。

String.Source: Until next time.
String.Dest: 下回见。

String.Source: Goodbye.
String.Dest: 再见。

String.Source: Alright.
String.Dest: 好吧。

String.Source: Two hands are better than one.
String.Dest: Two hands are better than one.

String.Source: Kodlak...dead. We were too late...We could not save him.
String.Dest: Kodlak...dead. We were too late...We could not save him.

String.Source: You're back! Did you return the Skeleton Key? Does this mean I have to keep a tighter hold on my coin purse?
String.Dest: 你回来啦！把骷髅钥匙送回去了吗？这是不是意味着我得捂紧钱包了？

String.Source: Are we truly going to fight a dragon? This is exciting my lord, and a bit nerve-wracking too. I hope that is the ground shaking and not my knees.
String.Dest: 咱们真的要去打一条龙吗？真让人兴奋啊我的主人，虽然也有点儿紧张。希望到时候会颤抖的是地面而不是我的膝盖吧。

String.Source: For Kodlak! (Laughs) I couldn't resist.
String.Dest: 为了克拉科！（笑）我实在忍不住。

String.Source: Yes?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: Some say gems are a girl's best friend, but I doubt you would sell your best friend for money.
String.Dest: 有人说宝石是女孩儿最好的朋友。我就怀疑为了钱的话你会不会卖掉这最好的朋友。

String.Source: Remember, a good leader is brave, not reckless. Firm, but not rigid.
String.Dest: Remember, a good leader is brave, not reckless. Firm, but not rigid.

String.Source: Ready to move?
String.Dest: 准备行动？

String.Source: I'm right here.
String.Dest: 我一直在。

String.Source: Well met.
String.Dest: 很高兴见面。

String.Source: Well met.
String.Dest: 你好。

String.Source: Should I buy my hero a drink? Or will you be turning in early tonight?
String.Dest: Should I buy my hero a drink? Or will you be turning in early tonight?

String.Source: Who's got your back? I do.
String.Dest: Who's got your back? I do.

String.Source: Still here.
String.Dest: 还在这里。

String.Source: Something on your mind?
String.Dest: 有什么想法？

String.Source: Something on your mind?
String.Dest: 你有什么心事吗？

String.Source: Yes?
String.Dest: 什么事？

String.Source: So what now?
String.Dest: 那么现在呢？

String.Source: So what now?
String.Dest: 那现在该怎么做？

String.Source: Of course.
String.Dest: 当然了。

String.Source: (The Children Fair) I'll meet you in Riverwood.
String.Dest: (The Children Fair) I'll meet you in Riverwood.

String.Source: Of course.
String.Dest: 当然。

String.Source: Of course.
String.Dest: 当然了。

String.Source: (The Children Fair) I'll meet you inside the Falkreath Barracks.
String.Dest: (The Children Fair) I'll meet you inside the Falkreath Barracks.

String.Source: Of course.
String.Dest: 当然。

String.Source: Of course.
String.Dest: 当然了。

String.Source: (The Children Fair) I'll meet you outside Bloodlet Throne.
String.Dest: (The Children Fair) I'll meet you outside Bloodlet Throne.

String.Source: Of course.
String.Dest: 当然。

String.Source: That's none of your business, witch.
String.Dest: 这不关你的事，女巫。

String.Source: She's very shy.
String.Dest: 她很害羞的。

String.Source: Oh, I haven't even introduced you to my companion!
String.Dest: 噢，我还没来得及把你介绍给我的同伴们呢！

String.Source: Okay, then the three of us will go together.
String.Dest: 好吧，那咱三个就一路同行吧。

String.Source: Suddenly, I am feeling hungry for some goat roast...
String.Dest: 突然间，我觉得好想吃烤羊排啊……

String.Source: Joselyn, are you okay? Can you walk?
String.Dest: 约瑟琳, 你还好吧？可以走吗？

String.Source: My hero, I am hungry for some goat roast.
String.Dest: 我的英雄啊，我超想吃烤羊排啦。

String.Source: The deal is off, hag. Joselyn stays. So you can leave, or you can die.
String.Dest: 交易取消了，老巫婆，约瑟琳留下了。你要么走开，要么去死。

String.Source: Alright. When you're ready.
String.Dest: 没问题。就等你啦。

String.Source: Don't be.
String.Dest: 【不要啊。

String.Source: Don't worry sister. I'm here.
String.Dest: 别担心姐姐。我就在这儿。

String.Source: Joselyn!
String.Dest: 约瑟琳!

String.Source: Okay. If you're happy, then I'm happy. Goodbye, my sister.
String.Dest: 好吧。只要你开心，那我也开心。再见，我的姐姐。

String.Source: Are you sure you don't want to come with us?
String.Dest: 你确定不跟我们一起来？

String.Source: Joselyn, I have to go.
String.Dest: 约瑟琳，我必须走了。

String.Source: Joselyn...dear...I know at times I've been a bad sister. I should've been there for you when all I cared about was myself.
String.Dest: 约瑟琳.…亲爱的……我知道自己从前是个坏姐妹。我早该到这儿来找你可是却一直只在乎自己。

String.Source: And I know you're sorry for what happened that day. This field, this place...those were the days when we thought only of each other.
String.Dest: 我还知道那天的事情令你心怀愧疚。这片田园，在这里……是那些我们的心里只有彼此的日子啊。

String.Source: It's time I stopped being selfish, and thought about your happiness again. That's why I'm letting you stay.
String.Dest: 现在是时候结束我的自私，而再次为你的幸福着想了。所以我才让你留下的。

String.Source: I love you Joselyn. I will miss you always.
String.Dest: 我爱你，约瑟琳，我会永远想念你。

String.Source: Joselyn...dear...I know at times I've been a bad sister. I should've been there for you when all I cared about was myself.
String.Dest: 约瑟琳.…亲爱的……我知道自己从前是个坏姐妹。我早该到这儿来找你可是却一直只在乎自己。

String.Source: And I know you're sorry for what happened that day. This field, this place...you want to go back to those days when all our memories were beautiful.
String.Dest: 我知道你还在为那天发生的事感到遗憾。这片田园，这个地方……就是你想回到我们过去还很美好的记忆里啊。

String.Source: But sister...we can't. As much as we treasure them, those days are gone. But so is every day we grew apart.
String.Dest: 但姐姐……我们不能。无论怎么珍惜，那些日子也已过去。但那些令我们疏远的日子也一样过去啦。

String.Source: I love you Joselyn. Please, come home.
String.Dest: 我爱你约瑟琳。求求你，回家去吧。

String.Source: It was so warm that winter. Riverwood didn't see an ounce of snow. It all seems so foolish now, when Skyrim is so cold.
String.Dest: 那个冬天真的很暖。溪木镇没见一丁点儿的雪。现在看起来就很荒谬啦，整个天际的气候都这么冷了。

String.Source: The truth is, I never really cared much for snow. I love bright colors. I only pouted because it meant so much to her.
String.Dest: 事实上，我从来都不在乎雪什么的。我喜欢明亮的颜色。我生气只是因为她太在意。

String.Source: And maybe part of me wanted to be that sister again. The one who pretended to care about nothing, to protect the things that meant everything.
String.Dest: 而且或许我心里还是有点想再次成为那个妹妹吧。装作对一切都毫不在乎，来保护那些意味着的一切的东西。

String.Source: The day we met...I lied to you. I was on my way to the tundra, but it wasn't for Zora's field. It was always for Joselyn.
String.Dest: 咱们初次见面那一天……我对你说了谎。当时我是正在去冻土之地的路上，但不是去佐拉的田园。是为了约瑟琳。

String.Source: Joselyn, I-
I remember, sister. Every day.
String.Dest: 我记得，姐姐。每天都记得。

String.Source: Sister...you made this for me?
String.Dest: 姐姐……这是你为我做的？

String.Source: By the Gods...Joselyn?
String.Dest: 我的天呐……约瑟琳?

String.Source: Nothing. It was my stomach grumbling. I think I might be getting hungry.
String.Dest: 没什么。那是我的肚子响了。可能我是快要饿啦。

String.Source: Bloody hag...
String.Dest: 该死的鬼婆……

String.Source: Is that it? Is that the crystal?
String.Dest: 是那个吗？就是那个水晶吗？

String.Source: Fine, but try anything funny, and I won't hesitate to take your head.
String.Dest: 很好，但只要有丝毫不轨，我马上削下你的脑袋。

String.Source: Alright witch, you can call me what you wish, but I've heard about enough of you bad mouthing Joselyn.
String.Dest: 好吧女巫，你怎么叫我都无所谓，但我已经听够了你说约瑟琳的坏话。

String.Source: This is not the time for petty insults, witch. How did she escape into a crystal?
String.Dest: 现在可不是嘴上占便宜的时候，老巫婆。她是怎么进到水晶里面的？

String.Source: Where can we find this crystal?
String.Dest: 咱们去哪儿找到这水晶啊？

String.Source: What do you mean? What crystal?
String.Dest: 你说什么？什么水晶？

String.Source: Joselyn would never join a coven. Something must have happened.
String.Dest: 约瑟琳才不会参加一个女巫聚会呢。一定发生什么事了。

String.Source: And what is that, exactly?
String.Dest: 那，到底是什么啊？

String.Source: She's my sister.
String.Dest: 她是我姐姐。

String.Source: Wait...this mage's name...was it Joselyn?
String.Dest: 等一下……这位法师的名字……是约瑟琳？

String.Source: Do...do you think they found her? I'm starting to get worried.
String.Dest: 你……你觉得他们找到她了么？我开始担心了。

String.Source: Really? You know she doesn't like to be seen in Riverwood. Why did she come?
String.Dest: 真的吗？要知道她是不喜欢在溪木镇露面的。为什么还要来呢？

String.Source: Orgnar, have you heard anything about Joselyn?
String.Dest: 奥格那，你有没有听到过关于约瑟琳的事儿？

String.Source: Hey, watch it!
String.Dest: 喂，注意点！

String.Source: I'm on your side!
String.Dest: 我就在你身旁！

String.Source: Stop that!
String.Dest: 停下来！

String.Source: Don't worry, Skjarn, I'm not going to duel you. It just wouldn't be fair.
String.Dest: 别担心，史卡盎, 我没打算跟你决斗。因为那是不公平的。

String.Source: I have never seen this Breton you speak of, but if he is as obsessed as you say, then I think you two deserve each other.
String.Dest: 我从没见过你说的这个布莱顿人，但如果他像你说的那样痴迷于此，那你俩真是般配。

String.Source: And how are you doing, Skjarn?
String.Dest: 你也好吗，史卡盎？

String.Source: No, everything is perfect, love.
String.Dest: 不，亲爱的，每件事都很完美。

String.Source: Good, be sure to tell that to the Jarl the next time he wants to throw a party.
String.Dest: 好吧，下次领主想举行宴会的时候一定要把这事告诉他。

String.Source: Soon the Heroes of Riverwood will be known as much for their gala festivals as their ferocity in battle.
String.Dest: 用不了多久溪木镇英雄连的盛大节日就会和他们战场上的勇猛一样威名远扬了。

String.Source: No, everything is perfect, love.
String.Dest: 不，亲爱的，每件事都很完美。

String.Source: No, everything is perfect, love.
String.Dest: 不，亲爱的，每件事都很完美。

String.Source: And did I tell you I love you, husband? But you already knew that.
String.Dest: 我跟你说过我爱你吗，老公？但其实你早知道啦。

String.Source: Were you kidnapped by a necromancer? They tend to do things like that, but they can't keep us from finding each other in the end.
String.Dest: 你被亡灵术士绑架了吗？他们就爱做这样的事，但他们无法阻止咱们最终找到彼此。

String.Source: I know what everyone did, but I wasn't there. My mind was in another place.
String.Dest: 我知道别人都怎么想，但是我当时并不算是在那里。我当时在琢磨其他的事。

String.Source: We're together now, and that's all that matters. But if you fall asleep again, I will bop you on the head.
String.Dest: 咱们现在在一起，这就足够啦。不过要是你再睡着啦，我就使劲敲你的脑袋。

String.Source: I know what everyone did, but I wasn't there. My mind was in another place.
String.Dest: 我知道别人都怎么想，但是我当时并不算是在那里。我当时在琢磨其他的事。

String.Source: Love, you won't believe this, but this all seems like a dream.
String.Dest: 亲爱的，你没法相信，这一切都跟做梦一样。

String.Source: Of course it does! I am a master at planning parties. Either that, or you are still groggy from your nap.
String.Dest: 那是当然！我可是筹备聚会方面的大师！或者呢，也可能是你还迷迷糊糊没睡醒。

String.Source: Love, you won't believe this, but this all seems like a dream.
String.Dest: 亲爱的，你没法相信，这一切都跟做梦一样。

String.Source: But if this is a dream, then don't be a bad guest and wake up. How will I explain my husband leaving his wife's party?
String.Dest: 但要真是个梦的话，【那就别搞怪了赶紧醒醒。我要怎么解释我丈夫离开了他妻子的聚会这事？

String.Source: Works for me. The floor is all yours, Zora
String.Dest: 跟我干吧。地板全归你了，佐拉。

String.Source: I thank you, my champion. I am always more comfortable when I have your permission.
String.Dest: 谢谢你，我的勇士。每当得到你的认可我都立刻觉得舒服多啦。

String.Source: Too bad. You're getting one. Fighting with you all was the best of times...
String.Dest: 真糟糕。你是对的。和你们战斗真是其乐无穷…

String.Source: Oh no, really, it's not necessary. Perhaps you can read it to me later, when we're making camp and I have trouble sleeping.
String.Dest: 哦，不，真的，真没这个必要。也许一会儿你可以读给我听，在咱们安营扎寨的而我又要失眠的时候。

String.Source: Thank the Divines. I don't need that kind of attention.
String.Dest: 谢天谢地。我对那种关注没有需要。

String.Source: Don't worry, I will keep them from staring, if only for a little while.
String.Dest: 别担心，我会盯紧他们，只要不是太久。

String.Source: Bloody skeevers, that's too bad. I love giving speeches.
String.Dest: 血腥的雪鼠们，真是太糟了。我爱演讲。

String.Source: Well, maybe next time. I think we're all tired, so I'll keep this short.
String.Dest: 嗯，或许下次吧，我看咱们都累了，那就长话短说吧。

String.Source: Not yet. I want to enjoy this a bit longer.
String.Dest: 先不要。我还想在这儿多享受一下。

String.Source: (Laughs) Of course, my champion. Take all the time you need.
String.Dest: （笑）当然，我的勇士。尽管慢慢来嘛。

String.Source: It's time. Let's end the party.
String.Dest: 是时候了，让我们来结束这场聚会。

String.Source: Very well, just leave it to me.
String.Dest: 很好，交给我吧。

String.Source: Do you mind leading the way?
String.Dest: 你走前面好吗？

String.Source: Not at all, my liege. Although this may be the first time you have ever seen my back. You might mistake me for someone else.
String.Dest: 绝对不行啊，主人。尽管您可能会第一次看到我的后背，但您很可能把我看成另一个人。

String.Source: Do you mind leading the way?
String.Dest: 你走前面好吗？

String.Source: Come on, everyone's waiting.
String.Dest: 来吧，大伙们可都等着呐。

String.Source: Can you remind me where the party is being held?
String.Dest: 你能给我提个醒那聚会是在哪举办吗？

String.Source: Of course, my liege. It's behind Jorrvaskr. I was thinking the Bannered Mare at first, but I prefer the outdoors.
String.Dest: 当然啦，大人。就在月瓦斯卡的后面，我本来先想到的是母马横幅旅店，但我更喜欢野外。

String.Source: Can you remind me where the party is being held?
String.Dest: 你能给我提个醒那聚会是在哪举办吗？

String.Source: Come on, everyone's waiting.
String.Dest: 来吧，大伙们可都等着呐。

String.Source: A party sounds perfect right about now.
String.Dest: 现在开个派对就完美啦。

String.Source: Then why are you here counting mudcrabs? There is plenty of time for that after we are all drunk.
String.Dest: 那你干嘛在这里数螃蟹玩啊？不如咱们去喝几杯再一起来醉醺醺地慢慢数。

String.Source: Are you sure you're not confusing dreams with reality? All three of us helped bring down Gren's rebellion, in case you forgot.
String.Dest: 你确定自己不是在做白日梦？提醒你一下，是我们三个一起把格伦的反叛给镇压下去的。

String.Source: I had the weirdest dream. You were there, and Anum-La, and...
String.Dest: 我做了一个非常非常奇怪的梦。梦里有你，还有安努姆菈，还有…

String.Source: You know damn well I hate parties.
String.Dest: 你当然知道我是讨厌派对的。

String.Source: Well, too bad. My grumpy husband is going to come to the party and for one night, he will not be such a sourpuss.
String.Dest: 哎，真糟糕。我家的暴脾气英雄要去参加聚会而且呆一晚上，再没有比这更让他郁闷的事啦。

String.Source: You know damn well I hate parties.
String.Dest: 你当然知道我是讨厌派对的。

String.Source: Well, too bad. My grumpy hero is going to come to the party and for one night, he will not be such a sourpuss.
String.Dest: 哎，真糟糕。我家的暴脾气英雄要去参加聚会而且呆一晚上，没有比这更让他郁闷的事啦。

String.Source: Well, too bad. My grumpy hero is going to come to the party and for one night, she will not be such a sourpuss.
String.Dest: 哎，真糟糕。我家的暴脾气英雄要去参加聚会而且呆一晚上，她没有比这更郁闷的事啦。

String.Source: You know damn well I hate parties.
String.Dest: 你当然知道我是讨厌派对的。

String.Source: The end of Gren's Rebellion! And of course, you joining the Heroes of Riverwood.
String.Dest: 格伦的革命结束了！理所当然的，你加入了溪木镇英雄连。

String.Source: Party? For what? What are we celebrating?
String.Dest: 聚会？为了什么？我们有什么好庆祝的？

String.Source: Party? For what? What are we celebrating?
String.Dest: 聚会？为了什么？我们有什么好庆祝的？

String.Source: And not to mention all the other things you've done. We really don't have time to go through all of them.
String.Dest: 更别说你还在别的事儿上耽搁了太多。咱们是真没时间【走完全程了。

String.Source: There you are, sleepy head! You're going to miss your own party!
String.Dest: 可找到你了，蠢货！你差点错过自己的派对！

String.Source: Let me know whenever you want to wrap up the party. After all, you're the guest of honor. So you get to decide when it's over.
String.Dest: 什么时候想结束聚会的话就跟我说声啊。毕竟，你是荣誉客人。结束时间应该由你来定。

String.Source: Is it time? Or do you want to mingle with the guests some more?
String.Dest: 是时候结束了吗？还是说您想同客人们多呆一会？

String.Source: No, I'm kidding. You have already done enough, there is no need to give us a grand speech.
String.Dest: 不，我开玩笑的。你已经做的够多了，没必要再来一场伟大演讲啦。

String.Source: I'm afraid so.
String.Dest: 恐怕是的哦。

String.Source: No, I'm afraid this party will go well past his bedtime.
String.Dest: 不，这个聚会恐怕是肯定要开过他的睡觉时间啦。

String.Source: (Laughs) I guess we have something in common then after all.
String.Dest: （笑）那看来咱们到底还是有共同点吧。

String.Source: I hope you didn't come to the party to mope, Uldvar. Anja can rest easy, now that the war-teacher is dead.
String.Dest: 我希望你不是专程来伤心的，欧特法. 现在安雅可以安息了，那个战争导师已经死了。

String.Source: And how are you doing, Skjarn?
String.Dest: 你也好吗，史卡盎？

String.Source: To the Dragonborn!
String.Dest: 龙裔万岁！

String.Source: Hear, hear!
String.Dest: 我同意！

String.Source: Huzzah!
String.Dest: 好啊！

String.Source: And here we are.
String.Dest: 咱们到啦。

String.Source: Parties like this are a good place to play matchmaker.
String.Dest: 这样的聚会可是个扮演媒人的好地方。

String.Source: Actually, I think he's married to the Dragonborn.
String.Dest: 实际上，我觉得他是嫁给了龙裔。

String.Source: Do we even know what kind of girl he likes?
String.Dest: 咱们连他喜欢什么类型的女孩儿都知道吗？

String.Source: Don't worry, Skjarn, I'm not going to duel you. It just wouldn't be fair.
String.Dest: 别担心，史卡盎, 我没打算跟你决斗。因为那是不公平的。

String.Source: I have never seen this Breton you speak of, but if he is as obsessed as you say, then I think you two deserve each other.
String.Dest: 我从没见过你说的这个布莱顿人，但如果他像你说的那样痴迷于此，那你俩真是般配。

String.Source: Just a little further. Be patient. I don't want you running off to the party without me.
String.Dest: 再走几步就到啦。耐心点。我可不想让你丢下我一个人去参加宴会。

String.Source: Don't worry, I didn't invite Heimskr. Although sometimes it feels like he's there anyway.
String.Dest: 别担心，我没有邀请海姆斯科。虽然有时觉得他一直在。

String.Source: Of course, the most welcome guest of all is a clear sky. I am glad it showed up.
String.Dest: 当然，就希望晴天呢。天晴了真好。

String.Source: Still, if we include the Companions, there will be enough people where you will feel sufficiently loved.
String.Dest: 不过，如果算上整个战友团，咱们觉得可爱的人数就凑够啦。

String.Source: Joselyn, for instance, does not like being around crowds. And Embry would drink all the mead, so I forgot to invite him. I'm sure he'll get over it.
String.Dest: 举个例子，约瑟琳不喜欢被围观。还有安布瑞会把酒喝个精光，所以我“忘记”邀请他了。我想他会谅解的。

String.Source: I'm sorry Rumarin, but the party is over. Although if you keep interrupting me, I might just end our friendship as well.
String.Dest: 我很抱歉罗米勒，派对已经结束了。不过如果你继续烦我的话，我能让我们的友谊也一起结束。

String.Source: Now, we've all come to this party to celebrate our victory, and more importantly our friendship.
String.Dest: 现在，我们都来这个聚会庆祝我们的胜利，以及更重要的我们的友谊。

String.Source: But while two of those things will last forever, one of them has to come to an end.
String.Dest: 虽然其中两个会永远存在，可还是有一个总会走到尽头。

String.Source: If I may have everyone's attention, the Dragonborn would like to say a few words.
String.Dest: 各位朋友静一静啦，龙裔大人有话要说。

String.Source: Welcome to your party, my hero.
String.Dest: 欢迎来到你的派对，我的英雄。

String.Source: But you have so many friends, and there are only so many seats, so do not be mad if some of them could not come.
String.Dest: 你的朋友那么多，这里的座位却很有限。所以咱别为某些朋友的缺席而生气吧。

String.Source: I'm very pleased with the turnout. I even coaxed one of the other Thanes to be at your party! It was quite a coup.
String.Dest: 我对到场人数非常满意。甚至还哄来了一位男爵加入你们！真是次成功的活动呢。

String.Source: I'm very pleased with the turnout.
String.Dest: 我对出席人数非常满意呀。

String.Source: I hope we have enough drinks. You never really know if there's enough.
String.Dest: 但愿咱们准备了足够的酒水。谁也没法想象到底多少才够。

String.Source: If you want a drink, the barrel is right by where Anum-La is standing. I told her to stop anyone who drinks too much. Or too little.
String.Dest: 你要是想喝酒，桶就在安努姆菈那里立着。我让她拦着那些喝太多的人，还有喝的太少的。

String.Source: Good work, my liege.
String.Dest: Good work, my liege.

String.Source: And that's the last of them.
String.Dest: And that's the last of them.

String.Source: We make such a good team!
String.Dest: We make such a good team!

String.Source: I think I might've hurt my wrist. No, wait, it was that one's head.
String.Dest: I think I might've hurt my wrist. No, wait, it was that one's head.

String.Source: That'll teach them.
String.Dest: That'll teach them.

String.Source: That was fun. Fighting is a good way to lose weight. Except if you lose. Then it's very, very bad.
String.Dest: That was fun. Fighting is a good way to lose weight. Except if you lose. Then it's very, very bad.

String.Source: Phew! That was close.
String.Dest: Phew! That was close.

String.Source: That was a very tough fight. I think even my scars have scars.
String.Dest: That was a very tough fight. I think even my scars have scars.

String.Source: That's it. On to the next battle. Or maybe the next inn.
String.Dest: That's it. On to the next battle. Or maybe the next inn.

String.Source: That was a good workout.
String.Dest: That was a good workout.

String.Source: That should take care of them.
String.Dest: That should take care of them.

String.Source: REPLACE
String.Dest: REPLACE

String.Source: I think I learned something from that fight. Don't get hit.
String.Dest: I think I learned something from that fight. Don't get hit.

String.Source: We grow stronger with each fight. At least, I like to think so.
String.Dest: We grow stronger with each fight. At least, I like to think so.

String.Source: I think I'm getting better. I probably only got a handful of scars from this fight.
String.Dest: I think I'm getting better. I probably only got a handful of scars from this fight.

String.Source: Now, what was I gonna say? Before I got interrupted. Oh, never mind.
String.Dest: Now, what was I gonna say? Before I got interrupted. Oh, never mind.

String.Source: Looks like that was the last of them. But we should be cautious in case there are others.
String.Dest: Looks like that was the last of them. But we should be cautious in case there are others.

String.Source: Another battle, another victory for my hero and his faithful charge.
String.Dest: Another battle, another victory for my hero and his faithful charge.

String.Source: Looks like that's the last of them. We really make for a deadly pair.
String.Dest: Looks like that's the last of them. We really make for a deadly pair.

String.Source: All right, the way's clear. Let's keep moving.
String.Dest: All right, the way's clear. Let's keep moving.

String.Source: I'm afraid so.
String.Dest: 恐怕是的哦。

String.Source: No, I'm afraid this party will go well past his bedtime.
String.Dest: 不，这个聚会恐怕是肯定要开过他的睡觉时间啦。

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: {Departs}
String.Dest: {离开 }

String.Source: Alas, it's time for us to part ways.
String.Dest: 行啦，是咱们分道扬镳的时候啦。

String.Source: I'll be home if you need me.
String.Dest: 当你需要时到家里来找我。

String.Source: All right, then.
String.Dest: 那就这样吧。

String.Source: It's nothing. Never mind.
String.Dest: 没什么事，不用担心。

String.Source: Yes. Let me show you.
String.Dest: 对，我来告诉你。

String.Source: Sure.
String.Dest: 当然。

String.Source: Need anything?
String.Dest: 有什么想法？

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我要和你交换物品。

String.Source: Let's stop and trade some things.
String.Dest: 我们停一下，我想跟你交换点东西。

String.Source: Sure, I'll carry it all. I'll just imagine this sack is full of jewelry and dresses and boots. I would never drop that.
String.Dest: 当然，给我什么我都拿。我就想象袋子里装的全是珠宝服饰和靴子。那些我从不会扔掉的东西。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我要和你交换物品。

String.Source: Let's stop and trade some things.
String.Dest: 我们停一下，我想跟你交换点东西。

String.Source: Okay. Trading things is always fun.
String.Dest: 好啊。换点啥都是有趣的。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我要和你交换物品。

String.Source: Alright, let's trade.
String.Dest: 好啊，来嘛。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我要和你交换物品。

String.Source: What do you need me to take?
String.Dest: 你有什么要我拿的？

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我要和你交换物品。

String.Source: I'll carry what I can.
String.Dest: 只要扛得动我就扛。

String.Source: I need to trade some things with you.
String.Dest: 我要和你交换物品。

String.Source: Alright, I'll carry this for you.
String.Dest: 好吧，我帮你拿着。

String.Source: Not a problem.
String.Dest: 没问题。

String.Source: I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 我需要你帮我做些事。

String.Source: Not a problem.
String.Dest: 没问题。

String.Source: I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 我需要你帮我做些事。

String.Source: What do you need?
String.Dest: 你想要什么？

String.Source: I need you to do something for me.
String.Dest: 我需要你帮我做些事。

String.Source: Of course. What would you ever do without me?
String.Dest: 当然啦。没有了我你该怎么办？

String.Source: Follow me.
String.Dest: 跟着我。

String.Source: Lead the way, my hero.
String.Dest: 前面带路，我的英雄。

String.Source: I'll stand guard until you get back.
String.Dest: 当然。我会一直守在这里直到你回来。

String.Source: Wait here for a moment.
String.Dest: 在这儿等一下.

String.Source: Wait here.
String.Dest: 在这里等着。

String.Source: Turning pillars is almost as fun as pressing buttons! But not quite.
String.Dest: 转动台柱几乎和按动按钮一样好玩！但也不完全。

String.Source: Anything else?
String.Dest: 还有其他事吗？

String.Source: Anything else?
String.Dest: 还有其他事吗？

String.Source: Anything else?
String.Dest: 还有其他事吗？

String.Source: Anything else?
String.Dest: 还有其他事吗？

String.Source: It cannot be done, my lord.
String.Dest: 臣妾做不到啊，陛下。

String.Source: I'm sorry, I cannot do it, my Thane.
String.Dest: 抱歉，我不能那样做，大人，

String.Source: Turning the pillar!
String.Dest: 转动柱子咯！

String.Source: Once more, with feeling!
String.Dest: 再来一次，带点感觉！

String.Source: I wish all the locks were opened this way!
String.Dest: 真希望所有的锁都能这样开！

String.Source: Pressing the button!
String.Dest: 按下按钮咯！

String.Source: This is too much fun!
String.Dest: 真是太好玩啦！

String.Source: Okay, you can press it now, my Thane. Your housecarl has had her fill.
String.Dest: 好啦男爵大人，您可以自己去按了。您的女侍卫已经爽够啦。

String.Source: Alright.
String.Dest: 好吧。

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: Okay.
String.Dest: 好的。

String.Source: Zzzzz...
String.Dest: Zzzzz……

String.Source: I'm so happy Gleda's okay, but the Giant seemed very sad to lose her. I hope we did the right thing.
String.Dest: I'm so happy Gleda's okay, but the Giant seemed very sad to lose her. I hope we did the right thing.

String.Source: It sounds like these ghosts don't want to attack us. Either that, or they're very good liars.
String.Dest: It sounds like these ghosts don't want to attack us. Either that, or they're very good liars.

String.Source: So with the warlock dead, these souls can go back to haunting people they don't like, instead of the people they do.
String.Dest: So with the warlock dead, these souls can go back to haunting people they don't like, instead of the people they do.

String.Source: This is no normal necromancer, my Thane. These poor ghosts are his prisoner, and this entire barrow is their cage.
String.Dest: This is no normal necromancer, my Thane. These poor ghosts are his prisoner, and this entire barrow is their cage.

String.Source: You sold the farmer's goat to a giant? That seems very unlike you, my Thane. Also, very unlike the Giant.
String.Dest: You sold the farmer's goat to a giant? That seems very unlike you, my Thane. Also, very unlike the Giant.

String.Source: My Thane! We did it! We vanquished King Olaf in the flesh! Well, not really flesh, but you get the idea.
String.Dest: My Thane! We did it! We vanquished King Olaf in the flesh! Well, not really flesh, but you get the idea.

String.Source: With the bard's poem you have everything Viarmo needs to make his petition. Though I still don't like the idea of burning anyone, even a straw king.
String.Dest: With the bard's poem you have everything Viarmo needs to make his petition. Though I still don't like the idea of burning anyone, even a straw king.

String.Source: So the ghost is a bard! Now this is starting to make a little more sense.
String.Dest: So the ghost is a bard! Now this is starting to make a little more sense.

String.Source: Was it me, or was that ghost playing a lute? I think I even heard music, but perhaps that part was in my head.
String.Dest: Was it me, or was that ghost playing a lute? I think I even heard music, but perhaps that part was in my head.

String.Source: The Helm of Winterhold...I've heard of the Jagged Crown, but not this one. Either way, it does seem like the Nords are fond of losing their helmets.
String.Dest: The Helm of Winterhold...I've heard of the Jagged Crown, but not this one. Either way, it does seem like the Nords are fond of losing their helmets.

String.Source: So the Pale Lady is real. Be careful, my Thane, this is no ordinary wisp. It's almost as if she draws strength from that mist.
String.Dest: So the Pale Lady is real. Be careful, my Thane, this is no ordinary wisp. It's almost as if she draws strength from that mist.

String.Source: Slaying Hevnoraak was a great deed. It's too bad it will go unnoticed, but sometimes being a hero is a thankless job.
String.Dest: Slaying Hevnoraak was a great deed. It's too bad it will go unnoticed, but sometimes being a hero is a thankless job.

String.Source: It looks like they're stockpiling vats of this green slime. We need to put an end to this before they spread it to the people.
String.Dest: It looks like they're stockpiling vats of this green slime. We need to put an end to this before they spread it to the people.

String.Source: We must help Valdar slay this evil. He did say he needed a champion, after all, and I don't mind loaning you out from time to time.
String.Dest: We must help Valdar slay this evil. He did say he needed a champion, after all, and I don't mind loaning you out from time to time.

String.Source: It's hard to call this a Dwarven ruin. It's more like a city. Still, we can't get caught looking around.
String.Dest: It's hard to call this a Dwarven ruin. It's more like a city. Still, we can't get caught looking around.

String.Source: Another shrine. I wouldn't get too close to it. It has more of that ichor pooling around the base.
String.Dest: Another shrine. I wouldn't get too close to it. It has more of that ichor pooling around the base.

String.Source: This city must be twice, no three or four times the size of Markarth. And it'd be safe from any dragon attack. It's amazing no one has claimed it.
String.Dest: This city must be twice, no three or four times the size of Markarth. And it'd be safe from any dragon attack. It's amazing no one has claimed it.

String.Source: So according to Peryite, this Elf he wants dead is in a Dwarven ruin full of sick people. Perhaps this would be a time when it's okay to wear a mask.
String.Dest: So according to Peryite, this Elf he wants dead is in a Dwarven ruin full of sick people. Perhaps this would be a time when it's okay to wear a mask.

String.Source: This passage runs right under the bandit camp. Funny how there's no guard. Do you think the chief is keeping a secret?
String.Dest: 这条通道正好从强盗营地下面穿过。神奇的是居然没人看守。你会不会觉得是他们头儿留给自己的？

String.Source: I'm sorry Golldir. Your aunt must've known she couldn't do this alone. But keeping you alive was more important than saving the dead.
String.Dest: 我很抱歉【Golldir】。你的姑妈肯定知道自己过不了这关……不过保住你的命比救活死人要重要。

String.Source: This Gathrik must have been some legend to have his tomb buried so deep. The normal heroes get a little more sun.
String.Dest: 这个加斯瑞克的墓居然埋得这么深，肯定是个传奇人物。一般的英雄塚多少能见点光。

String.Source: Now I get why there's so many empty barrels. They've been making meals for all these animals. Well, at least, I hope that's what they feed them.
String.Dest: 终于明白为什么有那么多空桶了。他们是在给这些动物做饲料。呃，反正，希望是在喂养它们吧。

String.Source: That was a good fight, my Thane! The Red Eagle was very tall for a Breton. No wonder the Forsworn looked up to him.
String.Dest: That was a good fight, my Thane! The Red Eagle was very tall for a Breton. No wonder the Forsworn looked up to him.

String.Source: The legend says the Red Eagle asked his sword be returned when his people were free. Meaning, if we do return it now, he might be a tad disappointed.
String.Dest: The legend says the Red Eagle asked his sword be returned when his people were free. Meaning, if we do return it now, he might be a tad disappointed.

String.Source: Those skulls probably belonged to peddlers who got lost on the way to Rorikstead. Hopefully we've given them some measure of peace.
String.Dest: Those skulls probably belonged to peddlers who got lost on the way to Rorikstead. Hopefully we've given them some measure of peace.

String.Source: Why are the barrels stacked like this? They might be using it for cover, but...I feel like this is part of some drinking game I haven't heard of.
String.Dest: 这些桶干嘛要堆成这样？可能拿来当掩体用，不过……更像是要搞一场新奇的饮酒大赛。

String.Source: I think it's sweet that Fjola kept her wedding band. It's obvious part of her still loves her husband. But sometimes that's not enough.
String.Dest: 很高兴菲欧拉留下了她的结婚戒指。显然她心里还留有她丈夫的一点位置，只是不够多吧。

String.Source: That beacon you're holding is so bright, I think you can go blind staring at it. But I can't help myself.
String.Dest: 你拿的那东西真亮，我觉得老盯它着看就要被晃瞎了。可我控制不住自己。

String.Source: Dawnbreaker is an impressive sword. You are definitely a champion worthy of wielding it.
String.Dest: 破晓者是把神剑呐。您绝对是配得上用它的真英雄。

String.Source: You killed the dog? But it was so cute! And kind of annoying, but my lord should really learn not to kill everything that bothers him.
String.Dest: 你把那狗杀了？它多可爱啊！是有点吵人，但我的主人应该知道不要把所有招他厌烦的东西都杀掉啊。

String.Source: You killed the dog? But it was so cute! And kind of annoying, but my lady should really learn not to kill everything that bothers her.
String.Dest: 你把那狗杀了？它多可爱啊！也是有点罗嗦，可我的女士该学会不要随手杀掉任何会烦到她的东西吧。

String.Source: I am glad you spared the dog. Yes, he was a Daedric Prince, but he was also adorable. Those two cancel each other out.
String.Dest: 我很高兴你留了那条狗活着。嗯，它是个魔神，但也确实很萌啊。所以就当互相抵消啦。

String.Source: I love bear dens. Mostly because I like bearskin rugs. Now we have even more to lay down by the fire.
String.Dest: 我喜欢熊洞。主要因为我喜欢熊皮毯子吧。现在咱们多得都可以在火堆旁打地铺了。

String.Source: You've done it, my liege! By the Divines, an Elder Scroll!
String.Dest: 你成功啦，大王！感谢圣灵，上古卷轴入手啦！

String.Source: These Dwemer puzzles are not as easy as the Nord ones. I suggest just pressing buttons randomly. What? It always works for me.
String.Dest: 这些矮人机关可不像诺德机关那么简单。我建议把所有按钮胡乱按几遍就好。什么？我用这招一直很成功啊。

String.Source: What a strange and mysterious world. It's like the inside of some forgotten dream.
String.Dest: 多么奇异的一个神秘次元啊。就好像在一个以前做过的梦里一样。

String.Source: I don't understand...why would these people fight for the Falmer? Don't they miss their homes? Their families?
String.Dest: 我搞不懂……为什么那些人会替雪精灵卖命？他们不想家吗？不想他们的亲人吗？

String.Source: This is a cozy little place to live. It just needs a woman's touch. And probably a source of food.
String.Dest: 这可真是个美妙的小窝。只要有个女人打理一下。再找个食物来源就完美啦。

String.Source: Pointy spears, flames...there are traps everywhere, but at least they built us benches to relax and lick our wounds.
String.Dest: 尖矛，火焰……这里还真是充斥着陷阱啊。但至少他们修了些凳子来给咱们坐下放松舔舔伤口什么的。

String.Source: This den is so empty. If I were the bandit chief, I would order my men to attack caravans that deliver furniture. It's such a waste of space.
String.Dest: 这个大洞空空荡荡啊。要我是强盗头子，就叫人去找运家具的车队抢些来。这样可真是浪费空间啊。

String.Source: I like this old man. He is completely mad, but in a charming way, and not the scary kind.
String.Dest: 我喜欢这老头。虽然他是疯透了，但却不是吓人反而很迷人的那种。

String.Source: Why...why do the Falmer torture people? I don't understand.
String.Dest: 为什么……为什么雪精灵们要折磨人类啊？真是搞不懂。

String.Source: Can I turn the pillars? My liege should not hog the fun.
String.Dest: 可以让我来转动机关吗？我的大王不该把好玩的都留给自己吧。

String.Source: Sky Haven Temple. Alduin's Wall. Today was a full day, wasn't it? I hope the Akavir didn't use stone beds.
String.Dest: Sky Haven Temple. Alduin's Wall. Today was a full day, wasn't it? I hope the Akavir didn't use stone beds.

String.Source: Another Greybeard! I wonder why he stays up on the mountain? He must not like one of the others.
String.Dest: 又一个灰胡子！真奇怪为什么他一个人留在山里？肯定跟其他几个大不一样。

String.Source: My Thane, can you come here? I want to ask you a question.
String.Dest: 我的男爵，你能来这里么？我想问您个问题。

String.Source: My Thane, can you come here? I want to ask you a question.
String.Dest: 我的男爵，你能来这里么？我想问您个问题。

String.Source: My Thane, can you come here? I want to ask you a question.
String.Dest: 我的男爵，你能来这里么？我想问您个问题。

String.Source: Ustengrav. You know, the dead bandit by the entrance reminds me of someone I met in Brittleshin Pass. His name was also bandit.
String.Dest: 炙燃墓。你知道吗，这个死在入口的强盗让我想起了我在布莱特辛山隘见过的某人，他的名字也一样是强盗。

String.Source: I would very much like to see Alduin's Wall. To be named after the World Eater, it must be gigantic!
String.Dest: 我真的要看看奥杜因之墙。以世界吞噬者命名，一定非常巨大!

String.Source: A mystery person wants to meet at the Sleeping Giant Inn? (Gasp) What if Hjoromir was a hero all along?
String.Dest: 一个神秘人物想在沉睡巨人旅店见面? （喘气）难道说肖罗密尔是深藏不露的英雄?

String.Source: Well, we're here. Who could it be? I don't see anyone new. Do you think this mystery person will visit us in the middle of the night?
String.Dest: 好啦，咱们到了。到底会是谁呢？我没看到一个生面孔。你觉得这个神秘人会在午夜来找咱吗？

String.Source: So it was you who left the note, Delphine! Wait, who exactly are you? Is Delphine your real name? I feel like I don't even know you anymore.
String.Dest: 原来你就是留下笔记的那个人，戴尔芬！等等，你到底是谁啊? 戴尔芬是你的真名吗? 我好像完全不认识你了。

String.Source: This place is dark...and kind of smelly. We should have brought Esbern some scented candles. That would draw him out.
String.Dest: 这地方真暗……还有股怪味儿。咱们真该拿些香薰蜡烛来。直接能把伊斯本熏出来。

String.Source: Esbern should really take his time. If the Thalmor come snooping around, we could always just lock the door.
String.Dest: 伊斯本真的不用急。就算有梭默来转悠，咱们还是可以把门儿锁上嘛。

String.Source: So...how was the Embassy party? Was there dancing?
String.Dest: 那……大使馆的派对好玩吗？跳舞了吗？

String.Source: We made it to Ivarstead! But, my liege, it is probably too late to make the climb. We should rest at the inn and start our journey in the morning.
String.Dest: 咱们到紫杉镇了！不过殿下，现在有点晚了，咱还是先在旅馆里休息一下，明早再启程吧。

String.Source: The fall forest, the rushing water, Ivarstead is just as I had pictured it. It makes you want to take a nap on a pile of leaves.
String.Dest: 秋日的树林，奔腾的流水，紫杉镇和我想象中一样，让你想要靠在树叶堆旁美美地打个盹。

String.Source: Poor Klimmek! The other townsfolk should really help him feed the Greybeards. Although when you put it that way, it makes them sound like pets.
String.Dest: 可怜的科林麦！其他的居民也应该帮他供养灰胡子才是。虽然这样说起来搞得像他们是宠物一样。

String.Source: Climbing the 7,000 steps wasn't so hard. Harder than taking a nap, but easier than teaching a troll to dance.
String.Dest: 爬上7000级台阶没有那么难嘛。哦是比打个盹儿难一点，但是比教巨魔跳舞容易。

String.Source: You truly are Dragonborn. I believed it from the beginning, but it helps when a wise old man confirms it. Four wise men? It's all but guaranteed.
String.Dest: 你真的是龙裔。我从一开始就确信了这点，当得到一个睿智老人的确认之后我就更确信了。四个老人？那就板上钉钉了啦。

String.Source: I wonder, does Brynjolf want you to sneak through these sewers? Because we could just fight our way in.
String.Dest: 我怀疑……布林乔夫真想让你悄悄爬过这些脏兮兮的下水道吗？咱们可以直接杀进去的啊。

String.Source: Why does Brynjolf want you to collect gold from the shops? I thought if thieves wanted money, they just stole it.
String.Dest: 为什么布林乔夫要让你去向商店讨钱？我还以为贼需要钱的时候直接偷就可以了。

String.Source: Do we really have to burn the bee hives? We could leave a note on Aringoth's pillow. Messages are more clear when they're in writing.
String.Dest: 你说咱有必要非得烧掉蜂窝吗？其实在【Aringoth 的枕头上留个字条就好了嘛。白纸黑字的多清楚。

String.Source: Maven is right, it's suspicious how quickly Sabjorn set up, but no one really cares. Honningbrew Mead is the pride of Whiterun, next to Zora's field.
String.Dest: 玛雯是对的，撒布乔恩如何那么迅速地创立了蜂蜜酒地是挺可疑，但没人真的关心吧。蜂蜜酒地是雪漫城的骄傲，就在佐拉的田园旁边。

String.Source: Poor Sabjorn, what will he do when his meadery is gone? Although he did wince at me once. I guess I don't really like him.
String.Dest: 可怜的撒布乔恩，丢掉了酒庄后他可怎么办呢？尽管他曾经我。但我想我并不喜欢他。

String.Source: So this Hamelyn raised these skeevers like his own children, or his own pets, at least. I prefer dogs.
String.Dest: 看来这位【哈麦林是把这些雪鼠当孩子养的，或者是当宠物。我更喜欢狗.

String.Source: I know you are on Guild business, but do you think we can do a little shopping and sightseeing while we are in Solitude? I love the northern coast.
String.Dest: 我知道你在忙工会的事情，但你觉得咱到了独孤城里是不是稍微购个物、观个光什么的？我爱死北方的海岸啦。

String.Source: The plot has thickened. The killer of the former Guild Master, returning to finish his replacement. And it's a woman! That can't be a coincidence.
String.Dest: 这个阴谋可真是处心积虑啊。杀死公会的前任大师的人，回来打算干掉他的替代者。而且还是女人！这肯定不是个巧合。

String.Source: I never liked Mercer. He didn't have to kill Karliah's horse. He could have just scared it off.
String.Dest: 我一直不喜欢墨瑟。他没必要杀了卡莱亚的马。本来只要把它赶跑就是了。

String.Source: I hope Calcelmo doesn't find out we copied his notes. He's grumpy enough already, but imagine him after Enthir releases his Falmer language guide.
String.Dest: 希望卡赛默不会发现咱们抄了他的笔记。他的脾气已经够坏了，不过想想要是恩希尔把他那雪精灵语指南拿去出版会咋样。

String.Source: Wow, Mercer took everything! Well, not everything. He did leave those smelly furs. Who thought it was a good idea to leave them in a pool of water?
String.Dest: 哇哦，墨瑟给咱来了个卷包会！好吧，卷的不干净，还有这么些馊臭的毛皮留下了。我感觉还是把它们扔进水池子里的好。

String.Source: Mercer went to as much effort to hide this room as I do to hide my face. I hope it's worth the trouble. It always was for me.
String.Dest: 墨瑟为隐藏这个房间费的心机跟我隐藏自己的脸一样。希望值回票价吧。反正我这边是值了。

String.Source: Is it true what they say about Vex and Vald? She looks like she would fancy brutes. Do you think Brynjolf is too smart for her?
String.Dest: 他们说的薇克丝跟【Vald】的事是真的吗？她是有点喜欢暴力分子的样子。你觉得布林乔夫对她而言是不是太聪明了？

String.Source: You look quite dashing in that armor, my lord. And a bit sneaky, but that is to be expected.
String.Dest: 您穿这身可真是英俊潇洒啊主人。还有一丁点儿的猥琐，但这也在预料之中哈。

String.Source: You look quite ravishing in that armor, my lady. And a bit sneaky, but that is to be expected.
String.Dest: 您穿上这件盔甲真是迷人啊，我的女士。虽然稍微带点儿鬼鬼祟祟，但也在意料之中哈。
