String.Source: You are a Nightingale! All that's left is to follow Mercer to Irkgun...Irknug... that Dwarven city and retrieve the Skeleton Key.
String.Dest: 你是夜莺啦！那剩下的就是跟着墨瑟去伊可根……还是伊克纳根……那个矮人城市然后取回骷髅钥匙了。

String.Source: My lord! The three of you made it out alive! And Mercer is dead? I was not worried, but I thought I would explore this cave while I waited.
String.Dest: 主公！你们三个都活着出来了！墨瑟挂了吗？不是我担心，只是在外面干等的时候真想进去瞧瞧呢。

String.Source: I am sure my hero will pass these tests that Karliah speaks of. And if not, you'll just have to keep the skeleton key for yourself.
String.Dest: 我的英雄肯定会通过卡莱雅说的考验哒。或者要是没有，你就把骷髅钥匙自己留着好啦。

String.Source: With each day my hero gains more and more titles. But "Guildmaster" is a little too wordy. I prefer to call you my lord.
String.Dest: 我的英雄获得的荣誉头衔与日俱增啊，但‘公会会长’实在是太口头化了，我更喜欢叫你‘大王’。

String.Source: That wasn't very nice what you did to Brand-Shei, my Thane. It seems real thieves are not as romantic as in the tales.
String.Dest: 您把【布兰德害成那样似乎不太合适啊，男爵。看来现实中的盗贼都不像传说中那么浪漫呐。

String.Source: A challenge from the original Companions! This is truly an honor.
String.Dest: 来自前辈战友团的挑战！真正的不胜荣幸啊。

String.Source: Kodlak...dead. We were too late...We could not save him.
String.Dest: 克拉科……死了。咱们来晚了……没能救得了他。

String.Source: These bodies. They must be Stalleo's family. It doesn't look like the bandits left any survivors, but we must keep looking.
String.Dest: 这些尸体，他们一定是斯塔莱奥的家人。似乎强盗们没留下一个活口，但咱们得继续找。

String.Source: So, Trevas Watch is clear, but Stalleo goes back to his camp. The castle must make him lonely.
String.Dest: 结果，翠瓦哨塔是清理干净了，可斯塔莱奥却回自己的营地去了。一定是这城堡让他觉得孤独了吧。

String.Source: There is a cure for lycanthropy? I am glad to hear it. My lord was beginning to grow hair on his elbows.
String.Dest: 变身有办法治愈吗？我好高兴。因为俺家主人的胳膊肘内侧都开始长毛了啦。

String.Source: There is a cure for lycanthropy? I am glad to hear it. My lady was beginning to grow hair on her elbows.
String.Dest: 狼人还有治愈的办法？这可真是太好了。咱家女主人的胳膊肘里都开始长毛儿了。

String.Source: It's my experience that runaways always come home. Maybe if we wait here, Orthorn will come to us. But what would be the fun in that?
String.Dest: 逃亡的人一般都会回家……我们如果呆在这，奥松恩就会朝我们飞奔过来……但是咱们也该拿他找点乐子了吧？

String.Source: When my face was burned, my suitors begged to see me. Only when I showed up, they ran away too. Just like that Psijic. Eh, you get used to it.
String.Dest: 当初我的脸刚被烧伤，我的追求者都哀求着见我。可是我一露面，他们也是这样逃掉的。跟赛伊克那家伙一样。哎，习惯就好了。

String.Source: The poor Augur! All alone in this dark place. He reminds me of Sven's mother back in Riverwood. All he really needs is company.
String.Dest: 可怜的预言师！独自一人呆在这小黑屋里。让我想起溪木镇斯万的母亲。他真的需要有人来陪呢。

String.Source: That...that was Savos, wasn't it? Standing among those ghosts...I don't know what's going on, my hero, but I don't like it one bit.
String.Dest: 那个……是萨沃斯，没错吧？和一群幽灵站在一起……我不明白到底怎么回事，我的英雄，一种丝毫不能淡定的感觉啊。

String.Source: So the Companions settle disputes with their fists! That is no way for a sister to behave. Even a shield one.
String.Dest: 看来战友团的汉子们全都用拳头说话！这可不是做姐妹的玩法啊。即使是盾牌姐妹也不对嘛。

String.Source: When Hjoromir came to Whiterun, we made him run errands back and forth town so he could meet everyone. I imagine this is the same.
String.Dest: 等肖罗密尔到雪漫城来，咱们安排他些差事去各城区跑来跑去跟每个人都见上一面。我想这样的效果一样吧。

String.Source: It looks like this one was keeping trophies. All these skulls. It's rather disturbing, my liege.
String.Dest: 看来这家伙喜欢收集战利品。这么多的头骨，真令人不安呐，大王。

String.Source: We should tell Grosta her husband died quickly. An arrow to the heart. She will take solace in the fact that he did not suffer.
String.Dest: 咱们应该跟格罗斯塔说她丈夫死得很快。一箭穿心。她会为丈夫没有受苦而感到点安慰吧。

String.Source: Look what the bandits left us. How does a roasted rabbit cooked with minced garlic and a sprinkle of frost mirriam sound? I don't like wasting food.
String.Dest: 瞧瞧这些强盗给咱留下了些啥。用蒜末和冰霜甘草洒在烤兔肉上一起吃怎么样？人家不喜欢浪费食物嘛。

String.Source: It seems we stopped another dark ritual, my Thane. Look at all these candles. Perhaps the shopkeepers should pay more attention to who buys them.
String.Dest: 好像咱们又捣毁了一个黑暗仪式，我的男爵。瞧瞧这些蜡烛吧。也许杂货店主应该多留神是谁一下要买一堆蜡烛。

String.Source: Poor Savos. I did not know he faced such adversity, and carried such burdens. We can only hope he finds peace in the next life.
String.Dest: 可怜的萨沃斯。真没想到他一直面对着这样的困境，背负着那么多重担。现在咱们只能希望他来生安宁啦。

String.Source: No...not Mirabelle too. My hero, I don't care what it takes. If I have to walk through the fires of Oblivion, I will. But Ancano will pay.
String.Dest: 不……不能又失去蜜拉贝儿啊。我的英雄，我不在乎付出什么代价。就算要去湮灭火海我也义不容辞。安卡诺必须拿命来偿！

String.Source: We must hurry to the College! If Ancano knows about the staff, he may take hostages. I fear for our friends.
String.Dest: 咱们赶快回学院去吧！要是安卡诺知道了这法杖的事，很可能下手劫持人质。我担心朋友们的安危。

String.Source: This poor Wood Elf. Vampires are truly pigs.
String.Dest: 这可怜的木精灵。吸血鬼们真是畜生啊。.

String.Source: Wisps, my Thane. Do we take out the little ones first, or go for the mother? Either way, I just hope no surprises come out of the ground.
String.Dest: 是精灵啊男爵大人。你说咱们是先干掉小的呢，还是直取它们老娘？不管怎么说，只要别从地里冒出来什么惊喜就好。

String.Source: We did it! Together with her champion, the princess slayed the dragon! Wait, this is a dragon, isn't it? It looks kind of like a skeleton.
String.Dest: 成功啦！和英勇的战友们一起，公主终于手刃了那条恶龙！等等，这是条龙没错吧？看起来就只有一副骨架而已啊。

String.Source: Four soul gems and a stone star. I don't know about magic, my hero, but I don't think they were here to worship Talos.
String.Dest: 四块灵魂石和一个石头星星。虽然我不了解魔法哈英雄，但这些玩意我不相信是用来献祭塔洛斯的。

String.Source: Trapped in a cage at the mercy of a warlock. Sound familiar? Ah, but there is 1 difference. They're vampires? Well yes, but I was going to say charm.
String.Dest: 在术士的仁慈之下被囚禁在笼子里。感觉熟悉吗？啊，但有一点是不同的。他们是吸血鬼？噢好吧，本来我想说的是魅力来着。

String.Source: Orthorn, you should really be more careful who you trust. I mean, look a this place! You can tell a lot about a cult by how clean they are.
String.Dest: 奥松恩，你真的应该对你信任的人更加谨慎。看看这地方！你可以通过看他们有多爱干净来了解一个教派。

String.Source: My hero, that wasn't very nice what you did to Orthorn. Although it wasn't very nice of him to steal the books, either.
String.Dest: 我的大英雄，你对奥松恩做的事情可不是很……敞亮。好吧我承认他偷书的行为也不是很敞亮。

String.Source: Tolfdir must think highly of you to entrust you with such an important message. But how can anyone not, after what my Thane has done?
String.Dest: 托夫迪尔肯定是对你评价很高才会让你来送这么重要的消息。我的男爵做了这么多大事，别人怎么能不欣赏呢？

String.Source: A garden grown by magelight! It's a bit dark, don't you think? And a bit cold too. Real sunshine is as warm as it is bright.
String.Dest: 靠魔光术照耀种植的花园！不够亮啊，你觉得呢？而且是冷光。真正的阳光是又温暖又明亮的。

String.Source: Paratus, we're leaving for Winterhold. Don't you think it's safer if we leave together? Paratus? Hmph, I don't think he's listening.
String.Dest: 帕拉图斯，我们要去冬堡啦。你不觉得和我们一起走会更安全吗？帕拉图斯？哼，他根本没在听。

String.Source: We have rescued the people, my liege, but I am worried about Mirabelle. And I refuse to allow another death.
String.Dest: 村民咱们是救下了，殿下，但是我有点担心米拉贝尔。我不能接受再有人丧命了。

String.Source: Oh, can I be the one who presses the button? I know it sounds immature, but if I see a button, I have to press it.
String.Dest: 噢，按按钮的活儿可以让我来吗？我知道听起来挺幼稚，可我的强迫症是一看见按钮，就非去按了不可。

String.Source: All this steam is making it difficult to see. It would be quite embarrassing if I mistook a Falmer for my champion.
String.Dest: 这些该死的蒸汽让人看不清东西。要是不小心把雪精灵当成我的勇士就惨啦。

String.Source: A tour of the College. If my parents could see me now, they would be proud and a bit confused. The Zora they knew cared more about makeup than magic.
String.Dest: 去游览学院咯。这要是被我的父母看到，他们觉得骄傲的同时肯定也有点迷糊。他们印象中的佐拉对魔法的兴趣远不如化妆呢。

String.Source: I used to go on treasure hunts with the children back in Riverwood. There, we had to use our imaginations. Here, not so much.
String.Dest: 以前我在溪木镇的时候常常跟孩子们一起玩寻宝。在那儿，寻得了什么宝贝只能靠想象力。而在这儿，就不怎么需要脑补啦。

String.Source: The townsfolk here are fearful of magic. Perhaps I am not the best person to comfort them.
String.Dest: 这些居民们对魔法心有余悸，恐怕我并不是安慰他们的最佳人选。

String.Source: Winterhold may be barren, but this shop has everything! Soul gems, wines and cheeses, swords, and...is that somebody's skull?
String.Dest: 虽然冬堡是挺穷，但这家店的货还真是全啊！恩，有灵魂石，有红酒，奶酪，剑……哇噢这是哪个人的头骨吗？

String.Source: By the White River Anska, you never mentioned Vokun was so powerful! I am sorry if I wasn't much help, but mage fire tends to freeze me.
String.Dest: 我了个白河的去啊安斯卡！你事先怎么没说沃昆有这么厉害！要是没帮上什么忙我很抱歉，那些魔法大火球真把我吓傻啦。

String.Source: I like Stonehills. It's very peaceful. Do you think I would make a good miner? Wielding a pickaxe can't be as hard as wielding a claymore.
String.Dest: 我喜欢石山镇。非常和平的地方。你觉得我能做个好矿工吗？抡矿锄应该不比挥大剑难吧。

String.Source: By the Gods, this is the most wonderful store in all of Skyrim! Such a fine selection of clothes! All we need now is a party to wear them too.
String.Dest: 我的天呐，这是全天际最棒的商店！那么多华丽的服饰！就只差一场盛会来穿它们去啦。

String.Source: The Penitus Oculatus. Bodyguards for the Emperor. If your companions ever form a militia, I hope you put me in charge of designing the uniforms.
String.Dest: 锐眼鹰。皇帝的保镖。如果你的同伴们曾经是做过民兵，我希望你让我负责设计制服。

String.Source: I am jealous, my liege. I had hoped Taarie would offer me a fine robe to wear as well.
String.Dest: 我真羡慕啊，陛下。真希望【Taarie】也能给我件精致长袍穿穿。

String.Source: The Temple of the Divines is so beautiful! I wonder if the Gods' presence is stronger here, and if their magic is more powerful because of it.
String.Dest: 这圣灵神殿好华丽啊！我在想是不是神灵在这里的存在感会比较强，然后他们的法力也就更强大呢。

String.Source: Forts like Hraggstad are full of archers. I think half my scars are from arrows. I showed them to Delphine once, and she nicknamed me "Bulls-Eye."
String.Dest: 像哈格斯塔德这样的堡垒里满是弓箭手。我觉得我身上的伤口有一半都是箭伤。有次我把它们给戴尔芬看了，结果她就管我叫“靶心”。

String.Source: They say Dawnstar is a gloomy place, but the people in this inn have so much energy! I suspect my hero has something to do with it.
String.Dest: 他们说晨星城是个压抑的地方，可瞧这酒馆里的人们都充满活力呀！我猜是我家英雄出手解决过了吧。

String.Source: Anska, so you're a descendant of Ysgramor! You are practically a princess! I am so jealous.
String.Dest: 安斯卡，原来你是伊斯格拉谟的后裔！等于是位公主！羡慕死我啦。

String.Source: I think Horik has a crush on Brina. It's a very fine line between loyalty and love.
String.Dest: 我看【Horik】是爱上【Brina】啦。忠诚和爱情之间的界限可是相当细微啊。

String.Source: Such natural beauty! We really should stay for a bit. I'll pick some flowers and you can start a fire. Then we can lay back and enjoy the scenery.
String.Dest: 多美的自然风景！咱们真该在这多待一会儿。我去采些花儿，你去生个火。然后就可以一起躺下来欣赏风景了。

String.Source: So Vaermina is eating our dreams? Maybe I should spend a few nights here. It might help with my figure.
String.Dest: 就是说瓦尔迷纳会吃了人们的梦？也许我应该在这里呆上几晚。肯定对我的身材有好处。

String.Source: The view of the river is spectacular, but Dragon Bridge is not as large as I imagined. I guess not everything can be as grand as Zora's field.
String.Dest: 这条河看起来真是壮美，但龙桥没我想象中的那么大，看来并不是所有东西都能像佐拉的田园那么壮观啊。

String.Source: What a battle! Hopefully we will not turn into vampires come morning. But in all seriousness, I am glad we avenged Helgi and her mother.
String.Dest: 好一场恶战！希望咱们不会明早醒来变成吸血鬼哈。不过老实说，我真的很高兴能帮【Helgi 和她妈妈报了仇呢。

String.Source: We've killed Movarth! Helgi is avenged and the vampires are dead. I know my lord is a night walker, but this coven was wicked. It had to die.
String.Dest: 我们干掉了莫瓦斯！【Helgi】的仇报了吸血鬼也都死了。我知道主人也是暗夜行者，但这个族群太邪恶了。他们必须死。

String.Source: You are a Thane of Hjaalmarch. My hero, at this rate I will run out of titles to tease you with.
String.Dest: 你是希雅陲的男爵啦。我的英雄，您这升级速度搞得我赞美之词都不够用啦。

String.Source: So the Jarl has given you a title. Well, my lord, what will be your first act as Thane of the Reach? I am here to serve.
String.Dest: 领主给您加封了称号。好吧我的大人。您在成为瑞驰男爵后的第一件事是什么？我来伺候着您。

String.Source: Meeko reminds me of my dog Sir Cuddles. All he needs now is to be knighted.
String.Dest: 【米科让我想起我的狗“抱抱爵士”。他所最需要的便是封为骑士了。

String.Source: Ah, a torchbug! When I was young, I would put them in a jar and use it as a night light. But they all died in the morning.
String.Dest: 啊，是萤火虫！我的小时候，会把它们收集到罐子里当小夜灯用。可是早上一看就全都死翘翘啦。

String.Source: The shelves here are so disorganized. Who puts their books next to wheels of cheese?
String.Dest: 这些架子上怎么都摆得乱七八糟。谁会把书本跟奶酪放在一起啊？

String.Source: Who do you think has killed more Draugr? Probably you, but don't count me out yet, my lord.
String.Dest: 你猜谁杀死的尸鬼多？现在很可能是你，但别小瞧了我哦，大人。

String.Source: My liege, it looks like someone has been here already. Even the puzzle is solved! And I was so looking forward to doing it.
String.Dest: 陛下，依臣妾看来有人来此打搅过了。啊连迷题都给破解过了！本来我很想亲自去玩的啊。

String.Source: Look at all these boots! It seems someone is a collector. I wonder if any are my size.
String.Dest: 瞧啊这么多的靴子！看来这儿有个收藏家啊。我想里面能有我的尺寸吧。

String.Source: I should not have thought ill of Hroggar. Vampires are truly like the moonflower. They bloom at night, white as ivory, beautiful but deadly.
String.Dest: 我其实不该把赫鲁加往坏里想。吸血鬼就像月光花。在夜里绽放，如象牙般洁白，美丽而致命的。

String.Source: My lady, are you not tired? It is well past both our bedtimes.
String.Dest: 我的女士，你还没觉得累吗？现在早就过了我俩应该就寝的时间了。

String.Source: My lord, are you not tired? It is well past both our bedtimes.
String.Dest: 主人啊，你不累么? 咱们的就寝时间已经过去好一会啦。

String.Source: I love what the Jarl has done with Highmoon Hall. The mudcrabs behind the throne are very cute.
String.Dest: 我喜欢这领主把悬月大厅弄成的这样子。王座后面挂那螃蟹真可爱哈。

String.Source: The townsfolk want vengeance, my Countess, and you shall lead them to it. Let us show Movarth the will of the people. For we are nobody's slave.
String.Dest: 村民们渴望复仇，我的伯爵夫人，而您应该领导他们前去。让莫瓦斯看看人民的意志吧。因为我们不是任何人的奴隶。

String.Source: The townsfolk want vengeance, my Count, and you shall lead them to it. Let us show Movarth the will of the people. For we are nobody's slave.
String.Dest: 村民们渴望复仇，我的伯爵大人，而您应该领导他们前去。让莫瓦斯看看人民的意志吧。因为我们不是任何人的奴隶。

String.Source: Poor Helgi. She deserved better. These vampires...these monsters, they will not live to see the morrow.
String.Dest: 可怜的【Helgi。她本该好好活着的。那些吸血鬼……妖怪们，叫它们活不到明天啦。

String.Source: A flute...a drum...and a lute! Call me crazy, but these are not the tools of a lumberjack.
String.Dest: 一支长笛……一面鼓……还有鲁特琴呢！是我疯了吗，这些完全不是什么伐木工人的玩意儿啊。

String.Source: I like your choice of weapon. With your bow and my blade, we complement each other very well, don't you think?
String.Dest: 我喜欢你选的武器。你使强弓，我挥利刃，咱们配合得天衣无缝，是这意思吧？

String.Source: Hroggar lost his wife and child one day and took a new lover the next. How despicable! Not even my hero would ditch me for another so quickly.
String.Dest: 赫鲁加这货前一天刚死了妻儿，第二天就找来个情妇。真不要脸！就算我家英雄甩了我去找新欢也没那么快吧。

String.Source: This tree reminds me of Whiterun. All it needs is a Heimskr. My lord, let me show you the power of the Centurion! He who is both Dwarf and Machine!
String.Dest: 这棵树让我回想起了雪漫城。就差个海姆斯科在那儿演讲了。大人，让我为您展示百夫长的力量吧！矮人与机械的完美结合！

String.Source: These bedrolls may seem useful, but if you are tired, we should return to Markarth to rest. I don't want to end up like these three.
String.Dest: 这些铺盖卷看起来能用，但是如果你真的很累的话，咱还是该回马卡斯城休整一下。我可不想像这三个家伙一样。

String.Source: All these pipes and pistons, and we have no idea what any of it does. Perhaps it isn't wise to pull this lever, but I prefer to be adventurous.
String.Dest: 这么多的管道啊活塞的，咱们是搞不清它们在做什么啦。也许推这根杆不算明智，但我喜欢冒这个险。

String.Source: We do enjoy our big, two-handed weapons, don't we? If there was such a thing as a four-handed weapon, we could wield it together!
String.Dest: 咱俩都喜欢巨大的双手武器，是吧？要是有个什么四手武器之类的东西，咱们就可以一起挥舞啦！

String.Source: Anise once told me a story about a haunted house. Maybe this one is also built on an ancient Forsworn burial ground.
String.Dest: 安妮斯曾经给我讲了一个关于鬼屋的故事。也许这个也修建在了某个远古弃誓者墓地的上面。

String.Source: You escaped Cidhna mine! It was rather foolish of me to doubt you. My lord could escape from a Sload's belly if the situation called for it.
String.Dest: 你从希讷矿坑出来啦！我真是傻到会怀疑你的本事啊。要是逼急了我家大王可是从蛤蟆肚皮里都出得来的哈。

String.Source: A sword dipped in the blood of a Daedra? Jarl's make such silly demands of their blacksmiths. Why not forge it with dragon fire while he's at it?
String.Dest: 将剑浸泡在魔族的鲜血里？脑残的领主给铁匠下这种蠢命令。他们怎么不在有龙来吐火的时候跑上去锻造啊？

String.Source: Nimhe the Spider crawled inside the Dwarven house. But then came the adventurers to wash the spider out!
String.Dest: 蜘蛛尼姆赫爬进了锻莫的房子。但又有个冒险者来把这蜘蛛给清理了！

String.Source: If Ogmund worships Talos, that's his own business. We should not help this Thalmor, or he will be raiding our closets next.
String.Dest: 就算奥蒙德崇拜塔洛斯, 那是他自己的事儿。咱可不该帮这个梭默, 没准下次他会来搜咱们家的衣柜呢。

String.Source: Careful. It's a steep fall and we don't know how deep that water is.
String.Dest: 小心点儿，这个瀑布很急，而且谁不知道下面水有多深。

String.Source: This looks like some sort of museum. I thought Markarth already had one of those. But I'm sure Calcemo's is much safer.
String.Dest: 这里看起来是个博物馆什么的。我记得马卡斯已经有一间了。不过卡塞莫的那个肯定比这儿安全得多。

String.Source: Well, that was frightening. I hope you do not want to stay the night. This Daedric Prince would make for a very noisy roommate.
String.Dest: 呃，真够吓人的。我希望你没打算在这儿过夜。跟这只魔神一起睡觉肯定吵死人。

String.Source: This sword you've given me is quite the gift. Well balanced and made of fine ebony. My lord is far too generous.
String.Dest: 您送我的这把剑真是上品。平衡性好而且是乌木的. 大人您真是太有风度了啦。

String.Source: Lurbuk should really be careful. I'm sure there is a law against Orcs becoming bards.
String.Dest: 卢布克真得小心点啦。我记得有什么规矩说兽人不可以做吟游诗人来着。

String.Source: By Arkay, I did not expect such a fight from 3 housekeepers and a nosey old man! In any case, we should hurry to Eltrys and tell him about Madanach.
String.Dest: 阿尔凯在上，我可从来没想过要同时跟三个管家和一个大鼻子的老头干仗！不管怎么说，咱们快去艾崔斯那里和他说说迈德纳奇的事情吧。

String.Source: So this Eola was eating dead people? We should offer her a sweet roll. She has no idea what she's missing.
String.Dest: 这个爱欧拉要吃死人尸体？咱们应该塞个甜甜圈给她。让她知道自己错过了什么。

String.Source: This Nepos is quite nosy. That must be where he got the name.
String.Dest: 这个尼普斯太多事了，这一定就是他名字的来历。

String.Source: The kitchen and dining area are so empty. Especially the pantry. That potato and cheese wedge look so lonely. We should invite them to dinner.
String.Dest: 厨房和餐厅好空旷啊。尤其是储藏室。土豆和奶酪们看起来都很孤独。咱们应该邀请他们共进晚餐。

String.Source: Are you sure helping Mother Hamal is the right thing? To be a Sybil comes with much prestige, but to be a young daughter comes with a parent's love.
String.Dest: 你确定帮哈马尔做这件事是对的吗? 做了大任在身的神使, 就不再是父母膝下的可爱女儿啦。

String.Source: That Nord woman, attacked in the market! I do not like this one bit, my lord. We can only hope this Eltrys knows more.
String.Dest: 那个诺德女人，在集市被袭击了！我真看不过这个啊，大人。只能指望这位艾崔斯知道些内情了。

String.Source: We should hurry to Kolskeggr Mine. Living in Riverwood, I know the Jarls can often neglect the problems of those outside the city.
String.Dest: 咱们赶快去科斯凯格矿场吧。我是在溪木镇长大的，老早就知道领主对这些城外的问题常常是视而不见的了。

String.Source: So it wasn't just any Forsworn, but a Briarheart! Pavo and Gat were very lucky to survive.
String.Dest: 原来不是随便一个弃誓者，而是个荆棘之心！看来帕沃和盖特能活下来真是太走运啦！

String.Source: We should ask Tacitus to craft us some nails. Tell him we are building a house. It will make him feel better, and we can just throw them away after.
String.Dest: 是不是该让塔西图斯帮咱们打点儿钉子，就说咱要盖房子用。就会让他感觉好些，然后咱拿了钉子丢掉就是。

String.Source: The Potion of the Stallion? No wonder Bothela told you to be discreet. My lord should stick to the shadows, lest we all end up embarrassed.
String.Dest: 种马药水？难怪波塞拉告诉你要谨慎。主人你干这事儿就得偷偷摸摸的，免得最后大家都尴尬。

String.Source: Mysterious eyes, silvery hair, and lips the color of nightshade. I am sure Bothela was quite the vixen in her day.
String.Dest: 神秘的眼神，银色的头发，还有夜茄般的紫色嘴唇。我敢肯定波塞拉当年肯定是个热辣的女人呢。

String.Source: These miners look overworked. Maybe the Orc should help them instead of making faces.
String.Dest: 这些矿工看起来有些劳累过度了。也许那个兽人应该帮帮他们而不是光给他们脸色看。

String.Source: The barrels and sacks in this tower are stocked with carrots, tomatoes, and fresh apples. These bandits ate very healthy.
String.Dest: 这座塔里的木桶和麻袋都储满了胡萝卜啊，西红柿啊，新鲜苹果啥的。这些强盗还真注意养生啊。

String.Source: I always stop by and say hello to Anise when I travel from Brittleshin to Riverwood. She's a kind old woman.
String.Dest: 我从布莱特辛去溪木镇时总会顺路去跟安妮斯打个招呼。她是个和善的老太太。

String.Source: Anise? A witch? I never would have guessed. Although it explains why she took such an interest in my sister.
String.Dest: 安妮斯？是个女巫？太难以想象了。不过那就难怪她会对我的姐姐那么着迷了。

String.Source: Oh, what a cute dog! You'll fend off the Forsworn, won't you Torom!
String.Dest: 喔！多漂亮的狗狗！你能赶走那些弃誓者，对吧托洛姆！

String.Source: This poor Khajiit stuck to the road, and yet did not survive. Skyrim is a dangerous place to travel. We must do our best to make it safer.
String.Dest: 这可怜的虎人半路被劫，也没活下来。天际太危险了。咱们一定要努力把它变得安全。

String.Source: First her husband dies, now the Forsworn are raiding her shipments, but she refuses to pity herself. Lisbet is quite a strong Nord woman.
String.Dest: 先是丈夫去世了，现在又被弃誓者夺了她的货，可她丝毫不会顾影自怜，莉丝贝特真是个坚强的诺德女人。

String.Source: In cramped quarters, shrines really help with stopping disease. It's too bad we can't carry one around with us. We could pray whenever we got sick.
String.Dest: 在狭窄的场合下，用神龛治病真的很方便呐。真可惜不能随身携带。要是每次出毛病都可以拿出来祈祷一下就好啦。

String.Source: That corpse lying in the pond can't be good for the water. But it seems the animals here are very resilient.
String.Dest: 死尸就那么扔在池塘里对水质可不好。但看样子这的动物都还挺适应的。

String.Source: It was kind of you to leave Valdr behind. I don't think he's recovered from his wounds.
String.Dest: 谢谢你把瓦尔卓甩了……我觉得他还没恢复呢。

String.Source: This old lady is very charming. Can we keep her?
String.Dest: 这位老妇人真是太迷人了。咱们能留着她吗？

String.Source: Did you catch what those bandits said? Something about a bark shelf? Frankly, my hearing is not what it used to be. Too many blows to the head.
String.Dest: 你听得清那些强盗说的什么吗？说什么树皮架子什么的？实话说呢，我的听力不如以前了。头上挨过太多的重击了。

String.Source: Looks like one of the puzzle heads smashed on the floor. The poor thing! It's too bad we can't put it back next to its brothers.
String.Dest: 看来其中一个蠢货在地板上摔了个粉碎，可怜的家伙！这样就没法把它放到它兄弟们身边去啦。

String.Source: We should hurry and tell the Jarl of the dragon attack. I fear for the safety of Riverwood.
String.Dest: 咱们快去把有龙来袭的事儿告诉领主吧。我担心溪木镇的安危。

String.Source: We did it! We actually slew a dragon! Our names will be part of legend! This is unbelievable, my hero!
String.Dest: 成功啦！咱们实打实地干掉了一头龙！我们的名字都会成为传奇的！真是难以置信啊，我的英雄！

String.Source: So Balgruuf has made you Thane, and the Gods have named you Dragonborn. Don't forget your friends now that you are famous.
String.Dest: 巴尔古夫封你为男爵，而圣灵将你命名为龙裔。成了名人之后可别忘了你的朋友们哦。

String.Source: Oh, this dummy is cute with his bucket helmet and wooden sword. All he needs now is a name.
String.Dest: 噢，这人偶配上这水桶盔还有这把剑看着还挺萌的。就差给它起个名字了。.

String.Source: You killed the sweet old blind man? Well, on the other hand, he was a bandit. How sweet could he be?
String.Dest: 你把那个可爱的盲人老头杀了？哦好吧，既然他是个强盗。也就可爱不到哪里去对吧？

String.Source: I'm happy you let the sweet blind man live. I have a soft spot for damaged people, even if they're bandits.
String.Dest: 我很高兴你留那个可爱的瞎子活了下来。我对有点生理缺陷的人总是有点不忍，即使他们是强盗。

String.Source: So you are a Companion now. Do you think I should join as well? I am not as strong as you, my lord, but perhaps you will put in a good word.
String.Dest: 现在您是一名战友团成员了。您认为我也该加入吗？我没您那么强壮，大人，但也许您能帮我说说好话。

String.Source: Kodlak was a kind leader, and he loved you and the Companions as if they were his children. My hero should not be afraid to shed a tear in his honor.
String.Dest: 克拉科是个出色的领袖，他把你和整个战友团都视作自己的孩子一般地去关爱。我家英雄该不会介意为他洒几滴泪吧。

String.Source: It doesn't look like Skjor will let me come with you, so I'll just wait out here. Don't be too long, okay?
String.Dest: 看起来斯科月不打算让我跟你一起去。所以我就这儿等着吧。但请别去太久，好吗？

String.Source: An alchemy table! These bandits are a very diverse group. What will we find next, a lute?
String.Dest: 炼金实验台！这帮强盗还真是什么都会啊。我看还能找到什么？有琴吗？

String.Source: My champion, I...I don't like this place. My skin feels hot.
String.Dest: 我的勇士，我……不太喜欢这地方。皮肤会觉得发烫呢。

String.Source: It's so admirable to see Severio Pelagia work his own farm. You would never see Nazeem out here tilling the soil.
String.Dest: 看见【Severio Pelagia】亲自耕作自己的农场真是令人钦佩啊。你永远不会看见纳齐姆在田里耕作的。

String.Source: You know what would go great with this meat? Some wine. We should ask them if they want to trade.
String.Dest: 你知道这肉怎么吃更好吗？来点酒！咱应该问问他们有没有卖的。

String.Source: These poor people...fire consumes so quickly, and there is often no recourse.
String.Dest: 这些可怜的家伙……火势来得太猛，几乎是毫无办法。

String.Source: What a view! From the peak, I think you can see High Hrothgar to the east. I bet if they shout, we can hear them too.
String.Dest: 景色真棒！在山顶上向东眺望，我想你可以看到霍斯加高峰。我敢打赌要是他们玩龙吼，咱们这儿也能听到。

String.Source: Do you think we should dress up like bandits before we meet the boss? Maybe I can play your prisoner! Or we can just push him off the mountain.
String.Dest: 你觉得咱是不是应该打扮成强盗再去见头头？我可以扮演你的囚犯吗？要不然直接把那家伙推下山去就是啦。

String.Source: These people were tortured, flayed and burned. Not out of malice, but without any emotion at all. It saddens me to see mortals are capable of such.
String.Dest: 这些人被拷打折磨后剥了皮烧死。而且是无冤无仇的，毫无人性可言。有这么狠毒的同类存在真是让我难过啊。

String.Source: So...are you going to return the Dragon Breath Mead to Olda, or are you going to sneak a taste first? Even heroes have a naughty side.
String.Dest: 那么……你是把这龙息蜜酒拿给奥尔达呢，还是自己先来一口尝尝？就算是英雄也有淘气的一面嘛。

String.Source: My father once took us on a family trip to Rorikstead. We weren't a very wealthy family.
String.Dest: 我爸爸带我们全家到洛利克镇旅行过。我们不是个十分富裕的家庭。

String.Source: Danica Pure-Spring. I asked her to heal my scars once, but she said it was impossible. Maybe if I were a tree she wouldn't think so.
String.Dest: 丹妮卡·洁春。我曾经请她治我的伤疤，可她说那不可能。或许要是我是一颗树的话她就不会这么想了。

String.Source: They say there's a bard here who looks like a bandit. I wonder if he knows "Springtime in old Stros M'Kai?"
String.Dest: 据说有个长得像强盗的吟游诗人。我想知道他会不会唱【“斯图尔斯麦凯之春”？

String.Source: This Imperial died in his cage. This would have been me, if it weren't for you.
String.Dest: 这个帝国人死在了笼子里。本来我也可能是这样下场，如果没有你。

String.Source: This is dark magic. Blood and corpses. My hero should be ready for the worst.
String.Dest: 这是黑魔法呢。鲜血和尸体什么的。我的英雄可要做好最坏的心理准备咯。

String.Source: All these bones...something must have been very hungry and too lazy to clean up.
String.Dest: 看看这些骨头……这里一定有个又贪吃又懒得收拾的家伙。

String.Source: The sleeping tree! I heard a story that it flew to Skyrim from Morrowind. It's very pretty, but I'm disappointed it doesn't have wings.
String.Dest: 沉睡圣树! 我曾经听说它是从晨风省飞到天际来的。它看着是真漂亮，可是没有翅膀让人家好失望

String.Source: This Redguard always asks me if I know a good tailor, read some fancy book, or if I've visited the Cloud District. He must be very insecure.
String.Dest: 这个红卫人没事总问人认不认识好裁缝，读没读过什么好书，还有去没去过云霄区。他肯定是缺乏安全感吧。

String.Source: I heard this was a thriving colony until the mine collapsed. So the people moved out, and the bandits moved in.
String.Dest: 我听说这里原来是个挺繁华的聚居地，但是有一天矿坑塌了。那些居民就陆续搬走了，后来就被强盗占据了。

String.Source: We're not going to eat the nice priest, are we? My savior has a strange appetite.
String.Dest: 咱们没有打算吃掉那个漂亮的祭司对吧？我家救世主的口味真怪。

String.Source: This Orc was very well read. The Real Barenziah? The Life of Uriel Septim? A student of history! Oh and a ruined book too! I'm sure that's a mistake.
String.Dest: 这只兽人很博学。真实的巴兰兹亚？尤瑞尔赛普汀七世生平？一位历史学者！哦还有一本书烧毁了！那肯定是个错误！

String.Source: Riverwood is a logging town, but the iron from this mine is important. We shouldn't leave it in the hands of bandits.
String.Dest: 溪木镇是一个伐木业小镇，但这个矿出产的铁还是相当重要的。咱可不能任由那些强盗占着不放。

String.Source: Orgnar likes to tell strangers he's a bad cook, but the food here has its charm.
String.Dest: 奥格那喜欢跟陌生人说自己厨艺很差，但是这里的食物有其独特的魅力。

String.Source: I've never been that fond of alchemy. It doesn't seem right grinding up such beautiful flowers. Why not put them in a vase?
String.Dest: 我一向都对炼金术无爱啊。把如此美丽的花朵磨成碎屑怎么看都不对啊。为什么不把它们插进花瓶里呢？

String.Source: Have you tried Orgnar's skeever liver? It's a local delicacy.
String.Dest: 你有吃过奥格那做的雪鼠肝吗？那可是本地风味哦。

String.Source: Ah, a puzzle! I wonder how it works. I hope it isn't as simple as matching the pictures to the ones on the ceiling.
String.Dest: 啊哈！一个谜题！我想知道它是怎么运作的，希望它不只是简单地看图案对应天花板上提示什么的玩意儿。

String.Source: A museum for the Mythic Dawn? Did this man fall and hit his head?
String.Dest: 【神秘黎明博物馆? 这个人是跌了一跤撞坏了脑袋吗?

String.Source: Look at all the food! It would be such a waste not to eat it. Of course, my hero will have to eat most of it. I'm watching my weight.
String.Dest: 瞧啊这么些食物！要是不吃掉它们可真是浪费。当然，咱家大英雄肯定能吃掉绝大多数的，我呢就注意下体重吧。

String.Source: Is this some sort of Orc Stronghold? These ones are a lot meaner. Which is saying something.
String.Dest: 这是某种兽人要塞？这些看起来【威武得多。还是能说明点什么的。

String.Source: I'll always considered Riverwood my home. There's no better feeling than taking off your boots and dipping your toes in the rushing current.
String.Dest: I'll always considered Riverwood my home. There's no better feeling than taking off your boots and dipping your toes in the rushing current.

String.Source: I was born in Riverwood, and I died there too, apparently. You spend one month in a cage and they go ahead and have your funeral.
String.Dest: I was born in Riverwood, and I died there too, apparently. You spend one month in a cage and they go ahead and have your funeral.

String.Source: Did you know, there once was a hero named Ragnar the Red who came riding to Whiterun from Ole Rorikstead? Guess where we are.
String.Dest: Did you know, there once was a hero named Ragnar the Red who came riding to Whiterun from Ole Rorikstead? Guess where we are.

String.Source: Oh my, Dragonsreach is spectacular. Did they really trap a dragon inside? Seems a bit large for a cage.
String.Dest: Oh my, Dragonsreach is spectacular. Did they really trap a dragon inside? Seems a bit large for a cage.

String.Source: A Draugr crypt is a scary place, especially for one as sensitive as I. It's the eyes that haunt me the most.
String.Dest: A Draugr crypt is a scary place, especially for one as sensitive as I. It's the eyes that haunt me the most.

String.Source: They say the Draugr are slaves of dragons. Well, we are all slaves to something, so why not giant world eaters?
String.Dest: They say the Draugr are slaves of dragons. Well, we are all slaves to something, so why not giant world eaters?

String.Source: There's a lot of snow in Skyrim, isn't there. Maybe Whiterun is better off staying green.
String.Dest: There's a lot of snow in Skyrim, isn't there. Maybe Whiterun is better off staying green.

String.Source: Oh, I love the rain! Jumping in puddles has always been a favorite pastime of mine.
String.Dest: Oh, I love the rain! Jumping in puddles has always been a favorite pastime of mine.

String.Source: The Temple of Mara. What are you implying? Do you mean to tell me my dashing hero was beside me all along?
String.Dest: The Temple of Mara. What are you implying? Do you mean to tell me my dashing hero was beside me all along?

String.Source: The Temple of Mara. So my lady, which one of us do you think will walk down the aisle first?
String.Dest: The Temple of Mara. So my lady, which one of us do you think will walk down the aisle first?

String.Source: Now why have you brought me here, hm? I prefer my heroes to be naughty, but not perverse.
String.Dest: Now why have you brought me here, hm? I prefer my heroes to be naughty, but not perverse.

String.Source: Markarth. I heard there was chef here who cooks with alchemy! I've always wanted to try a pheasant roast that also cured my sniffles.
String.Dest: Markarth. I heard there was chef here who cooks with alchemy! I've always wanted to try a pheasant roast that also cured my sniffles.

String.Source: The Reach is home to the Forsworn. They say it belongs to the Bretons. I'm a Breton, so I guess I own a piece.
String.Dest: The Reach is home to the Forsworn. They say it belongs to the Bretons. I'm a Breton, so I guess I own a piece.

String.Source: I was disappointed the museum here only accepts Dwemer artifacts. I was hoping to sell them Delphine's wardrobe. It's ancient.
String.Dest: I was disappointed the museum here only accepts Dwemer artifacts. I was hoping to sell them Delphine's wardrobe. It's ancient.

String.Source: I bet this inn is a lively one. I used to hate big crowds, but then I realized the more people, the more likely they'd find someone else to stare it.
String.Dest: 我打赌这个酒馆人气很旺。以前我不喜欢人多的地方，但是后来我意识到人越多，他们越不会非得盯着我看。

String.Source: You'd think caves would be a great place to meet adventurers like us. But slaying bandits is fun too.
String.Dest: You'd think caves would be a great place to meet adventurers like us. But slaying bandits is fun too.

String.Source: I sometimes like to imagine these caves are an underground travel system, like the rootworms the Argonian smugglers use in Black Marsh.
String.Dest: 有时候我会幻想这些洞穴是个完整的地下通道系统，就像亚龙人在黑沼泽用的那些根系虫洞一样。

String.Source: The swamps to the north of Morthal are notoriously humid in the summer. And a hot night in Skyrim brings out strange beasts.
String.Dest: The swamps to the north of Morthal are notoriously humid in the summer. And a hot night in Skyrim brings out strange beasts.

String.Source: Morthal isn't much bigger than Riverwood. I wonder why this city has a Jarl.
String.Dest: Morthal isn't much bigger than Riverwood. I wonder why this city has a Jarl.

String.Source: I've heard Windhelm is cold and lonely, but my sister seemed to like it. It was almost too easy to poke fun. Dealing with the guilt, that was hard.
String.Dest: 我听说风盔城是又冷又荒的，但过去我姐姐好像挺喜欢。真是槽点多到无法吐完啊。不过心里有愧的话，就笑不出来啦。

String.Source: If the accident never happened, I would be wed to some dashing noble. But how would you ever manage without me?
String.Dest: If the accident never happened, I would be wed to some dashing noble. But how would you ever manage without me?

String.Source: I think I need a new pair of boots. Where should we go shopping, the market or the caves?
String.Dest: I think I need a new pair of boots. Where should we go shopping, the market or the caves?

String.Source: I wonder if Ulfric would want a little Breton girl in his army? It'd be a poor match, as I hate taking orders, but I like the commander's uniform.
String.Dest: 我很怀疑乌佛瑞克是否要布莱顿女孩加入他的军队？跟他们恐怕不太般配，因为我讨厌服从命令，但我喜欢指挥官的制服。

String.Source: Whiterun, home of the fabled Companions. They're the fiercest warriors in Skyrim, but I like the fact that they live in an upside-down boat.
String.Dest: Whiterun, home of the fabled Companions. They're the fiercest warriors in Skyrim, but I like the fact that they live in an upside-down boat.

String.Source: I wonder what sort of cuisine is popular here. I hope it isn't horkers.
String.Dest: 我想知道这儿的招牌菜有什么。但愿不是海象肉。

String.Source: We should stop by the market. I picked some vegetables from the farm outside that would go great with a venison chop.
String.Dest: We should stop by the market. I picked some vegetables from the farm outside that would go great with a venison chop.

String.Source: Fruit from the Summerset Isle, cheese from High Rock...Solitude is home to so many exotic delicacies. An adventurer can get spoiled here.
String.Dest: Fruit from the Summerset Isle, cheese from High Rock...Solitude is home to so many exotic delicacies. An adventurer can get spoiled here.

String.Source: I wonder if Hjoromir is still around. Our armor could use a bit of polish. Don't let him near your weapon though. He only has so many fingers.
String.Dest: I wonder if Hjoromir is still around. Our armor could use a bit of polish. Don't let him near your weapon though. He only has so many fingers.

String.Source: Dark mages make this place their home. In that sense, it's appropriately decorated.
String.Dest: Dark mages make this place their home. In that sense, it's appropriately decorated.

String.Source: I must admit I have a soft spot in my heart for warlocks. The ones in Brittleshin Pass always treated me kindly.
String.Dest: I must admit I have a soft spot in my heart for warlocks. The ones in Brittleshin Pass always treated me kindly.

String.Source: Riften is a place of fast hands and bad men. A girl could fall in love in a place like this, and get her heart broken just as quickly.
String.Dest: Riften is a place of fast hands and bad men. A girl could fall in love in a place like this, and get her heart broken just as quickly.

String.Source: Talos. Such a big, strong man. Now that's a gallant hero. But you're not so bad yourself.
String.Dest: Talos. Such a big, strong man. Now that's a gallant hero. But you're not so bad yourself.

String.Source: The College of Winterhold. My sister would have thrived here. Now, she thrives in a cave somewhere.
String.Dest: The College of Winterhold. My sister would have thrived here. Now, she thrives in a cave somewhere.

String.Source: I wonder what's more dangerous. A draugr's shout, or a vampire's kiss?
String.Dest: I wonder what's more dangerous. A draugr's shout, or a vampire's kiss?

String.Source: Bandit lairs are so conspicuous aren't they. It's no wonder Skyrim has so many well fed trolls.
String.Dest: Bandit lairs are so conspicuous aren't they. It's no wonder Skyrim has so many well fed trolls.

String.Source: You know, when exploring these animal dens, sometimes I just want to run up and hug the furry ones. Now you know where I got most of my scars.
String.Dest: You know, when exploring these animal dens, sometimes I just want to run up and hug the furry ones. Now you know where I got most of my scars.

String.Source: Shipwrecks are a good source of loot, but I'm very bad at holding my breath.
String.Dest: 沉船是打捞战利品的好地方，但我憋气的水平不行啊。

String.Source: You know, now would be an excellent time to be an Argonian. Or on a boat.
String.Dest: You know, now would be an excellent time to be an Argonian. Or on a boat.

String.Source: Spriggans are such beautiful creatures. Too beautiful. It's almost unfair.
String.Dest: Spriggans are such beautiful creatures. Too beautiful. It's almost unfair.

String.Source: Such history in these old Nord ruins. A living history, if you count the Draugr. That reminds me of an old boyfriend. Not dead, but not living.
String.Dest: Such history in these old Nord ruins. A living history, if you count the Draugr. That reminds me of an old boyfriend. Not dead, but not living.

String.Source: My fourth rescuer was quite handsome. Thin ropes of muscle and hazel, deep-set eyes. But he had scales, which would be fine if he wasn't a Nord.
String.Dest: My fourth rescuer was quite handsome. Thin ropes of muscle and hazel, deep-set eyes. But he had scales, which would be fine if he wasn't a Nord.

String.Source: The Dwarves were so ingenious with all their tiny gadgets. I think Dwarven spiders are adorable, but they're too wild to make for good pets.
String.Dest: The Dwarves were so ingenious with all their tiny gadgets. I think Dwarven spiders are adorable, but they're too wild to make for good pets.

String.Source: The first hero I met turned out not to be a hero at all, but a mercenary. I thought he came to save me, but all he really wanted was a job.
String.Dest: The first hero I met turned out not to be a hero at all, but a mercenary. I thought he came to save me, but all he really wanted was a job.

String.Source: I've heard there are healers so talented they can heal almost any scar. I'm sure my Thane will find them for me. No pressure.
String.Dest: I've heard there are healers so talented they can heal almost any scar. I'm sure my Thane will find them for me. No pressure.

String.Source: Sometimes I wonder if using a one-handed weapon would be more suitable for my frame, but it really doesn't suit my personality.
String.Dest: 有时我会想也许使单手武器会更适合我的身材。但那真的不是我的性格啊。

String.Source: So will my lord be hunting game for dinner tonight, or will he take his companion to the inn for a more sensible feast? Just a question.
String.Dest: 现在我的大王是打算打点野味当晚餐呢，还是带着他的好跟班去酒馆吃顿带感的大餐？随便问问哈。

String.Source: A cat boasts to his friends that he's killed 3 bandits. A dog replies "So? I killed 4." The cat pauses, looks at him and says, "Wow, a talking dog!"
String.Dest: 一只猫得瑟地对朋友说自己干掉了三个强盗。一条狗回答：“就这些？我干掉了4个”那猫愣了一下，盯着他说：“哇噢，会说话的狗狗！”

String.Source: You know, after spending so much time in a cage, you forget how big the rest of the world is. The sky just goes on forever.
String.Dest: You know, after spending so much time in a cage, you forget how big the rest of the world is. The sky just goes on forever.

String.Source: Funny. I'm so used to bandits hunting me, I never thought I'd be hunting them.
String.Dest: Funny. I'm so used to bandits hunting me, I never thought I'd be hunting them.

String.Source: When you rescued me from that cage, I never imagined I would travel with you for this long. Few are willing to put up with me for more than a day.
String.Dest: When you rescued me from that cage, I never imagined I would travel with you for this long. Few are willing to put up with me for more than a day.

String.Source: I know I am wont to tease you, but believe me when I say this. You are truly a hero, and not just mine. But don't let it get to your head, okay?
String.Dest: I know I am wont to tease you, but believe me when I say this. You are truly a hero, and not just mine. But don't let it get to your head, okay?

String.Source: You kittens are so adorable. One of these days I'm going to sneak up behind you and scratch you behind the ears.
String.Dest: 你这小猫咪真是太可爱了，总有一天我会忍不住藏在你背后偷挠你的耳朵根。

String.Source: I know it's inappropriate, but don't you just want to scratch a Khajiit behind the ears?
String.Dest: 我知道这很无礼哈，不过你就丝毫没有想过在虎人耳朵后面挠一下吗？

String.Source: A High Elf once told me I should consider wearing a veil. So I replied, "But then how else will I annoy you?"
String.Dest: A High Elf once told me I should consider wearing a veil. So I replied, "But then how else will I annoy you?"

String.Source: I wonder if the College is taking on new applicants? Although I suppose it's a little too late to learn a ward spell.
String.Dest: 不知道那学院还招不招新生。不过我这时候去学结界术恐怕是太迟了。

String.Source: Perhaps I should get my face sculpted. But I'd probably just end up with more scars. Besides, my hero has no need for a damsel fair.
String.Dest: 也许我的脸是该做个整容的。但也搞不好会落下更多的疤。而且，我的英雄也不需要一个妙龄美少女吧。

String.Source: I know I've teased you many times about healing my scars, and knowing me, I may do so again.
String.Dest: I know I've teased you many times about healing my scars, and knowing me, I may do so again.

String.Source: But now after everything we've been through, I don't think I'll ever want to give them up. They're a part of me.
String.Dest: But now after everything we've been through, I don't think I'll ever want to give them up. They're a part of me.

String.Source: Fjotra is safe, and we must take her to the temple. But perhaps we ought to stop by Karthwasten first, so she can say goodbye.
String.Dest: 弗洛特拉安全了，咱们尽快带她回到神庙。不过也许应该先去西卡斯镇跟她的父母道个别。

String.Source: A pirate ship. Maybe we could stowaway for a bit and have an adventure on the high sea. But I don't think these pirates are adventuring type.
String.Dest: 是海盗船！要不咱们逃票上去来一次海上冒险。不过这些海盗好像不是玩冒险的风格呢。

String.Source: It looks like these Falmer caught the bandits by surprise. I want to help them, but not if they're going to attack us.
String.Dest: 貌似这些强盗被雪精灵搞了个偷袭。我其实很想帮他们……当然除非他们不跟咱作对。

String.Source: I really like these old Nord ruins. It's just like a grand theater, only all the actors are skeletons.
String.Dest: 我真的很喜欢这些古代诺德遗址。这就像一个大剧院，只不过演员都是骷髅哈。

String.Source: Potema, the Wolf Queen! She had a very scary voice. But I always imagined her growling.
String.Dest: 波特玛，狼心女王！她有着非常可怕的嗓音。但我总觉着她是在咆哮。

String.Source: Wolfskull cave is to the west. We should check it out. Rumors are exciting, but these people have had a little too much excitement for one season.
String.Dest: 狼头骨洞穴在西边。咱是应该去看一看。传闻听起来是很刺激，但最近这些人已经有点刺激过度了。

String.Source: So this is place is known as Orphan's Tear. I would gladly shed a tear for an orphan, but not so much for the bandits who used to live here.
String.Dest: 那么这就是被叫做孤儿之泪的地方了。我会很乐意为一个孤儿流点眼泪，但不打算对住在这里的盗贼有什么怜悯。

String.Source: A pirate ship. Maybe we could stowaway for a bit and have an adventure on the high sea. But I don't think these pirates are the adventuring type.
String.Dest: A pirate ship. Maybe we could stowaway for a bit and have an adventure on the high sea. But I don't think these pirates are the adventuring type.

String.Source: Beautiful maidens being kidnapped by bandits. It's not often I get to play the hero instead of damsel.
String.Dest: 美丽的少女被强盗绑架。罕见呐这次轮到我扮演救美的英雄，而不是被救的美妹。

String.Source: That looks to be the last of them. None of the adventurers survived, but they will rest easy knowing the caravans will be safe.
String.Dest: 貌似就这些了。冒险者们一个也没活下来，不过他们若知道保全了商队，应该也能安息了吧。

String.Source: By Talos, mountain giants! I don't suspect they herd mammoth if they live in place like this. Perhaps they buy their cheese like the rest of us.
String.Dest: 我的塔洛斯啊，山岭巨人！我略怀疑他们住在这样的地方也能放牧猛犸。也许他们的奶酪也跟咱一样是买的。

String.Source: So many of us rely on traders like this, who brave the roads so we can have our rugs and fineries. This poor couple. I hope they didn't suffer.
String.Dest: 大多数人的生活都依赖着这样的商人。就为了给咱带点衣物杂货，他们冒险上路……这对可怜的夫妻，希望他们死得没有太痛苦。

String.Source: Two beds and a warm fire. How nice of the bandits to provide this for us. Although, it's a little too early to be thinking about sleep.
String.Dest: 两张床和一堆篝火。强盗给咱们准备得真周到啊。虽然现在睡觉好像还早了点儿。

String.Source: Two beds and a warm fire. How nice of the bandits to provide this for us.
String.Dest: 一炉热火和两张暖床。强盗们对咱们还真是照顾周到啊。

String.Source: Hm...let's see. We can start with Dorthe the Dragonborn, who is also Dorthe the Blacksmith, and sometimes Dorthe the Alchemist...
String.Dest: 唔……我看看。咱们可以从龙裔朵西开始，也同样是铁匠朵西，有时还是炼金术士朵西……

String.Source: The Gildergreen is restored. Hopefully Kynareth won't be too angry about how you went about it.
String.Dest: 【Gildergreen又活起来了。希望Kynareth对咱们救它的过程别太生气就好。

String.Source: I've heard Widow's Watch is haunted by the ghosts of all the husbands and wives sent off to war. And hags too, but that's not as romantic.
String.Dest: 听说那座望夫塔由那些被迫参军的夫妻们的幽灵占据了。还有巫婆什么的。不过这也没啥浪漫的

String.Source: (Sigh) You rescue the bandit and he tries to kill you. Well, they can't all become your faithful companions now, can they?
String.Dest: （叹）被你救了的强盗反而要杀你。看来不是谁给你当随从都能靠得住的，是吧？

String.Source: This is a tough decision. I don't like these sellswords, but if the Forsworn were to attack, I don't like the villagers' chances either.
String.Dest: 我们作出了一个艰难的决定！尽管不喜欢这些杀手，不过如果弃誓者来袭击，我也不想村民受害。

String.Source: I am very proud of you for not killing the hagraven on sight. It's not often someone shows restraint when confronted with a less than pretty face.
String.Dest: 我好佩服你没贸然杀死这个鬼婆。很少有人在这么‘不漂亮’的一张脸面前还能保持克制的。

String.Source: These poor miners. It's a shame the Jarl couldn't send men sooner. Mines and prisons are all Markarth has.
String.Dest: 这些可怜的矿工们哪！领主的救兵没有及时赶到。可耻的马卡斯城除了矿洞就是监狱！

String.Source: Hm...it seems killing the Draugr also disabled these statues. At least, I hope. I don't want the foreman to blame us if any miners get killed.
String.Dest: 额……好像杀了尸鬼也能导致这些雕像失效。希望如此吧。我可不想让工头儿说是咱们害矿工送死的。

String.Source: We're close to Rorikstead, but a Forsworn camp means this area is part of the Reach. The wildlings are very good when it comes to borders.
String.Dest: 我们就要到洛利克镇了，不过看到弃誓者的营地表示这里已经是瑞驰的地盘。边界线上的野生物总是格外繁茂吧。

String.Source: The Gildergreen sapling is adorable. I wonder how long it will take to grow? Hopefully not too long.
String.Dest: The Gildergreen sapling is adorable. I wonder how long it will take to grow? Hopefully not too long.

String.Source: That hagraven was a lot tougher than she looked. Probably because she looked like a sweet old lady. Let's get this dagger back to Danica.
String.Dest: 真看不出乌鸦鬼婆有这么厉害，恐怕是因为外表是慈祥的老婆婆吧。好啦收好小刀给丹妮卡送去吧。

String.Source: There's something I don't like about Saadia. On the other hand, she does have some very nice scars. That makes her practically a sister.
String.Dest: 我是有些不喜欢萨蒂娅的地方。可另一方面呢，她又有一些很漂亮的伤疤。感觉上简直像我的姐妹。

String.Source: This is a cozy little camp. A hunter can spend a lifetime fishing by the White, and never lose their sense of wonder.
String.Dest: 真是个美妙的小窝啊，做个猎人可以在白河边钓一辈子鱼，都不会缺少新鲜感

String.Source: Hopefully the spiders aren't too big. It's not like they have much to eat other than rocks.
String.Dest: Hopefully the spiders aren't too big. It's not like they have much to eat other than rocks.

String.Source: The White Phial. An artifact hidden away by a master alchemist. I wonder if the traps will involve mixing the right ingredients.
String.Dest: The White Phial. An artifact hidden away by a master alchemist. I wonder if the traps will involve mixing the right ingredients.

String.Source: Nurelion won't like the phial being damaged. But I think it looks better with a few scars.
String.Dest: Nurelion won't like the phial being damaged. But I think it looks better with a few scars.

String.Source: Skooma is a dangerous substance. My Thane will do well to rid this town of such poison.
String.Dest: Skooma is a dangerous substance. My Thane will do well to rid this town of such poison.

String.Source: Grimsever sounds like a fearsome blade. Maybe I should give my own weapon a name. But then I might get too attached to it.
String.Dest: Grimsever sounds like a fearsome blade. Maybe I should give my own weapon a name. But then I might get too attached to it.

String.Source: There is something about this cave that I don't like. It's too cozy.
String.Dest: There is something about this cave that I don't like. It's too cozy.

String.Source: It's almost like this sorcerer is talking through her Draugr. She would make a great jester, if she wasn't crazy. We should probably stop her.
String.Dest: It's almost like this sorcerer is talking through her Draugr. She would make a great jester, if she wasn't crazy. We should probably stop her.

String.Source: These poor wolves! I want to take one home and care for it, but that would probably be a bit naive.
String.Dest: These poor wolves! I want to take one home and care for it, but that would probably be a bit naive.

String.Source: It was so nice of you to fetch Dravin's Bow. Maybe he won't be so grumpy when he realizes for every thief, there's a hero willing to catch them.
String.Dest: It was so nice of you to fetch Dravin's Bow. Maybe he won't be so grumpy when he realizes for every thief, there's a hero willing to catch them.

String.Source: I've been in a cage or two myself, but never one so big as Dragonsreach. This dragon should feel right at home. Provided he doesn't burn it down.
String.Dest: I've been in a cage or two myself, but never one so big as Dragonsreach. This dragon should feel right at home. Provided he doesn't burn it down.

String.Source: But either way, I hope it finds a use for it. And thanks again. I almost forgot what it felt like. Kindness.
String.Dest: But either way, I hope it finds a use for it. And thanks again. I almost forgot what it felt like. Kindness.
